Answer: kwikswrt ayk mshhawr chhant raha alghwrthm hay jo tksym aur ftha karnay waly nktaha nzar ki pyrwy krta haay۔yha mhawr ansar ko mntkhb karnay ، mhawr kay ard ghrd saf ko tksym karnay ، aur mhawr kay dono taraf sbrywn ko bar bar trtyb denay sy kam krta haay۔yhaan kwiykstwrt alghwrthm ko nafza karnay kay tarykwn ki ayk kdm bha kdm wzuahat haay: tksym: saf sy mhawr ansar ka antkhab kryn۔mhawr ka antkhab alghwrthm ki karkrdghy ko mtasar krskta hay ، aur mhawr kay antkhab kay liye mkhtlf hakmt amly mwjwd hay (jysay ، pehla ، aakhry ، ya drmyany ansar ka antkhab karna ، ya bay trtyb nktaha nzar ka astamal karty hawiay)۔as kay baien taraf ، aur mhawr sy zayada tamam anasar is kay dien taraf rakhy jatay hayn۔mhawr khud is ki aakhry trtyb shuda pwzayshn main hawgha۔asay tksym karnay waly mrhalay kay nam sy jana jata haay۔ ryfrnsyshn: mhawr kay baien taraf (chhwtay anasar par mshtml) aur mhawr kay dien taraf kay sbry (braay anasar par mshtml) kay sab aryay par mzakwrha bala tksym kay aml ko mtnazaaha tawr par laghw kryn۔sbry khaly hawjatay hain ya sirf ayk ansar par mushtamil hawtay hain ، kywnkha snghl ansar ki safwn ko pehlay hi trtyb diya jata haay۔ yahan azaghr main kwikswrt alghwrthm ka ayk msaal aml haay: paiythwn kwpy kwdaydaf kwiykswrt (aay aar aar ، kam ، aaly): agar kam <aaly: # tksym srnyPIVOT_INDEX = tksym (ARR ، kam ، awnchaiy) # bar bar subarrays kwikswrt (ARR ، LOW ، PIVOT_INDEX - 1) ko trtyb dyn # baien subarray Quicksort (ARR ، PIVOT_INDEX + 1 ، aaly) ko trtyb dyn۔): # mhawr ko mntkhb karain (yhaan ، hum dien ansar ka antkhab karty hayn) mhawr = aar aay aar [aaly] # chhwtay ansar ka andayks I = kam - 1 kay liye rynj (km ، aaly): # agar mwjwdha ansar OR sy chhwta hay yamhawr kay brabr agar err [j] <= mhawr: # tbadlha anasar i = i + 1 arr [i] ، arr [j] = arr [j] ، arr [i] # mhawr ansar ko apni trtyb shuda pwzayshn main mntkl kryn۔] kwikstwrt (aay aar aar ، 0 ، lyn (aay aar aar) - 1) prnt (aay aar aar) # aaؤt pt: [1 ، 2 ، 3 ، 4 ، 5 ، 6 ، 7 ، 8 ، 9] kwikstwrt alghwrthm ki wkt ki pychydghy O hay (n lagh ayn) awstaa ، jahan n sray main anasar ki tadad haay۔taham ، bdtryn sawrthaal main (jysay ، jab saf pehlay hi trtyb di hogi hay ya is main msawy anasar shaml hayn) ، wkt ki pychydghy O (n^2) tak kam hawskty haay۔mhawr ki hakmt amly aur bay trtyb jesay tknyk ka antkhab bdtryn sawrthaal kay wakaat ko kam karnay aur alghwrthm ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnanay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔

Question: jawa askrpt main wakaha sy chlnay wali prwghramngh kya haay؟aywnt kay snnay walon aur aywnt kay akhraj kay astamal ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: ayk ghraf ayk dayta dahanchha hawta hay jo baham mrbwta nwdas kay zakhyray ki nmaindghy karnay kay liye astamal hawta hay ، jahan nwdas ko amwdy kaha jata hay ، aur un kay mabyn rabtawn ko knarwn kehty hayn۔ghraf ko wsya pymanay par ashyaa ، adarwn ، ya tsawrat kay mabyn talkat ko madal karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ ghraf ki mtadd aksam hain ، jn main shaml hayn: ghair hadayt shuda ghraf: ghair hadayt shuda ghraf main ، knarwn ki koi smt nahin haay۔dw amwdywn kay mabyn rabtaha twazan hay ، is ka mtalb yeh hay keh agar wrtyks aay sy la kar wrtyks by tak ka ayk knaray mwjwd hay tou ، wrtyks by sy la kar wrtyks aay daairyktda ghraf (dayghraf) tak bhi ayk knaray mwjwd hayn: hadayt shuda ghraf main ، knarwn main ayk smt hawty haay۔knarwn ayk tarfha (makhza) sy dusray wrtyks (mnzal) sy yktarfha rabtaay hayn۔knarwn ki nmaindghy tyr kay zaryaha ki jati hay ، js sy knkshn ki smt ki nshandhay hawty haay۔ wyt ghraf: wzan waly ghraf main ، hr knaray ko ayk wzan ya kymt tfwyzu ki jati hay jo do amwdy kay mabyn rabtaay sy wabstha kuch kymt ki nmaindghy krty haay۔wzan waly ghrafwn ka astamal mnzarnamay kay madal kay liye kya jata hay jahan knarwn kay mkhtlf akhrajat ya fasalay hawtay hayn۔ saiklk ghraf: ayk chkwlk ghraf main kam aza kam ayk saiykl hawta hay ، jo ayk aysa rastha hay jo isi tarah sy shrwa hawta hay aur khtm hawta haay۔chkrk ghraf main dharaiay hoey amwdy aur knarwn main hawskta hay ۔asyklk ghraf: aykaiyklk ghraf ayk aysa ghraf hay js main koi saiykl nahin hawta haay۔asay hadayt shuda aysaiklk ghraf (day aay jy) kay nam sy bhi jana jata haay۔aysaiklk ghraf aksar aysay mnzarnamwn main astamal hawtay hain jahan anhasaar ya trjyhay talkat ko madalngh karnay ki zurwrt hawty haay۔ mnslk ghraf: ayk mnslk ghraf woh hawta hay js main hr jwraay kay jwraay kay darmiyan rastha hawta haay۔dwsray lfzawn main ، hr had tak knarwn kay tslsl kay zaryaay hr dusray hasaay sy kabl rsai hawta haay۔ mtnasb ghraf: mnktaa ghraf main mtadd mnslk ajzaaa par mushtamil hawta hay ، jahan hr jzaw ayk sbghraf hawta hay jo khud hi jraa hawta haay۔mkhtlf ajzaaa main amwdy kay darmiyan koi rastha nahin haay۔ baipartait ghraf: ayk do tarfha ghraf ayk aysa ghraf hay js kay amwdy ko do naghwar sytwn main tksym kya jaskta hay ، jesay keh tamam knarwn ko ayk syt sy dusray syt sy jwratay hayn۔dwsray lfzawn main ، yahan koi knarwn nahin hain jo ayk hi syt kay andr amwdy ko jwratay hayn۔ yeh ghraf ki aksam ki sirf chnd msaalyn hain ، aur mkhtlf dawmynza aur ayply kyshnza main astamal hony waly ghraf ki bohat sy dusri khsawsay aksam aur mkhtlf haaltyn hayn۔ghraf mkhtlf alghwrthm aur msilay ko hal karnay ki tknykwn main astamal hony waly bnyady aadad wa shmar kay dahanchay hain ، jesay ghraf trawrsl ، mkhtsar trien rastha alghwrthm ، nyt wrk flw alghwrthm ، aur bohat kchh۔

Question: aap jawa askrpt main tarykh aur wkt ko kis tarah snbhaltay hayn؟tarykh aabjykt kay astamal aur aam tarykh main hayra phyry kay tarykwn ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: ayk mnt kay dahyr aur zayada sy zayada dahyr kay darmiyan bnyady frk anasar aur un praprtyza ki trtyb main hay jo woh brkrar rkhtay hayn: mn dahyr: ayk mnt kay dahyr main ، kesi bhi nwda kay liye ، is nwda ki kymt akdar sy kam ya is kay brabr haay۔as kay bchay۔dwsray lfzawn main ، kam sy kam kymt hamyshha dahyr ki jra main rhaty haay۔yha praprty is bat ko ykyny bnaty hay keh kam sy kam ansar ko dahyr sy mwsar tarykay sy bazayaft kya jaskta haay۔ myks hayp: ayk zayada sy zayada dahyr main ، kesi bhi nwda kay liye ، is nwda ki kdr is kay bchwn ki akdar sy zayada ya is kay brabr haay۔as kay ntyjay main ، zayada sy zayada kymt hamyshha dahyr ki jra main rhaty haay۔yha praprty dahyr sy zayada sy zayada ansar ki mwsar bazayaft ki ajazat dyty haay۔ do mnt kay dahyr aur zayada sy zayada hayps mkml bainry drkht hain ، is ka mtalb yeh hay keh drkht ki tamam stahayn mmknha tawr par aakhry staha kay sawa bhry hui hain ، jo baien sy dien tak bhra hoa haay۔dahyr main anasar ka hakm dena ، chahaay kam sy kam ho ya zayada sy zayada ، dahyr praprty kay zaryaha taay kya jata hay ، jo andraj aur nkalnay kay kamwn kay doran brkrar rhata haay۔ayk mnt kay dahyr main ، sab sy chhwta ansar hamyshha jra main rhata hay ، aur zayada sy zayada dahyr main ، sab sy braa ansar hamyshha jra main hawta haay۔ woh ay aay py ays aam tawr par trjyhay ktaar main astamal hawtay hain ، jahan anasar ko trjyhaat tfwyzu ki jati hain aur un ki bnyad par un tak rsaiy haasal karnay ki zurwrt hawty haay۔trjyhay aardarmn dahyr aksar trjyhay ktaarwn ko nafza karnay kay liye astamal kyay jatay hain jahan sab sy chhwty trjyha waly ansar ko mwsar andaza main bazayaft karnay ki zurwrt hawty haay۔asy tarah ، zayada sy zayada dahyr astamal kyay jatay hain jab sab sy zayada trjyha waly ansar ko mwsar tarykay sy rsaiy haasal karnay ki zurwrt hawty haay۔ yeh nwt karna zurwry hay keh "mn dahyr" aur "myks hayp" ki asatalahaat dahyr main anasar ki trtyb ka hawalha dytay hain aur aadad wa shmar kay alag alag dahanchay nahin hayn۔dahyr ki bnyady dahanchha aur karwaiyan ayk jesi hi rhaty hain ، ktaa nzar is sy keh yeh ayk mn dahyr hay ya zayada sy zayada dahyr haay۔

Question: jawa askrpt main yaddasht kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur yeh keh fnkshn par aml draamd ko bhatr bnanay kay liye kis tarah astamal kya jaskta haay۔
Answer: kesi ghraf par ghharaiy ki pehli tlash (DFS) alghwrthm ko nafza karnay kay l you ، aap astyk ka astamal karty hoey ya kesi tkrar nktaha nzar ka astamal karty hoey kesi tkrary nktaha nzar ka astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan astyk ka astamal karty hoey tkrary nktaha nzar ki ayk kdm bha kdm wzuahat haay: nwdas ko dykhnay kay liye zakhyrha karnay kay liye ayk astyk bnaiyn۔as ko shrwa karnay waly nwda kay sath shrwa kryn۔ mlahazaha karnay waly nwdas ka tryk rkhnay kay liye ayk syt ya saf tyar kryn۔ jab astyk khaly nahin haay: astyk sy ayk nwda pap kryn۔ chyk karain agar nwda pehlay hi mlahazaha kya gaya haay۔aghr aysa hay tou ، aghlay tkrar ko jary rkhyn۔ nwda ko mlahazaha karain aur is par karrwaiy kryn۔ mwjwdha nwda kay mlhakha tamam nwdas ko ghyt karain jn ka dwrha nahin kya gaya hay aur inhain astyk par dhkylyn۔azaghr main tkrary nktaha nzar ka astamal karty hoey day ayf ays alghwrthm ka ayk msaal aml: paiythwn kwpy kwdaydaf day ayf ays (ghraf ، astart_nwda): astyk = [astart_nwda] mlahazaha karain = syt () jabky astyk: krnt_nwda = astyk.pwp () agar mwjwdha_ nwda main mlahazaha kryn: jary rkhyn۔.add (mwjwdha_nwda) prnt (krnt_nwda) # prwsys karain mwjwdha nwda # mwjwdha nwda kay tamam mlhakha nwdas haasal karain aur inhain ghraf main prawsy kay liye astyk par dhkylyn [mwjwdha_nwda]msaal kay tawr par astamal: ghraf = {'a': ['b' ، 'c'] ، 'b': ['d' ، 'e'] ، 'c': ['f'] ، 'd': [].lght main hr klyd ayk nwda sy msawy hay ، aur is sy wabstha kymt mlhakha nwdas ki ayk fharst haay۔ day ayf ays alghwrthm dyiay gaye astart_nwda sy shrwa hawta hay aur byk trykngh sy pehlay hr shakh kay sath jahan tak mmkn ho tlash krta haay۔yha dwray kay nwdas ko is trtyb main prnt krta hay js ka un ka samna karna prata haay۔

Question: aap jawa askrpt main kwkyza ko kis tarah snbhaltay hayn؟dstawyza kay astamal ki wzuahat kryn۔ kwky praprty aur kwky hayra phyry kay tarykwn۔
Answer: mymwraizayshn ayk aysy tknyk hay jo mthark prwghramngh main astamal hawty hay takha kesi fnkshn kay aml ko bhatr bnanay kay liye is kay ntaij ko bhatr bnaiay۔as main mhanghay fnkshn kalza kay ntaij ko zakhyrha karna aur jab wahi aadanwn ko dwbarha hawta hay tou inhain kyshay sy bazayaft karna shaml hawta haay۔yaddasht pehlay kay hasab shuda ntaij ko dwbarha astamal krkay bay kar kmpywtwn ko khtm krty hay ، is tarah alghwrthm ki mjmway wkt ki pychydghy ko kam krty haay۔yha afaal kesi msilay ko bar bar chhwtay chhwtay mzuamyn main twra kar hal karty hayn۔taham ، yaddasht kay baghair ، ayk hi zayly msail ko mtadd bar hal kya jaskta hay ، js ki wjha sy ghair zurwry kmpywtwn ka sbb bnta haay۔ mthark prwghramngh main yaddasht ka astamal kya jata haay: tkrar karnay waly fnkshn ki shnakht kryn: ayk tkrar fnkshn ki tlash karain jo awwrlypngh sab prwblwblza ki praprty ko zaahar krta hay ، jahan ayk hi zayly prwblys ko zaahar krta haay۔mtadd bar hal kyay jatay hayn۔ ayk kyshay ko tyar kryn: aadad wa shmar kay dahanchay ko shrwa karain ، jesay srny ya haysh tybl ، pehlay kmpywtda ntaij ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye kyshay kay tawr par kam kryn۔kyshay ko un pt (ya aadanwn ka mjmwaha) un kay mtalkha aaؤt pt par nkshha bnanay kay kabl hona chahaiay۔ fnkshn ko tbdyl kryn: pehlay chyk karnay kay liye tkrar karnay wali tkryb main trmym karain keh aya dyiay gaye un pt ka ntyjha pehlay hi kyshay main mwjwd hay ya nhayn۔aghr aysa hawta hay tou ، kyshda ntyjha ko dwbarha tshkyl denay kay bjaiay waps krdyn۔aghr ntyjha kyshay main nahin hay tou ، isy mamwl kay mtaabk hasab karain aur isy waps karnay sy pehlay kyshay main astwr kryn۔ ntaij ko yad karty hoey ، isi aadanwn kay sath tkrar karnay wali tkryb main aanay wali kalwn ko mstkl wkt main hal kya jaskta hay ، kywnkha ntyjha Question: jawa askrpt main == aur === aaprytrza kay darmiyan kya frk haay؟frk ko wazuha karnay kay liye msaalyn fraham kryn۔
Answer: dajkstra ka alghwrthm ayk mkbwl alghwrthm hay jo ghair mnfy knaray kay wzan waly ghraf main nwdas kay darmiyan mkhtsar trien rastha tlash karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔yha hadayt aur ghair hadayt shuda dono ghrafwn par kam krta hay aur ghraf kay dusray tamam nwdas tak ayk hi makhza nwda sy kam trien rastha tyar krta haay۔ alghwrthm hr nwda kay liye "ghyr mnhasar" nwdas aur "fasalay" ki kymt ka ayk syt brkrar rkhta hay ، abtdaiy tawr par anfynty par syt kya jata haay۔swaiay swrs nwda kay jo 0 par syt kya gaya haay۔yha aml is wkt tak jary hay jab tak keh tamam nwdas ka dwrha nah kya jaye ya mnzal ka nwda phancha nah jaiay۔ yahan dajkstra kay alghwrthm ki ayk kdm bha kdm wzuahat: ghraf ko shrwa karain aur makhza nwda ka fasalha 0 aur dyghr tamam nwdas ko anfynty par syt kryn۔ayk trjyhay ktaar (jw aksar ayk mn dahyr kay tawr par nafza ki jati haay) nwdas ko un kay fasalwn ki bnyad par zakhyrha karnay kay liay۔makhza nwda ko trjyhay ktaar main dakhl kryn۔ jab trjyhay ktaar khaly nahin haay: trjyhay ktaar sy kam sy kam fasalay kay sath nwda nkalyn۔yha nwda "mwjwdha" nwda haay۔ mwjwdha nwda ko dykhyn۔nya fasalha prawsy kay mwjwdha fasalay sy kam hay ، prawsy kay fasalay ko ap dayt kryn۔ agar hamsayha ghair mnhasar hay tou ، isy trjyhay ktaar main dakhl kryn۔ ayk bar mnzal nwda ka dwrha kya gaya hay ya trjyhay ktaar khaly hay ، alghwrthm khtm hawjata haay۔alghwrthm kay doran hasab ki janay wali dwry ghraf main makhza nwda sy dusray tamam nwdas tak mkhtsar trien rastwn ki nmaindghy krty haay۔ dayjkstra ka alghwrthm is bat ki zumant dyta hay keh jab alghwrthm khtm hawjata hay tou mnba nwda sy kesi dusray nwda tak ka mkhtsar trien rastha paya jata haay۔taham ، yeh ghair mnfy knaray kay wzan ko frzu krta hay aur ghraf main mnfy chkrwn ko nahin snbhalta haay۔ dayjkstra ka alghwrthm mkhtlf ayply kyshnza main wsya pymanay par astamal hawta hay jesay nyt wrk rwtngh prwtwkwl ، jy py ays nywyghyshn sstm ، aur transpwrtyshn nyt wrks main mkhtsar trien rastay ki pryshanywn ko hal karna ، dwsrwn kay drmyan۔

Question: jawa askrpt main prwtw taip aabjykt kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur yeh kis tarah aabjykt wrasat kay liye astamal hawta haay۔
Answer: aay wy ayl kay drkht aur srkh rngh kay dono drkht khud ko mtwazan karnay waly bainry tlash kay drkht hain jo drkht ki awnchaiy ko mtwazan rkhtay hoey mwsar karrwaiywn ko ykyny bnatay hayn۔taham ، un kay mabyn kuch akhtlafat mwjwd hayn: twazan kay mayar: AVL drkht: ayk AVL drkht main ، hr nwda ka twazan ansar ، baien subtree mains ki awnchaiy kay tawr par byan kya jata hay ، dien sbtry ki awnchaiy ، ya tou -1 ، 0 hona chahaiay۔، ya 1. agar kesi bhi nwda ka twazan ansar is had sy bahar hawjata hay tou ، drkht ko ghrdsh ki karrwaiywn ko anjam dy kar twazan diya jata haay۔ ryda-blyk try: srkh rngh kay drkht main ، hr nwda ko rngh tfwyzu kya jata haay-ya tou srkh ya syaha۔drkht ko mndrjha zayl khsawsayat ko pora karna chahaiay: hr nwda ya tou srkh ya syaha hawta haay۔ jra nwda syaha haay۔ hr pty nwda (nyl ya kal) syaha haay۔ agar nwda srkh hay tou ، is kay dono bchay syaha hayn۔ hr nwda kay liye ، sab kay liye ، sbnwda sy is ki awlad kay ptay tak kay rastwn main ayk hi tadad main syaha nwdas hawtay hayn۔yha praprty is bat ko ykyny bnaty hay keh sab sy lmba rastha dwghna sy zayada nahin hay jab tak keh kam trien rastha۔ mtwazan aapryshnza: aay wy ayl try: aay wy ayl kay drkhtwn main twazan ghhwmnay kay zaryaay haasal kya jata hay ، bshmwl baien ghrdshwn ، dien ghrdshwn ، aur dabl ghrdshwn (baiyn aur ayk mjmwahadaiyn ghrdsh) .da-blyk try: srkh rngh kay drkhtwn main twazan rkhnay main rnghyn pltyan (nwdas kay rnghwn ko tbdyl krna) aur ghrdshwn ka ayk mjmwaha shaml hawta hay ، bshmwl baien ghrdsh ، dien ghrdsh ، aur ghrdshwn ka ayk mjmwaha۔ twazan bmkablha skhty: AVLdrkht: AVL drkht srkh rngh kay drkhtwn kay mkablay main skht twazan fraham karty hayn۔wha is bat ki zumant dytay hain keh hr nwda kay baien aur dien sbtrywn kay darmiyan awnchaiy ka frk zayada sy zayada 1 hawta hay ، js kay ntyjay main awnchaiy mtwazan drkht hawta haay۔ srkh rngh ka drkht: srkh syaha drkht AVL drkhtwn kay mkablay main zayada aaram dha twazan ki haalt fraham karty hayn۔wha is bat ko ykyny bnatay hain keh jra sy ptay tak sab sy lmba rastha dwghna nahin hay jab tak keh mkhtsar trien rastha۔as kay ntyjay main ، srkh syaha drkht skht awnchaiy kay twazan kay bjaiay mjmway twazan ko trjyha dytay hayn۔ karkrdghy kay akhtlafat: aay wy ayl kay drkht: aay wy ayl kay drkhtwn main aam tawr par srkh syaha drkhtwn kay mkablay main tyza rftar dykhnay ka wkt hawta hay kywnkha woh zayada skht twazan fraham karty hayn۔taham ، un ko andraj aur hazaf karnay ki karrwaiywn kay doran zayada ghrdshwn ki zurwrt hawty hay ، jo un karrwaiywn ko aahastha aahastha bnasktay hayn۔ ryda-blyk try: srkh rngh kay drkhtwn main mjmway tawr par zayada mtwazan dahanchha hawta hay ، js kay ntyjay main AVL drkhtwn kay mkablay main andraj aur hazaf karnay kay kamwn main bhatr karkrdghy hawty haay۔km skht twazan ki zurwryat ki wjha sy un main thwraa sa sst wkt hawskta haay۔ aay wy ayl kay drkhtwn aur srkh syaha drkhtwn kay mabyn antkhab drkhwast ki mkhsawsa zurwryat par mnhasar haay۔jb tyza nzaryn naghzayr hon tou aay wy ayl kay drkht mwzawn hain ، jab keh srkh rngh kay drkhtwn ko trjyha di jati hay jab tlash ، andraj aur hazaf karnay kay kamwn kay mabyn achha twazan mtalwb hawta haay۔

Question: aap jawa askrpt main mtzuad tkrar ko kis tarah snbhaltay hayn؟wyw aaf lwp kay astamal ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: ayk rydaks drkht ، jsay try ya pryfks try bhi kaha jata hay ، ayk khasa drkht kay aadad wa shmar ka dahanchha hay jo mwsar astwryj aur tarwn ki bazayaft kay liye astamal hawta haay۔yha khasa tawr par lght kay nfaza ، aatwmplyt sstm ، aur aai py rwtngh tyblza jesay ayply kyshnza kay liye mfyd haay۔ rydaks try apnay krdarwn kay zaryaha tarwn ka ahatmam krta hay ، js main hr nwda ayk sabkha ya mkml tar ki nmaindghy krta haay۔yhaan ayk jaizaha hay keh ayk rydaks try kis tarah kam krta haay: nwda dahanchha: rydaks try main hr nwda main kiy ajzaaa hawtay hayn: klydy/krdar: nwda sy wabstha krdar۔msaal kay tawr par ، lght kay nfaza main ، hr krdar kesi lfza main ayk khta ki nmaindghy krta haay۔ bchwn: bchwn kay nwdas kay asharay ya hawalha۔har bchha ayk mmknha krdar sy mtaabkt rkhta hay jo lfza markr kay mwjwdha nwda ki pyrwy krskta haay: ayk jhndaa js sy yeh zaahar hawta hay keh aya nwda ayk mkml lfza kay akhttam ki nmaindghy krta haay۔ rydaks try ki tamyr: rydaks ka drkht abtdaiy tawr par khaly hay ، js main sirf ayk jra nwda haay۔chwnkha drkht main dawr daalay jatay hain ، harwf ko baien sy dien tak abwr kya jata haay۔ dakhlha aapryshn: rydaks try main ayk tar dakhl krna: jra nwda par shrwa kryn۔ chyk karain agar mwjwdha krdar mwjwdha nwda kay bchay ki tarah mwjwd haay۔kya ، mtalkha bchay ki taraf brahyn aur aghlay krdar ki taraf brahyn۔ agar aysa nahin hawta hay tou ، mwjwdha krdar kay liye ayk nya chailda nwda bnaiyn aur is bchay ki taraf brahyn۔ is aml ko is wkt tak jary rakhien jab tak keh tar kay tamam krdarwn par karrwaiy nahin ki jati haay۔hatmy nwda kesi lfza kay akhttam kay tawr pr۔ srch aapryshn: rydaks try main tar tlash karnay kay liay: rwt nwda par shrwa kryn۔ hadf kay tar main hr krdar kay liye ، chyk karain keh aya koi bchha nwda mwjwd hay ya nhayn۔، is bchay ki taraf brahyn aur aghlay krdar ki taraf brahyn۔ agar kesi bchay ka nwda mwjwd nahin hay tou ، astrngh rydaks try main mwjwd nahin haay۔ tamam harwf par karrwaiy karnay kay bad ، chyk karain keh aya hatmy nwda ko kesi lfza kay akhttam kay tawr par nshan zad kya gaya haay۔aghr yeh hay tou ، tar mil jata haay۔bsawrt dyghr ، yeh mwjwd nahin haay۔ rydaks try mwsar astwryj aur tarwn ki bazayaft fraham krta hay jo mkhtlf tarwn main aam sabkwn ko mؤsar tarykay sy bant kar tarwn ki bazayaft krta haay۔as sy tar ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye drkar mjmway jghha ko kam kya jata hay aur tlash ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnaya jata haay۔ rydaks kay drkht main aapryshn ki wkt ki pychydghy ، jesay andraj aur tlash ، tarwn ki lmbaiy par mnhasar haay۔bhatryn sawrthaal main ، jahan dawrwn kay mabyn koi mshtrkha sabkha nahin hawta hay ، wkt ki pychydghy O (M) hawty hay ، jahan aym hadf kay tar ki lmbaiy hawty haay۔taham ، bdtryn sawrthaal main ، jahan tamam dawrwn ka ayk hi sabkha hawta hay ، wkt ki pychydghy O (n) hawskty hay ، jahan N tamam tar main harwf ki kal tadad haay۔

Question: jawa askrpt main mkhtlf ksm ki ghltayan kya hayn؟aam ghltay ki aksam ki msaalyn fraham kryn۔
Answer: by try ayk khud twazan rkhnay wala drkht dayta dahanchha hay jo dask par ya saanwy astwryj main bray mkdar main dayta ko mwsar andaza main astwr karnay aur bazayaft karnay kay liye dayzaain kya gaya haay۔yha sst rsaiy kay awkat kay sath nzaamwn kay l optim bhatr hay ، jesay haarda daraiywza ، jahan kam sy kam dask rydaza karkrdghy kay liye bohat zurwry haay۔ayk by try bainry srch try (by ays ty) sy kiy tarykwn sy mkhtlf haay: nwda dahanchha: bainry srch try main ، hr nwda main aam tawr par ayk hi klyd aur do bchwn kay pwaintr hawtay hain ، jo baien aur dien sbtryza ki nmaindghy karty hayn۔as kay braks ، by try nwda main mtadd chabyan aur bchwn kay pwaintrza shaml hawsktay hayn۔nwda main chabyan ki tadad ayk khasa had kay andr hay ، js ka tayn by try kay hakm sy hawta haay۔by try ka trtyb nwda main ajazat di hogi kam sy kam aur zayada sy zayada chabyan ka tayn krta haay۔aardar aym kay ayk by try main nwda main zayada tr M-1 kyza aur aym chailda pwaintrza hawsktay hain ، swaiay jra kay nwda kay ، js main kam aza kam 1 klyd haay۔ twazan aur awnchaiy: bainry tlash kay drkht kay braks ، jahan twazan haaybaiyn aur dien sbtryza main nwdas ki tkryba brabr tadad ko brkrar rkhtay hoey haasal kya gaya ، ayk by try ayk hi staha par ptay kay tamam nwdas ko rakh kar twazan haasal krta haay۔yha mtwazan dahanchha is bat ko ykyny bnata hay keh drkht ki awnchaiy chabyan ki tadad kay mkablay main nsbta small chhwty rhaty hay ، js ki wjha sy dask tak rsaiy haasal hawty haay۔ tlash aur dakhlha: bainry srch try main ، tlash aur andraj ki karrwaiywn par mbny ayk skht baien dien mwazanha ki pyrwy ki jati haay۔klydy akdar۔by try main ، klydy hadwd ki bnyad par chailda pwaintrza kay bad ، tlash aur andraj kay kamwn main drkht ko nechay ki taraf jana shaml hawta haay۔as sy mwsar dask tak rsaiy haasal karnay ki ajazat mlty hay aur mtalwbha mwazanha ki tadad ko kam kya jata haay۔ dask rsaiy ki asalaha: by try khasa tawr par mwsar dask tak rsaiy kay l designed tyar ki hogi hayn۔an ka mksad dayta tak rsaiy ya is main trmym karnay kay liye drkar dask rydaza ki tadad ko kam sy kam karna haay۔fy nwda ki chabyan ki tadad main azuafha krkay ، by try drkht ki awnchaiy ko kam karty hain ، js kay ntyjay main aadad wa shmar tak rsaiy ya is main trmym karty wkt kam staha ghzar jati haay۔ drkhwastyn: by try aam tawr par fail sstm ، dayta bys aur dyghr astwryj sstm main astamal hawty hain jhaanbray mkdar main dayta ko dask par zakhyrha karnay ki zurwrt haay۔wha aysay mnzarnamwn kay l well mnasb hain jahan tyza rsaiy aur mwsar dask I/O aapryshn zurwry hayn۔ sab sy zayada ، by try ayk wrstail dayta dahanchha hay jo mwsar astwryj aur dask par bray mkdar main dayta ki bazayaft ki ajazat dyta haay۔drkht ki awnchaiy ko mtwazan karnay ، dask kay prahnay ko kam karnay ، aur hr nwda ki mkhtlf ksm ki chabyan snbhalnay ki is ki salahayt yeh dask par mbny ayply kyshnza kay l an ayk bhatryn antkhab bnaty hay ، jabky bainry tlash kay drkht aksar mymwry par mbny mnzarnamwn main astamal hawtay hain jahan tyza klydy tawr par mbny tlashybnyady tshwysh haay۔

Question: jawa askrpt main yaddasht kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur yeh keh fnkshn par aml draamd ko bhatr bnanay kay liye kis tarah astamal kya jaskta haay۔
Answer: day ays aay ka mtalb mkhtlf syak wa sbak main mtadd shraita haay۔yhaan day ays aay kay kuch aam many hayn: dayta dahanchay aur alghwrthm: kmpywtr sains main ، day ays aay sy mrad aadad wa shmar kay dahanchay (jysay safwn ، lnkda fharstwn ، drkhtwn ، ghrafwn ، wghyrha) aur alghwrthm (jysay chhant raha hay ،tlash ، ghraf alghwrthm ، wghyrha) msail ko mwsar tarykay sy hal karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ dayjytl dstkhta alghwrthm: day ays aay ayk kryptwghrafk alghwrthm hay jo dayjytl dstkhtawn ko pyda karnay aur is ki tsadyk kay liye astamal hawta haay۔yha dayjytl dstkhtawn kay liye wsya pymanay par astamal hony wala mayar hay aur yeh madaywlr akhraj aur mjrd lwghrythm kay ryazuy kay tsawrat par mbny haay۔ daairkt sylngh ayswsy ayshn: day ays aay ayk aysy andastry tryda ayswsy ayshn hay jo aysy kmpnywn ki nmaindghy krty hay jo braha rast frwkht main mlwsa haay۔yha braha rast frwkht hony wali kmpnywn kay liye mdd ، wkalt aur talym mhaya krta hay aur sanat kay andr akhlaky karwbary tarykwn ko frwgh dyta haay۔ amrykha kay jmhawry swshlst: day ays aay ryasthaaiay mthadha main ayk syasy tnzaym hay jo jmhawry swshlzam ki hamayt krty haay۔yha mlk ki sab sy bray swshlst tnzaym hay aur trky psnd palysy ki tbdylywn ، maashrty ansaaf ، aur maashy msawat ki taraf kam krty haay۔ yeh sirf chnd msaalyn hain keh day ays aay kya hawalha dy sakta hay ، aur is mkhsawsa tnazar par mnhasar aur is kay dusray many bhi hawsktay hain js mynasatalaha astamal ki jati haay۔

Question: aap jawa askrpt main kwkyza ko kis tarah snbhaltay hayn؟dstawyza kay astamal ki wzuahat kryn۔ kwky praprty aur kwky hayra phyry kay tarykwn۔
Answer: dayta ka dahanchha kmpywtr ki mymwry main dayta ko mnzam aur astwr karnay ka ayk tarykha hay takha is tak rsaiy aur mwsar andaza main hayra phyry ki jaskay۔yha ayk mntaky nmaindghy fraham krta hay keh aadad wa shmar ko kis tarah mnzam kya jata hay ، js sy mwsar astwryj ، bazayaft ، aur malwmat ki hayra phyry ki ajazat hawty haay۔ dayta dahanchay ko do aham zamrwn main drjha bndy kya jaskta haay: kdym aadad wa shmar kay dahanchay aur jama dayta dahanchay۔ bnyady aadad wa shmar kay dahanchay: yeh bnyady haynprwghramngh zabanwn kay zaryaha fraham krdha blaks bldangh۔msaalwn main shaml hayn: antyjr: pori tadad (jysay ، 1 ، 2 ، 3) astwr krta haay۔ flwt: astwrza aasharyha aasharyha (jysay ، 3.14 ، 2.718)۔ chyryktr: ayk hi harf (jysay ، 'aay' ، 'by' ، 'sy' ko astwr krta haay۔.msaalwn main shaml hayn: safyn: ayk hi ksm kay anasar ka ayk mjmwaha ، andayks ka astamal karty hoey rsaiy haasal ki ghiy۔(LIFO) dahanchha jahan anasar ko ayk hi sray sy shaml aur hata diya jata haay۔knarwn kay zaryaha jraay hoey nwdas ، upar ki jra nwda kay sath۔ ghrafs: knarwn kay zaryaha mnslk nwdas (amwdy) ka ayk mjmwaha ، pychydha talkat ki ajazat dyta haay۔ dayta dahanchay ka antkhab haath main msilay ki mkhsawsa zurwryat par mnhasar haay۔mkhtlf aadad wa shmar kay dahanchay main mkhtlf khsawsayat hain ، jesay mymwry kay astamal kay lhaaza sy un ki karkrdghy ، rsaiy ki rftar ، andraj aur hazaf karnay ki karrwaiywn ، aur mkhsawsa ksm kay kamwn kay l suit mnasbyt۔dayta kay dahanchay aur un ki khsawsayat ko smjhna mwsar alghwrthm dayzaain aur nfaza kay liye bnyady haay۔

Question: jawa askrpt main == aur === aaprytrza kay darmiyan kya frk haay؟frk ko wazuha karnay kay liye msaalyn fraham kryn۔
Answer: safwn aur lnkda fharstyn dono aadad wa shmar kay dahanchay hain jo anasar kay mjmwawn ko astwr aur mnzam karnay kay liye astamal hawtay hayn۔taham ، woh apnay bnyady dahanchay ، mymwry kay antzaam aur karkrdghy ki khsawsayat kay lhaaza sy mkhtlf hayn۔safwn aur mnslk fharstwn kay mabyn klydy akhtlafat yeh hayn: dahanchha: srny: ayk srny mymwry ka ayk mtnazaaha blak hay jo ayk hi ksm kay anasar ko astwr krta haay۔ansarwn tak andayks ka astamal karty hoey rsaiy haasal ki jati hay ، tkhlyk kay wkt taay shuda saiza ka tayn kya jata haay۔safwn ki ayk mkrrha lmbaiy hawty hay aur un kay asharyha ki bnyad par anasar tak braha rast rsaiy fraham krty haay۔ lnkda fharst: ayk lnkda fharst nwdas par mushtamil hawty hay jahan hr nwda main trtyb main aghlay nwda kay liye ayk kdr aur hawalha (ya pwaintr) hawta haay۔nwdas zurwry tawr par mymwry kay mtzuad mkamat par mhafwza nahin hawtay hain ، js sy mthark mymwry ki mkhtsa karnay ki ajazat hawty haay۔mnslk fharstyn lmbaiy main mkhtlf hawskty hain aur anasar tak trtyb tak rsaiy fraham krskty hayn۔ mymwry mynjmnt: srny: safwn ko tamam anasar ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye mymwry ka pehlay sy mkhtsa blak ki zurwrt hawty haay۔srny ka saiza taay shuda hay aur anasar ko nkl karnay aur anasar ki kapy kyay baghair aasany sy tbdyl nahin kya jaskta۔har nwda main aghlay nwda ka hawalha hawta hay ، js sy anasar ko shaml karnay ya hatanay main lchk ki ajazat hawty haay۔mnslk fharstyn mtzuad mymwry ki zurwrt kay baghair mthark tawr par brah sakti hain ya skra sakti hayn۔ dakhlha aur hazaf krna: srny: ayk srny main dakhl karna ya hazaf karna mhangha hawskta hay agar isy aardar ko brkrar rkhnay kay liye shft karnay waly anasar ki zurwrt ho ya agar isy saf ka saiza tbdyl karnay ki zurwrt haw۔ksy srny kay aaghaza ya wsta main anasar ko dakhl karna ya hazaf karnay kay liye bad kay anasar ko tbdyl karna zurwry haay۔ lnkda fharst: mnslk fharst main dakhl karna ya hazaf karna nsbta effective mwsar haay۔nwda kay andraj ya hazaf karnay main dusray anasar ko mntkl karnay ki zurwrt kay baghair ، kuch pwaintrza ko aydajst karna shaml haay۔taham ، lnkda fharst main kesi mkhsawsa ansar tak rsaiy kay liye shrwa sy hi fharst ko abwr karnay ki zurwrt hawty haay۔ksy mkhsawsa andayks main kesi ansar tak rsaiy mwsar hay aur is main mstkl wkt ki pychydghy (O (1)) haay۔ mnslk fharst: mnslk fharstyn braha rast bay trtyb rsaiy fraham nahin krty hayn۔ksy mkhsawsa andayks main kesi ansar tak rsaiy kay l the ، fharst ko shrwa sy hi trtyb sy ghzarna chahaiay ، js kay ntyjay main lkyry taim pychydghy (O (n)) hawty haay۔ khlasaha yeh keh safyn bay trtyb rsaiy aur mkrrha saiza ka astwryj fraham krty hain lekin is main mhadwd lchk hawty haay۔mthark saiza aur andraj/hazaf karnay ki karrwaiywn ki shraita۔mnslk fharstyn saiza aur andraj/hazaf karnay kay kamwn main lchk pysh krty hain lekin un tak rsaiy kay awkat sst hawtay hain aur azuafy pwaintrza ki wjha sy zayada mymwry astamal karty hayn۔safwn aur mnslk fharstwn kay mabyn antkhab msilay ki mkhsawsa zurwryat par mnhasar hay ، jesay bay trtyb rsaiy ، bar bar andraj/hazaf karnay ، ya mymwry ki karkrdghy ki zurwrt۔

Question: jawa askrpt main prwtw taip aabjykt kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur yeh kis tarah aabjykt wrasat kay liye astamal hawta haay۔
Answer: ayk astyk aur ktaar dono lkyry dayta dahanchay hain jo anasar ko zakhyrha karnay aur un main hayra phyry kay liye astamal hawtay hayn۔taham ، woh is trtyb kay lhaaza sy mkhtlf hain js main anasar tak rsaiy aur hata diya jata haay۔yhaan astyk aur ayk ktaar kay darmiyan klydy akhtlafat hayn: astyk: aakhry un pehli aaؤt (LIFO): ayk astyk main ، aakhry ansar jo shaml kya jata hay (dhka diya jata haay) pehlay hi hataya jata hay (papda)۔as kay baray main plytwn kay astyk ki tarah swchiay ، jahan aap sirf upar sy plytwn ko shaml ya hata saktay hayn۔as ko hataiay baghair sab sy upar ka ansar۔ msaal kay tawr pr: ktabwn kay dahyr par ghwr kryn۔jb aap kesi ktab ko hatatay hain tou sab sy upar rakhi hogi aakhry ktab pehli ktab haay۔as kay baray main swchiay keh lain main antzaar karnay waly lwghwn ki ktaar ki tarah ، jahan pehlay phanchnay wala pehla shkhsa pysh kya jaiay۔ktaar kay samnay (sr) say۔jb pehlay phanchnay wala ghahak pehlay phanchay ga tou is ki khdmt ki jaye gi jab ayk kyshyir saarfyn ki khdmt krta haay۔ khlasaha main ، astyk aur ktaar kay darmiyan bnyady frk woh trtyb hay js main anasar tak rsaiy aur hata diya jata haay۔ayk astyk aakhry un frst aaؤt (LIFO) asawl ki pyrwy krta hay ، jabky ayk ktaar pehlay un frst aaؤt (FIFO) asawl ki pyrwy krty haay۔astyk ko aysay mnzarnamwn main astamal kya jata hay jahan haal hi main shaml krdha anasar dlchspy rkhtay hain (jysay ، fnkshn kal astyk) ، jabky ktaaryn mnzarnamwn main astamal hawty hain jahan andraj ka hakm zurwry hawta hay (jysay ، mlazamt ka nzaam alawkat ، chwraaiy ki pehli tlash alghwrthm)۔

Question: aap jawa askrpt main mtzuad tkrar ko kis tarah snbhaltay hayn؟wyw aaf lwp kay astamal ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: ayk haysh tybl ، jsay haysh myp kay nam sy bhi jana jata hay ، ayk dayta dahanchha hay jo mwsar andraj ، hazaf karnay aur bazayaft kay kam fraham krta haay۔as main hayshngh namy ayk tknyk astamal ki hogi hay takha woh apni chabyan par mbny anasar ko zakhyrha karain aur bazayaft kryn۔ayk haysh tybl main baltywn ya slatwn ki ayk saf shaml hawty hay ، jahan hr slat ayk ya zayada klydy kdr kay jwraay ko zakhyrha krskta haay۔ haysh tybl kis tarah kam krta haay: haysh fnkshn: ayk haysh fnkshn un pt ki haysayt sy ayk klyd lyta hay aur haysh kwda ki ghnty krta hay ،ayk add kymt haay۔haysh kwda ko andayks ya balty ka tayn karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay jahan mtalkha klydy kdr ki jwray ko saf main mhafwza kya jaye gha۔ andayks hasab ktab: haysh kwda aam tawr par madaywlw dawyzen namy aml ka astamal karty hoey saf kay andr andayks ka hasab lghanay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔madaywlw aapryshn is bat ko ykyny bnata hay keh andayks srny ki drst had main aata haay۔ kwlyshn hayndalngh: haysh kay afaal mkhtlf chabyan kay liye ayk hi haysh kwda tyar krsktay hain ، js sy tsaadm ka baasa bnta haay۔tsaadm is wkt hawta hay jab ayk hi andayks kay do ya zayada klydwn ka nkshha۔tsaadm ko snbhalnay kay l different ، mkhtlf tknykyn hayn: alag alag zanjyr: haysh tybl main hr balty main ayk hi andayks kay sath ayk sy zayada klydy kymt kay jwraay ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye ayk lnkda lst ya dusra dayta dahanchha hawta haay۔aghla dstyab slat srny main (lkyry thakykat ، chwkwr thakykat ، ya dabl hayshngh jesi tknykwn ka astamal karty hawiay) jab tak keh is ko klydy kdr ki jwray ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye ayk khaly slat nahin mil jata haay۔aghr andayks khaly hay tou ، klydy kdr ki jwray braha rast zakhyrha hawty haay۔tsaadm ki sawrt main ، tsaadm ki krardad ki hakmt amly mnasb slat tlash karnay kay liye astamal ki jati haay۔aghr andayks main mtalwbha klyd mwjwd hay tou ، isi kdr waps krdy jati haay۔aghr tsaadm hain tou ، srch alghwrthm sahayha slat tlash karnay kay liye tsaadm ki krardad ki hakmt amly ki pyrwy krta haay۔ lytyshn: haysh fnkshn klyd kay liye andayks ka hasab lghata haay۔aghr andayks main klyd hawty hay tou ، mtalkha klydy kdr ki jwray ko hata diya jata haay۔aghr tsaadm hain tou ، srch alghwrthm ko klyd tlash karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، aur phir hazaf karnay ka kam anjam diya jata haay۔ haysh tyblza kay klydy fwaid un kay dakhlay ، bazayaft aur hazaf karnay kay kamwn kay liye awstaa wkt ki awsta wkt ki pychydghy (O (1)) hain (O (1))jb haysh fnkshn chabyan yksan tawr par tksym krta haay۔taham ، bdtryn sawrt main ، jab bohat sary tsaadm hawtay hain tou ، wkt ki pychydghy O (n) ko kam kar sakti hay ، jahan haysh tybl main anasar ki tadad haay۔prwghramngh zabanwn main myzayn ، dayta bys ki asharyha sazay ، aur ayswsy aytw arywn ya lghtwn ko nafza krna۔

Question: jawa askrpt main mkhtlf ksm ki ghltayan kya hayn؟aam ghltay ki aksam ki msaalyn fraham kryn۔
Answer: ayk drkht ayk nan lainr dayta dahanchha hay jo mnslk ، aysaiklk andaza main drjha bndy sy anasar ko mnzam krta haay۔as main nwdas aur knarwn par mushtamil hay ، jahan nwdas anasar ki nmaindghy karty hain ، aur knaray anasar kay mabyn talkat ki nmaindghy karty hayn۔ksy drkht main sab sy upar waly nwda ko rwt nwda kaha jata hay ، aur hr nwda main safr ya is sy zayada bchwn kay nwdas hawsktay hayn۔nwdas jn main ayk hi waldyn kay nwda hawtay hain inhain bhan bhaiy kehty hain ، aur baghair kesi bchay kay nwdas kay nwda ko pty ka nwda kaha jata haay۔ yahan mkhtlf ksm kay drkht hayn: bainry try: ayk bainry try ayk drkht hay js main hr nwda main zayada sy zayada do bchwn kay nwdas hawtay hayn۔، baien bchay aur dien bchay kay tawr par jana jata haay۔js trtyb main bchwn kay nwdas ka ahatmam kya jata hay woh bainry drkht ki khsawsayat ko mtasar krskta hay ، jesay bainry srch try ، aaywl try ، ya dahyr۔ bainry srch try (by ays ty): bainry srch try bainry drkht ki ayk ksm hay js mynnwda kay baien bchay main nwda sy kam akdar hawty hain ، aur dien bchay main nwda sy zayada akdar hawty hayn۔yha mwsar tlashy ، andraj aur hazaf karnay kay kamwn ko kabl bnata hay ، mtwazan drkhtwn kay liye O (lagh ayn) ki awsta wkt ki pychydghy kay sath۔ aay wy ayl drkht: ayk AVL (aydaylsn-wylsky aur lyndas) drkht ayk khud twazan bainry tlash ka drkht haay۔yha ykyny bnata hay keh kesi bhi nwda kay baien aur dien zayly hasaay ki awnchaiy zayada sy zayada ayk sy mkhtlf hawty haay۔yha mtwazan jaiydad mwsar tlash ، andraj ، aur hazaf karnay kay kamwn ko brkrar rkhnay main mdd krty hay ، js main O (lagh ayn) ki bdtryn wkt ki pychydghy hawty haay۔ ryda-blyk try: ayk srkh syaha drkht ayk aur khud twazan bainry tlash ka drkht haay۔yha kwaad wa zuwabta kay ayk syt ka astamal karty hoey twazan brkrar rkhta hay jo is bat ki zumant dyta hay keh drkht mtwazan rhata haay۔yha tlash ، andraj ، aur hazaf karnay kay l O O (lagh ayn) ki bdtryn wkt ki pychydghy kay sath mwsar aapryshn fraham krta haay۔ by try: ayk by try ayk khud twazan drkht ka dahanchha hay jo aam tawr par fail sstm aur dayta bys main astamal hawta haay۔yha bray mkdar main dayta ko snbhalnay kay liye dayzaain kya gaya hay aur tlash ، andraj aur hazaf karnay kay liye mwsar aapryshn fraham krta haay۔by trywn kay pas hr nwda main mtadd chabyan hawty hain aur bchwn kay nwdas ki mtghyr tadad ki ajazat dytay hayn۔yha un kay mshtrkha sabkha kay zaryaha chabyan ka ahatmam krta hay ، jo isy sabkha par mbny srch aapryshnza kay l efficient mwsar bnata haay۔kwshshyn aam tawr par khwdkar aur lght kay nfaza jesay ayply kyshnza main astamal hawty hayn۔ hayp: ayk hayp ayk khasa drkht par mbny dayta dahanchha hay jo dahyr ki praprty ko pora krta haay۔bainry ka dahyr ، khasa tawr par ، ayk mkml bainry drkht hay jahan hr nwda ki kdr is kay bchay kay nwdas ki akdar sy zayada ya is kay brabr (ya is sy kam ya is kay brabr) hawty haay۔dahyr aam tawr par trjyhay ktaarwn kay mwsar nfaza kay liye astamal hawtay hayn۔ yeh kuch aam tawr par mshhawr drkht hain ، jn main sy hr ayk apni mkhsawsa khsawsayat aur astamal kay maamlat kay sath haay۔drkht mkhtlf ayply kyshnza main astamal hony waly wrstail dayta dahanchay hain ، bshmwl fail sstm ، dayta bys ، nyt wrk rwtngh alghwrthm ، drjha bndy ki nmaindghy aur bohat kchh۔

Question: aap jawa askrpt main mtzuad tkrar ko kis tarah snbhaltay hayn؟wyw aaf lwp kay astamal ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: ayk trtyb shuda saf par bainry srch alghwrthm ko nafza karnay kay l you ، aap un akdamat par aml krsktay hayn: baltrtyb baien aur dien pwaintrza ko saf kay aaghaza aur akhttam par syt kryn۔ jab baien pwaintr dien pwaintr sy kam ya is kay brabr hay ، dharaiyn۔mndrjha zayl akdamat: a.drmyany andayks ka hasab baien aur dien pwaintrza ki awsta kay tawr par kryn: wsta = (baiyn + daiyn) / 2.b.mdal andayks ki kymt ko hadf ki kymt kay sath mwazanha kryn: agar drmyany kymt hadf kay brabr hay tou ، mdal andayks ko ntyjha kay tawr par waps kryn۔ agar drmyany kymt hadf sy zayada hay tou ، dien pwaintr ko wsta main ap dayt karain - 1.ifdrmyany kymt hadf sy kam hay ، baien pwaintr ko mda + par ap dayt kryn۔ayk "nhayn mla" asharay waps kryn۔ azaghr main nmwnha aml draamd haay: paiythwn kwpy kwda dayf bainry_sarch (aay aar aar ، hadf): baien = 0 dien = lyn (aay aar aar) - 1 jabky baien <= daiyn: drmyany = (baiyn + daiyn) //2 agar aar aar [wsta] == hadf: mda aylf aar aar [wsta] <hadf: baien = wsta + 1 awr: dien = wsta - 1 rytrn -1 # hadf nahin mila # msaal kay astamal: trtyb_r = [1 ، 3 ،5 ، 7 ، 9 ، 11 ، 13] hadf = 9 ryzawlt = bainry_srch (chhantya_aar ، hadf) agar ntyjha!{hadf} nahin mila ") is nfaza main ، bainry srch alghwrthm srny kay drmyany ansar kay sath hadf ki kymt ka mwazanha krta hay aur is kay mtaabk baien ya dien pwaintr ko ap dayt krkay tlash ki had ko nechay krta haay۔yha aml is wkt tak jary rhata hay jab tak keh hadf ki kymt nah mil jaye ya tlash ki had khtm hawjaiay۔bainry srch alghwrthm ki wkt ki pychydghy O (lagh ayn) hay ، jahan N trtyb shuda saf main anasar ki tadad hay ، kywnkha yeh bar bar tlash ki had ko aadhay hasaay main tksym krta haay۔

Question: jawa askrpt main yaddasht kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur yeh keh fnkshn par aml draamd ko bhatr bnanay kay liye kis tarah astamal kya jaskta haay۔
Answer: ayk traiy ، jsay ayk sabkha drkht bhi kaha jata hay ، drkhtwn ki tarah ka dayta dahanchha hay jo tar kay tawr par zakhyrha shuda chabyan ki mwsar bazayaft kay liye astamal hawta haay۔yha khasa tawr par strngh mmasal aur pryfks par mbny tlashy sy mtalk msail ko hal karnay kay liye mfyd haay۔"try" ki asatalaha "bazayaft" kay lfza sy aaty haay۔ ayk try main ، hr nwda ayk hi krdar ki nmaindghy krta haay۔nwdas ko ayk dusray kay sath drkht ki sakht bnanay kay liye mnslk kya jata hay ، jahan hr knaray klyd main ayk krdar ki nmaindghy krta haay۔jra sy kesi khasa nwda tak ka rastha kesi sabkha ya ayk mkml klyd ki nmaindghy krta haay۔ yahan try dayta dahanchay ki kuch klydy khsawsayat aur fwaid hayn: mwsar strngh bazayaft: strngh bazayaft kay kamwn main ayksl ki kwshsh krta haay۔ayk tar ko dykhtay hoey ، aap jldy sy yeh taay krsktay hain keh aya yeh try main mwjwd hay ya nhayn۔as sy yeh hajay ki janch pratal ، khud kar tarykay sy ، aur kesi lght main alfaza ki tlash jesay kamwn kay l useful mfyd haay۔aap ko try main woh tamam chabyan mil sakti hain jo dyiay gaye tar kay sath mshtrkha sabkha ka ashtrak krty hayn۔yha khasa tawr par khud kar tarykay sy faalyt ya kesi mkhsawsa sabkha kay sath alfaza ki tlash kay l useful mfyd haay۔ aspys ki karkrdghy: mkhtlf chabyan main mshtrkha sabkha bant kar jghha ko bhatr bnanay ki kwshsh krta haay۔as sy woh aysay mnzarnamwn main mwsar hawjatay hain jahan isi tarah kay sabkha kay sath bohat sy chabyan mwjwd hayn۔try ki khlaiy pychydghy ka anhasaar chabyan ki kal tadad kay bjaiay chabyan main mnfrd krdarwn ki tadad par haay۔ aardarda klydy bazayaft: kwshsh krta hay keh chabyan ki trtyb ko mhafwza rkhyn۔yha praprty lght kay lhaaza sy sab sy chhwty ya sab sy bray klyd ko tlash karnay ، trtyb shuda trtyb main chabyan ghnty ، ya kesi khasa had kay andr chabyan tlash karnay jesay kamwn ki ajazat dyty haay۔ fast andraj aur hazaf karnay ki kwshshyn: kwshshyn kyza kay liye mwsar andraj aur hazaf karnay kay kam fraham krty hayn۔an karrwaiywn kay liye wkt ki pychydghy aam tawr par klyd ki lmbaiy kay mtnasb hawty haay۔ try tghyrat: mkhsawsa zurwryat ki taiyd kay l additional kwshshwn ko azuafy khsawsayat kay sath brahaya jaskta haay۔msaalwn main kmprysda kwshshyn (jysay pytrysya ki kwshshyn ya rydaks kay drkht) shaml hain jo jghha ko mazeed bhatr bnatay hain ، trnry tlash karnay ki kwshsh krty hay jo zayada aam harfwn ko snbhalty hay ، ya hr klyd sy wabstha azuafy aadad wa shmar kay sath kwshsh krty haay۔ traiy ki aham tjart is ki jghha ki pychydghy hay ، jesa keh hawskta haay۔dwsray dayta dahanchay kay mkablay main zayada mymwry ki zurwrt hawty haay۔taham ، aysay mnzarnamwn kay liye jahan mwsar strngh ki bazayaft ، sabkha tlash ، ya aardar shuda klydy karwaiyan anthaaiy aham hain ، traiy aham fwaid fraham krty haay۔kwshshwn main srch anjn ، mrtb karnay waly ، hajay chykrs ، aai py rwtngh tyblza ، aur kesi bhi mnzar namay jesay ayply kyshnza main wsya pymanay par astamal kya jata hay js main tyza strngh mmasal ya sabkha par mbny aapryshn shaml hawta haay۔

Question: jawa askrpt main mkhtlf ksm ki ghltayan kya hayn؟aam ghltay ki aksam ki msaalyn fraham kryn۔
Answer: ayk hayp dayta dahanchha aam tawr par aysay mnzarnamwn main astamal hawta hay js main trjyhay ktaarwn kay mwsar antzaam ki zurwrt hawty hay ya zayada sy zayada ya kam sy kam ansar jld tlash karna hawta haay۔yhaan kuch aysay haalat hain jahan hayp dayta ka dahanchha khasa tawr par mfyd haay: trjyhay ktaar: trjyhay ktaar ko mwsar andaza main nafza karnay kay liye dahyr ka astamal kya jaskta haay۔trjyhay ktaar main ، anasar ki trjyhaat sy wabstha hain ، aur sab sy zayada (ya sab sy km) trjyhay ansar hamyshha ktaar kay samnay rhata haay۔dahyr par mbny trjyhay ktaar mwsar wkt (O (1)) ya lwghrthmk wkt (O (lagh (lagh (lagh (lagh (O (lagh (O (1)) main mwjwdha aaly (ya sab sy km) trjyhay ansar ki mwsar azuafay ، sab sy zayada (ya sab sy km) trjyhay ansar ko khtm karnay ، aur mwjwdha aaly (ya sab sy km) trjyhay ansar ki bazayaft ki ajazat dyty haay۔n)). chhant raha haay: haypswrt ayk jghha main ayk mwsar jghha chhntaiy karnay wala alghwrthm hay jo dahyr ka astamal krta haay۔yha un pt srny sy zayada sy zayada hayp (chrahaiy kay aardar kay liay) ya ayk kam hayp (nzawl aardar kay liay) bna kar aur dahyr sy zayada sy zayada (ya kam sy km) ansar ko bar bar nkal kar kam krta haay۔haypswrt main O (n lagh ayn) ki wkt ki pychydghy hawty hay aur khasa tawr par mfyd hawta hay jab mymwry ki jghha mhadwd hawty hay ya jab srny ka saiza bohat braa hawta haay۔ shydawlngh: aywnt sy chlnay wali nkaly ya shydawlngh sstm main ، ayk dahyr ko brkrar rkhnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haayan kay mkrrha wkt sy trtyb dyiay gaye wakaat ka mjmwaha۔aghlay wakaay par karrwaiy ki jaye gi js ko dahyr sy kam sy kam (ya zayada sy zayadha) ansar nkal kar mwsar andaza main bazayaft kya jaskta haay۔yha nktaha nzar is bat ko ykyny bnata hay keh wakaat par un kay taay shuda awkat ki trtyb main karrwaiy ki jati haay۔ ghraf alghwrthm: mkhtlf ghraf alghwrthm main dahyr astamal kyay jatay hain jn main kuch mayarat ki bnyad par aghlay amwdy ya ayj kay mwsar antkhab ki zurwrt hawty haay۔msaal kay tawr par ، ghraf main mkhtsar trien rastha tlash karnay kay liye dajkstra ka alghwrthm kam sy kam fasalay kay sath wrtyks ko mntkhb karnay kay liye ayk kam sy kam astamal krta haay۔km sy kam phylay hoey drkht ki tamyr kay liye praim ka alghwrthm bhi kam sy kam wzan waly knaray ko mntkhb karnay kay liye dahyr ka astamal krta haay۔ mymwry mynjmnt: mthark tawr par mkhtsa mymwry ko mwsar andaza main mnzam karnay kay liye mymwry mkhtsa nzaam main dahyr astamal kyay jatay hayn۔as tnazar main ، dahyr sy mrad yaddasht kay khtaay hain jahan sy mymwry kay blaks ko mkhtsa kya jata hay aur zurwrt kay mtaabk un ko zuaia kya jata haay۔hayp dayta dahanchha mkhtsa aur mft blaks kay baray main malwmat ko brkrar rkhta hay ، js sy mwsar mkhtsa aur dayl lwkyshn kay kamwn ki ajazat mlty haay۔ yeh un haalat ki sirf chnd msaalyn hain jahan hayp dayta ka dahanchha faidha mnd haay۔jb bhi aap ko trjyhaat ka mwsar andaza main antzaam karnay ki zurwrt ho ، zayada sy zayada ya kam sy kam ansar mntkhb karain ، ya aywnt kay shydawlngh ، chhantnay ، ya ghraf alghwrthm sy mtalk msail ko hal karain ، tou ayk dahyr par ghwr karnay ka ayk taaktwr zaryaha hawskta haay۔

Question: aap jawa askrpt main kwkyza ko kis tarah snbhaltay hayn؟dstawyza kay astamal ki wzuahat kryn۔ kwky praprty aur kwky hayra phyry kay tarykwn۔
Answer: mthark prwghramngh ayk msilay ko hal karnay ki ayk tknyk hay jo pychydha msail ko hal karnay kay liye astamal ki jati hay takha un ko twra daalyn aur sirf ayk bar hr zayly msilay ko hal kya jaskay۔yha awwrlypngh astrkchrza kay sath msail ko mwsar hal karnay ، bay kar kmpywtwn ko khtm karnay aur karkrdghy ko bhatr bnanay ki ajazat dyta haay۔ mthark prwghramngh kay pychhay klydy khyal yeh hay keh chhwtay chhwtay prwblwn ko hal krkay aur braay msilay kay hal kay l these un zayly prwblwn kay hal ka astamal kryn۔zayly msail kay hal aam tawr par kesi tybl ya mymwizayshn srny main mhafwza kyay jatay hain ، js sy aasany sy tlash aur dwbarha astamal ki jaskty haay۔ daainymk prwghramngh main drj zayl akdamat shaml hayn: msilha ki nshandhay kryn: msilay ko smjhyn aur is bat ka tayn karain keh aya yeh mthark prwghramngh kay liye mwzawn khsawsayat ki nmaish krta haay۔an msail jn main zayada sy zayada sakht aur awwrlypngh sab prwblwbl shaml hain woh mthark prwghramngh kay liye achhay amydwar hayn۔ tkrar kay rshtay ko tshkyl dyn: msilay ko chhwtay chhwtay mzuamyn main twra dyn aur sab prwblwblza kay hal kay lhaaza sy braay msilay kay hal ka azahaar kryn۔as tkrar ka rshtha braay msilay aur is kay zayly prwblwblza kay mabyn talkat ki wzuahat krta haay۔ bnyady maamlat ki wzuahat kryn: aasan trien zayly mshklat ki nshandhay karain jo baghair kesi khraby kay braha rast hal hawsktay hayn۔yha bnyady maamlat hal ko brahanay kay liye tkrar ya nktaha aghaza kay liye khtm hony ki haalt fraham karty hayn۔ hal nechay ya upar sy nechay ki tamyr: mthark prwghramngh ko nechay ya tap daawn nktaha nzar ka astamal karty hoey nafza kya jaskta haay۔ bwtwmap aprwch (tkrary): bys maamlat sy zayly msail ko hal karna shrwa karain aur mtalwbha hal tak phanchnay tak braay zayly msail ko hal krkay hal ko brahaؤ۔zayly khtawta۔bay kar kmpywtyshn sy bchnay kay liye mymwizayshn srny ya tybl main zayly khtawn kay hal zakhyrha kryn۔ksy zayly prwbl ko hal karnay sy pehlay ، chyk karain keh aya is ka hal pehlay hi tybl main dstyab hay ya nhayn۔aghr aysa hay tou ، zakhyrha shuda hal ko dwbarha tshkyl denay kay bjaiay astamal kryn۔ hal ko hal kryn: ayk bar jab tamam mtalkha zayly khtawn kay hal ki ghnty ki jaye tou ، asal msilay ka hatmy hal mymwzaaizayshn tybl ya nechay ki ghnty kay ntyjay main nkala jaskta haay۔mthark prwghramngh un msail ko hal karnay main karaamd hay jo awwrlypngh sab prwblwblza ki nmaish karty hain ، js sy bwly tkrar karnay waly nktaha nzar kay mkablay main karkrdghy main nmayan bhatry ki ajazat mlty haay۔yha aam tawr par mkhtlf shabwn main astamal hawta hay jesay alghwrthm dayzaain ، asalaha ، amtzaaj ، nzaam alawkat ، wsail ki mkhtsa ، aur bohat sy dusray msilay waly dawmynza۔mthark prwghramngh alghwrthm ki msaalwn main fbwnyky tslsl ki ghnty ، mkhtsar trien rastha alghwrthm ، nypsyk msilha ، aur bohat kuch shaml hayn۔

Question: jawa askrpt main == aur === aaprytrza kay darmiyan kya frk haay؟frk ko wazuha karnay kay liye msaalyn fraham kryn۔
Answer: chwraaiy ki pehli tlash (by ayf ays) aur ghharaiy sy pehlay tlash (day ayf ays) ghraf main nwdas ki khwj ya tlash kay liye astamal hony waly do mshhawr ghraf trawrsl alghwrthm hayn۔by ayf ays aur day ayf ays kay mabyn aham akhtlafat un ki hakmt amlywn main nwdas aur is trtyb main hain js main woh ghraf ki khwj karty hayn۔ brydary frst frst srch (by ayf ays): by ayf ays kesi dyiay gaye makhza sy shrwa hony waly ghraf ko staha kay lhaaza sy tlash krta haay۔ghhary stahawn ka dwrha karnay sy pehlay nwda aur bahar ki taraf apnay prawsy nwdas ki taraf jana۔ yeh nwda ayksplwryshn ki trtyb ko brkrar rkhnay kay liye ayk ktaar kay dayta dahanchay ka astamal krta haay۔ by ayf ays aghly staha par janay sy pehlay mwjwdha staha par tamam nwdas ka dwrha krta haay۔ghhary staha par nwdas sy pehlay mlahazaha kya jata hay ، js kay ntyjay main chwraaiy ki pehli rysrch pytrn hawta haay۔ by ayf ays baghair wzan waly ghraf main mkhtsar trien rastha tlash karnay kay liye mwzawn hay kywnkha yeh makhza sy fasalay kay brahtay hoey trtyb main nwdas ki khwj krta haay۔ by ayf ays ka ptha lghanay kay liye bhi astamal kya jaskta haay۔ksy ghraf main ya kesi ghair hadayt shuda ghraf kay mnslk ajzaaa ko tlash karnay kay liay۔ by ayf ays ki wkt ki pychydghy O (v + e) hay ، jahan v amwdy ki tadad hay aur E ghraf main knarwn ki tadad haay۔day ayf ays): day ayf ays nay byk trykngh sy pehlay hr shakh kay sath jahan tak mmkn ho trywrngh krkay ghraf ki khwj ky۔ is main nwdas ko tlash karnay kay liye tryk (ya tkrar) ka astamal kya jata haay۔ghraf ki ayk shakh jab tak kryb trien ghair tlash shuda nwda par byk tryk karnay sy pehlay kesi ptay kay nwda tak nahin phanchty۔ day ayf ays rastwn ki tlash aur aysay hal tlash karnay kay liye mfyd hay js main ghraf kay dahanchay main ghhary tlash karna shaml hawta haay۔ yeh sab sy kam raha ki zumant nahin dy sakta hay kywnkha yeh pehlay ghhary staha ki khwj krta haay۔day ayf ays ka astamal is bat ka tayn karnay kay liye kya jaskta hay keh aya do nwdas kay mabyn koi rastha mwjwd hay ، kesi chkr kay wjwd ki janch pratal kay liye ، ya kesi drkht ya ghraf ko abwr karnay kay liay۔ day ayf ays ki wkt ki pychydghy bhi O (V + E) hay ، jahan V haayamwdy aur ay ki tadad ghraf main knarwn ki tadad haay۔ khlasaha۔ by ayf ays ghraf ki staha ko staha kay lhaaza sy tlash krta hay ، jabky day ayf ays hr shakh kay sath ghhary ghraf ki khwj krta haay۔by ayf ays ghair wzan waly ghraf main mkhtsar trien rastay ki zumant dyta hay aur mnslk ajzaaa ki tlash jesay ayply kyshnza kay liye mfyd hay ، jabky day ayf ays rastwn ki tlash aur saiyklwn kay wjwd ko janchnay kay liye mwzawn haay۔by ayf ays aur day ayf ays kay darmiyan antkhab mkhsawsa msilay aur drkhwast ki zurwryat par mnhasar haay۔

mymwraizayshn ayk aysy tknyk hay jo mthark prwghramngh main astamal hawty hay takha mhanghay fnkshn kalwn ki ghnty ko bhatr bnanay kay liye un kay ntaij ko bhatr bnaya jaskay aur jab wahi un pt dwbarha hawta hay tou un ko dwbarha astamal karty hoey un ka dwbarha astamal karty hayn۔as main aadad wa shmar kay dahanchay main fnkshn kalza kay ntaij ko zakhyrha karna shaml hay ، aam tawr par kesi srny ya haysh tybl main ، takha isi aadanwn kay sath bad main aanay wali kalyn is ko dwbarha tshkyl denay kay bjaiay braha rast pyshghy ntyjha bazayaft krskyn۔ mthark prwghramngh kay tnazar main ، mymwraizayshn aam tawr par hawty haay۔recursive alghwrthm kay sath astamal kya jata hay jo awwrlypngh sab prwblwblza ki nmaish karty hayn۔as sy hal shuda zayly msail kay ntaij ko zakhyrha krkay aur hr bar jab un ka samna karna prata hay is ki dwbarha ghnty karnay ki bjaiay un ko tlash karnay main bay kar kmpywtwn ko khtm karnay main mdd mlty haay۔ yahan keh mymwry ko aam tawr par mthark prwghramngh main kis tarah astamal kya jata haay: zayly prwblwn ki shnakht kryn: is msilay ko chhwtay chhwtay zayly khtawn main twra dyn jo awwrlypngh ki nmaish karty hayn۔khsawsayatyha zayly khtawta isi msilay ki chhwty chhwty msaalwn main hony chahaiyn۔ mymwaizayshn kay aadad wa shmar kay dahanchay ki wzuahat kryn: hal shuda zayly prwblza kay ntaij ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye dayta dahanchha ، jesay srny ya haysh tybl ko trtyb dyn۔fnkshn ya sab prwblwbl kay aadanwn kay zaryaha is dahanchay ko trtyb diya jana chahaiay ya is ki klyd ki jany chahaiay۔ tkrar karnay wali tkryb: ayk bar bar chlnay wala fnkshn lkhyn jo hr zayly prwbl ko hal krta hay aur ntaij ko zakhyrha karnay aur bazayaft karnay kay liye mymwaizayshn ka astamal krta haay۔ksy zayly prwbl ki ghnty sy pehlay ، chyk karain keh aya is ka ntyjha pehlay sy hi mymwraizayshn kay dahanchay main mwjwd hay ya nhayn۔aghr aysa hay tou ، zakhyrha shuda ntyjha ko dwbarha tshkyl denay kay bjaiay waps kryn۔ bys kysza ko rwknay kay bjaiay: bys mkdmat ki wzuahat karain ya tkrar kay liye shraita khtm kryn۔yha aam tawr par sab sy chhwty zayly msail hain jo mazeed khraby kay baghair braha rast hal ki jaskty hayn۔an kay ntaij ko mymwraizayshn kay dahanchay main bhi astwr kryn۔ tkrar karnay wali tkryb ko shaml kryn: asal msilay kay aadanwn kay sath tkrar karnay waly fnkshn ka mtaalbha karain ، js sy is sy chhwtay chhwtay mzuamyn ko bar bar hal krkay msilay ko hal kya jaskay۔jb dstyab ho tou fnkshn bay kar kmpywtwn sy bchnay aur pehlay sy mwjwd ntaij ko bazayaft karnay kay liye mymwaizayshn ka astamal kray gha۔ mymwizayshn bay kar kmpywtyshn ko khtm krkay mthark prwghramngh alghwrthm ki wkt ki pychydghy ko kam karnay main mdd krta haay۔ntaij kychngh aur dwbarha astamal karnay sy ، yeh mjmway karkrdghy ko nmayan tawr par bhatr bna sakta hay ، khasa tawr par jab msilha awwrlypngh astrkchrza ki nmaish krta haay۔ yeh bat aham hay keh yaddasht mthark prwghramngh kay liye mkhsawsa nahin hay aur dusray syak wa sbak main bhi is ka atalak hawskta haay۔yha ayk aam tknyk hay jo kesi bhi mhanghay ya bar bar fnkshn kalwn ki ghnty ko bhatr bnanay kay liye astamal hawty hay jo un kay ntaij ko astwr krkay aur dwbarha astamal krkay astamal krty haay۔taham ، yeh khasa tawr par mthark prwghramngh main faidha mnd hay kywnkha is ki wjha sy awwrlypngh sab prwblwblza ko mؤsar tarykay sy snbhalnay ki salahayt haay۔

Question: aap jawa askrpt main mtzuad tkrar ko kis tarah snbhaltay hayn؟wyw aaf lwp kay astamal ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: ykyna!ayk srkh rngh ka drkht ayk khud mtwazan bainry srch drkht hay jo khsawsayat kay ayk syt ko nafza krkay twazan ko brkrar rkhta haay۔as ka nam drkht main hr nwda ko tfwyzu krdha rngh kay nam par rakha gaya haay: srkh ya syaha۔srkh rngh kay drkht ki khsawsayat mndrjha zayl hayn: hr nwda ya tou srkh ya syaha hawta haay۔ jra ka nwda hamyshha syaha hawta haay۔ hr pty (kal) nwda syaha haay۔ agar nwda srkh hay tou ، is kay dono bchay syaha hayn۔ hr rastha۔nwda sy is ki awlad pty nwdas main syaha nwdas ki msawy tadad hawty haay۔as praprty ko blyk awnchaiy praprty ya blyk bylns kaha jata haay۔ un khsawsayat par aml pyra hony kay bad ، ayk srkh rngh ka drkht is bat ko ykyny bnata hay keh jra sy kesi bhi ptay tak ka lmba trien rastha mkhtsar trien rastay ki lmbaiy sy dwghna nahin hawta hay ، js kay ntyjay main mtwazan hawta haay۔drkht۔ srkh rngh kay drkht par anjam dyiay gaye aapryshn ، jesay andraj aur hazaf karna ، drkht ki khsawsayat ko brkrar rkhna shaml haay۔yhaan yeh ayk mkhtsar jaizaha hay keh yeh aapryshn kis tarah kam karty hayn: andraj: niay nwdas ko abtdaiy tawr par ryda nwdas kay tawr par dakhl kya jata haay۔ is kay bad ، agar kesi jaiydad ki khlaf wrzay hawty hay tou ، twazan ko bhaal karnay aur talkat ko brkrar rkhnay kay liye drkhtwn ki ghrdsh aur rngh ki tbdylyan laghw hawty hayn۔nwdas kay darmiyan ، mkhtlf maamlat pyda hawsktay hain js main twazan brkrar rkhnay kay liye mkhsawsa ghrdsh aur rngh ki tbdylywn ki zurwrt hawty haay۔ zakhyrha: jab nwda ko hazaf kya jata hay tou ، isy ya tou apnay pysh rw ya janshyn nwda kay sath tbdyl kya jata haay۔ andraj kay aml ki wjha sy ، agar kesi bhi khsawsayat ki khlaf wrzay ki jati hay tou ، ghrdshwn ki khlaf wrzay hawty haay۔twazan ko bhaal karnay kay liye rnghyn tbdylyan ki jati hayn۔ hazaf kay doran mkhtlf maamlat pyda hawsktay hain ، jesay kesi syaha nwda ko hazaf karna ، js main praprtyza ko brkrar rkhnay kay liye azuafy aydajstmnt ki zurwrt praskty haay۔ srkh rngh kay drkht main ghrdsh ki karrwaiywn main aydajst krkay twazan brkrar rkhnay main mdd mlty haay۔nwdas ki pwzayshnyn۔ghrdsh ki do aksam hayn: baien ghrdsh: is main is ki asal pwzayshn ka baien bchha bnnay kay liye apnay dien bchay ki pwzayshn sy nwda mntkl karna shaml haay۔as sy drkht ko mtwazan karnay main mdd mlty hay jab dien sab try baien sab try sy lmba hawjaty haay۔ rait ghrdsh: is main is ki asal pwzayshn ka dien bchha bnnay kay liye apnay baien bchay ki pwzayshn sy nwda mntkl karna shaml haay۔as sy drkht ko mtwazan karnay main mdd mlty hay jab baien sab try dien sab try sy lmba hawjaty haay۔ ghrdshwn aur rngh ki tbdylyan anjam denay kay sath sath ، andraj aur hazaf karnay kay doran ، ayk srkh rngh ka drkht twazan brkrar rkhta hay aur mwsar tlash ، andraj aur hazaf karnay ki karrwaiywn ko ykyny bnata haay۔srkh rngh kay drkht main un karrwaiywn kay liye bdtryn wkt ki pychydghy O (lagh ayn) hay ، jahan drkht main nwdas ki tadad haay۔ nechay syaha drkht aam tawr par mkhtlf ayply kyshnza main astamal hawtay hain jn main mwsar aur mtwazan tlash kay drkhtwn ki zurwrt hawty haay۔، jesay un mymwry dayta bys ، zaban kay mrtb karnay waly ، aur dayta dahanchay jesay syt ، nkshay ، aur wkfha kay drkht۔

Question: jawa askrpt main mkhtlf ksm ki ghltayan kya hayn؟aam ghltay ki aksam ki msaalyn fraham kryn۔
Answer: trjyhay ktaar ayk tjrydy dayta ki ksm hay jo anasar ka mjmwaha mhafwza krty hay ، hr ayk trjyha sy wabstha haay۔trjyha mjmwaha kay andr kesi ansar ki nsbt ki ahamyt ya ajlt ki nshandhay krty haay۔aaly trjyha kay haaml anasar ko zayada aham smjha jata hay aur kam trjyha waly anasar sy pehlay bazayaft ya is par karrwaiy ki jati haay۔ trjyhay ktaar kay zaryaha taawn yaftha aham karwaiyan yeh hayn: andraj: ansar ki trjyha ki bnyad par aardar ko brkrar rkhtay hoey trjyhay ktaar main ansar shaml krta haay۔nya ansar mnasb pwzayshn main rakha gaya hay takha yeh ykyny bnaya jaskay keh aaly trjyha kay haaml anasar ktaar kay samnay kay kryb hayn۔ lalch: yeh ansar ko trjyhay ktaar sy aaly trjyha kay sath hatata hay aur waps krta haay۔aaly trjyha wala ansar aam tawr par ktaar kay samnay waka hawta haay۔ mkhtlf aadad wa shmar kay dahanchay ka astamal karty hoey trjyhay ktaar nafza ki jaskty hay ، lekin do aam tawr par astamal hony waly nfaza yeh hayn: bainry hayp: ayk bainry hayp ayk mkml bainry drkht hay jo hayp praprty ko pora krta haay۔bainry dahyr main ، waldyn nwda ki trjyha hamyshha apnay bchwn ki trjyhaat sy zayada ya is kay brabr hawty haay۔yha praprty is bat ko ykyny bnaty hay keh aaly trjyhay ansar dahyr ki jra main waka haay۔bainry dahyrwn ko mؤsar tarykay sy arywn kay tawr par nafza kya jaskta haay۔ mtwazan srch drkht: mtwazan srch drkht ، jesay srkh rngh ka drkht ya aay wy ayl drkht ، trjyhay ktaar ko nafza karnay kay liye bhi astamal kya jaskta haay۔anasar drkht main drkht kay mtwazan dahanchay ko brkrar rkhtay hoey mwsar dakhl karnay aur hazaf karnay ki karrwaiywn ki ajazat dytay hayn۔ aml draamd ka antkhab drkhwast ki mkhsawsa zurwryat par mnhasar haay۔bainry hayps aam tawr par bnyady karrwaiywn jesay andraj aur hazaf (O (lagh ayn)) kay liye bhatr wkt ki pychydghy fraham karty hain ، jabky mtwazan tlash kay drkht O (lagh ayn) wkt main ansar ki tlash jesay zayada lchk aur azuafy aapryshn fraham karty hayn۔mkhtlf ayply kyshnza jahan anasar ko apni trjyhaat ki bnyad par karrwaiy karnay ki zurwrt haay۔kchh msaalwn main task shydawlngh ، aywnt sy chlnay wali nkaly ، ghraf alghwrthm (jysay ، dajkstra ka alghwrthm) ، dayta kmpryshn alghwrthm (jysay ، haf myn kwdangh) ، aur wsail mkhtsa alghwrthm shaml hayn۔trjyhay ktaaryn trjyhaat kay mwsar antzaam ki ajazat dyty hain aur is bat ko ykyny bnaty hain keh pehlay aaly trjyhay anasar par amldraamd kya jaye ، js sy mwsar aur bhatr msilay ko hal karnay main mdd mlay۔

Question: jawa askrpt main yaddasht kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur yeh keh fnkshn par aml draamd ko bhatr bnanay kay liye kis tarah astamal kya jaskta haay۔
Answer: blbla trtyb wala alghwrthm ayk sadha chhantnay wala alghwrthm hay jo bar bar fharst main kdm rkhta hay ، mlhakha anasar ka mwazanha krta hay ، aur agar woh ghalat trtyb main hain tou un ko tbdyl krta haay۔as aml ko is wkt tak dharaya jata hay jab tak keh fharst trtyb nah di jaiay۔yhaan aap sywdawkwda main blbla trtyb waly alghwrthm ko kis tarah nafza krsktay hayn: vbnetcopy kwda prwsydawr blblswrt (fharst) n: = lmbaiy (fharst) 0 sy N-1 sy J kay liye 0 sy N-1-I tak agar fharst [j]> fharst [J+1] phir tbadlha (fharst [j] ، fharst [j+1]) akhttam kay akhttam par akhttam par aml kay akhttam par alghwrthm ka ayk mrhalha bha kdm khraby: anasar ki ghair trtyb shuda fharst kay sath shrwa kryn۔fharst N-1 bar ، jahan N fharst ki lmbaiy haay۔as bat ko ykyny bnata hay keh hr ayk tkrar main fharst kay aakhr tak sab sy braa ansar "blbl" bnata haay۔ hr tkrar main ، fharst kay aaghaza sy shrwa hony waly mlhakha anasar ka mwazanha kryn۔aghr mwjwdha ansar aghlay ansar sy zayada hay tou ، un ko tbdyl kryn۔ mlhakha anasar kay hr jwraay kay liye fharst kay akhttam tak is aml ko tbdyl kryn۔ hr tkrar kay bad ، sab sy braay ansar ko fharst kay aakhr main hony ki zumant di jati haay۔ un par aml kryn۔tkrarat jab tak pori fharst ko trtyb nahin diya jata haay۔ blbla trtyb waly alghwrthm ki wkt ki pychydghy O (n^2) hay ، jahan fharst main anasar ki tadad haay۔yha bray fharstwn kay l it isy ghair mwsar bna dyta haay۔taham ، blblay ki tarah ko smjhnay aur is par aml draamd karnay kay liye aasan hony ka faidha haay۔ nwt: amly tawr par ، blbla ki tarah ki karkrdghy ki wjha sy bray fharstwn ko chhantnay kay liye shaza wa nadr hi astamal kya jata haay۔zayadha mwsar trtyb denay waly alghwrthm jesay fwry trtyb ، anzumam ki trtyb ، ya dahyr trtyb ko braay daytasyts kay liye trjyha di jati haay۔

Question: aap jawa askrpt main kwkyza ko kis tarah snbhaltay hayn؟dstawyza kay astamal ki wzuahat kryn۔ kwky praprty aur kwky hayra phyry kay tarykwn۔
Answer: ayk wahad mnslk fharst aur dwghna mnslk fharst kay darmiyan bnyady frk hr nwda kay pas mwjwd hawalwn ki tadad main haay۔an dono ka mwazanha yahan haay: akylay lnkda lst: wahad mnslk fharst main hr nwda main do fyldaza shaml hayn: fharst main aghlay nwda ka dayta aur ayk hawalha (ya pwaintr)۔ nwdas ghair mstkym andaza main jraay hoey hain ، jahan hr nwda pwaintsaghlay nwda pr۔ fharst main aakhry nwda NULL ki taraf asharha krta hay ، fharst kay akhttam ki nshandhay krta haay۔ fharst ko aaghay brahana sirf ayk aaghay ki smt main kya jaskta hay ، sr (phalay nwda) sy shrwa hawta hay ۔mshar aur hazaf karnay ki karrwaiyyn hawskty hayn۔fharst kay aaghaza ya akhttam par mwsar andaza main karkrdghy ka mzaaharha kya ، lekin woh wsta main kam mwsar hain kywnkha is ko sr sy sfr karnay ki zurwrt hawty haay۔ bray had tak mnslk fharstwn ko dwghna mnslk fharstwn kay mkablay main kam mymwry ki zurwrt hawty hay kywnkha woh sirf ayk hi hawalha fy nwda ko astwr karty hayn۔fharstyn kam wsail ko nafza karnay aur astamal karnay kay liye aasan hayn۔ dawly sy mnslk fharst: dwghna mnslk fharst main hr nwda main tyn fyldaza shaml hayn: dayta ، aghlay nwda ka hawalha ، aur pchhlay nwda ka hawalha۔ nwdas do tarfha andaza main jraay hoey hain ،jhaan hr nwda kay pas aghlay aur pchhlay dono nwdas ka hawalha hawta haay۔ pehla nwda ka pchhla hawalha aur aakhry nwda ka aghla hawalha nwl sy hawta hay ، js main fharst ki hadwd ki nshandhay hawty haay۔ fharst ko aaghay brahana aaghay aur psmandha dono smtwn main kya jaskta hay ، js ki ajazat di jaskty haay۔anasar tak rsaiy main lchk kay l .۔ fharst main kesi bhi pwzayshn par dakhl aur hazaf karnay ki karrwaiywn ko mwsar andaza main anjam diya jaskta hay kywnkha pchhlay aur aghlay hawalwn sy hamsayha nwdas main aasany sy trmym karnay ki ajazat haay۔akylay lnkda fharstwn kay mkablay main mymwry sy mtalk۔akylay lnkda fharstyn aksar aasan mnzarnamwn kay liye kafy hawty hain jahan sirf farwrda trawrsl ki zurwrt hawty hay aur mymwry ki karkrdghy ayk tshwysh haay۔dwghna mnslk fharstyn afzul hain jab psmandha trywrsl ، wsta main mwsar andraj/hazaf karnay ، ya is sy zayada jdyd karrwaiywn ki zurwrt hawty hay ، mymwry kay thwraa sa astamal aur azuafy pychydghy ki kymt pr۔

Question: jawa askrpt main == aur === aaprytrza kay darmiyan kya frk haay؟frk ko wazuha karnay kay liye msaalyn fraham kryn۔
Answer: haysh tybl main kesi ansar ki tlash main wkt ki pychydghy ka anhasaar mkhsawsa nfaza aur tsaadm ki mwjwdghy par hawta haay۔awsta sawrt main ، ayk achhy tarah sy tksym shuda haysh fnkshn aur kam bwjh ansar kay sath ، haysh tybl main tlash karnay ki wkt ki pychydghy O (1) ، ya mstkl wkt haay۔ yahan tlash karna ayk khraby hay keh aam tawr par haysh tybl main kis tarah kam krta haay:js ansar ki tlash ki jaye is ki klyd haysh fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey haysh ki jati haay۔haysh fnkshn haysh tybl kay bnyady srny dahanchay main andayks ki klyd ka nkshha bnata haay۔ agar koi tsaadm nahin hawta hay (yany ayk hi andayks main ayk sy zayada chabyan mypngh karty hayn) tou ، mtalwbha ansar kmpywtda andayks par paya jata haay۔tsaadm hain ، un ko hal karnay kay liye azuafy akdamat ki zurwrt haay: alf۔ayk alyhadha zanjyrwn kay tsaadm ki krardad kay tarykha kar main ، srny kay hr andayks main ayk mnslk fharst ya kuch aur dayta dahanchha hawta hay js main mtadd anasar hawtay hain jo ayk hi andayks main shaml hawtay hayn۔as maamlay main ، mtalwbha ansar ko tlash karnay kay liye lnkda fharst main ayk lkyry tlash ya koi aur mwsar srch aapryshn anjam diya jata haay۔lnkda fharst main tlash ki wkt ki pychydghy aam tawr par O (K) hawty hay ، jahan K fy andayks daat by kay anasar ki awsta tadad hawty haay۔khlay aam tsaadm kay hal kay tarykwn (jysay lkyry thakykat ، chwkwr thakykat ، ya dabl hayshngh) main ، tlash jary rhaty hay jab tak keh kesi pehlay sy taay shuda alghwrthm ki bnyad par aghlay dstyab andayks ki janch pratal ki jati hay jab tak keh mtalwbha ansar nahin mil jata ya khaly slat ka samna nahin hawta haay۔khlay aam khtaab karnay kay tarykwn main tlash ki wkt ki pychydghy ka anhasaar mkhsawsa thakykat alghwrthm aur haysh tybl kay bwjh ansar par hawta haay۔km bwjh ansar kay sath ، bhatryn sawrthaal main ، tlash O (1) kay kryb hawskty haay۔taham ، bdtryn sawrt main ، jab bwjh ka ansar zayada hawta hay aur bohat sari thakykat ki zurwrt hawty hay tou ، wkt ki pychydghy O (n) kay kryb aaskty hay ، jahan haysh tybl main anasar ki tadad hawty haay۔ayk haysh tybl main ، ayk achhy tarah sy tksym shuda haysh fnkshn aur kam bwjh ansar ko frzu karty hoey ، O (1) haay۔taham ، tsaadm ki mwjwdghy aur tsaadm kay hal kay mkhsawsa tarykha kar par ghwr karna zurwry hay ، kywnkha woh bdtryn wkt ki pychydghy ko mtasar krsktay hayn۔

Question: jawa askrpt main prwtw taip aabjykt kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur yeh kis tarah aabjykt wrasat kay liye astamal hawta haay۔
Answer: ayk srklr bfr ، jsay srklr ktaar ya rngh bfr kay nam sy bhi jana jata hay ، ayk dayta dahanchha hay jo ayk srklr ، mslsl astwryj ayrya kay tawr par ayk mkrrha saiza ka bfr astamal krta haay۔as ko ayk mkrrha salahayt aur do pwaintrza kay sath ayk saf kay tawr par nafza kya jata hay ، ayk bfr (samnay) kay aaghaza ki taraf asharha krta hay aur dusra bfr (akby) kay akhttam ki taraf asharha krta haay۔ srklr bfr ki klydy khsawsayat aur fwaid mndrjha zayl hayn۔: lpytnay wala slwk: srklr bfr jab bfr kay akhttam tak phanch jata hay tou is kay ghrd lpyt jata hay ، mؤsar tarykay sy ayk srklr ya chkrmk nwayt pyda krta haay۔as ka mtalb yeh hay keh agar akby pwaintr bfr kay akhttam tak phanch jata hay tou ، yeh bfr kay aaghaza tak lpytta hay ، js sy dstyab jghha kay mwsar astamal ki ajazat mlty haay۔srklr bfr mstkl wkt (O (1)) main bfr kay saiza sy ktaa nzar anjam diya jaskta haay۔yha mmkn hay kywnkha lpytay hoey slwk sy anasar ki mhanghy tbdyly ki zurwrt khtm hawjaty haay۔ kabl jghha jghha kay astamal: lkyry bfrza ya safwn kay braks ، ayk srklr bfr kesi bhi slat ko zuaia kyay baghair dstyab jghha ko mwsar andaza main astamal krskta haay۔yha khasa tawr par aysay mnzarnamwn main mfyd hay jahan bfr ka saiza taay hawta hay ، aur jab bfr mkml hawta hay tou kdym trien anasar awwr rait hawjatay hayn۔as sy woh mymwry sy mjsm mahawl kay l suitable mwzawn bnatay hain jahan mthark mymwry ki mkhtsa mhadwd hay ya mtalwbha nahin haay۔ astrymngh aur ryil taim ayply kyshnza kay liye astamal shdha: srklr bfr aam tawr par aysay mnzarnamwn main astamal hawtay hain jahan dayta ko mstkl tawr par karrwaiy ya astrym karnay ki zurwrt hawty haay۔wha mkhtlf nrkhwn aur saiza kay dayta astrymza ko snbhalnay kay l well mnasb hain ، js sy mwsar bfrngh aur prwsysngh ki ajazat mlty haay۔ aasanyan: srklr bfrza ko amly jamha phananay aur smjhnay kay liye nsbta simple aasan hay ، js main sirf srny asharyha sazay aur pwaintr hayra phyry kay bnyady alm ki zurwrt hawty haay۔mkhtlf dawmynza ، bshmwl aymbydada sstm ، ryil taim dayta prwsysngh ، aadayw aur wydayw astrymngh ، nyt wrk prwtwkwl ، aur bohat kchh۔wha dayta kay bhaaؤ ko snbhalnay aur dayta kay mstkl slslwn ki hamwar prwsysngh ki shawlt fraham karnay kay liye ayk mwsar aur kabl aatmad tarykha fraham karty hayn۔

Question: aap jawa askrpt main mtzuad tkrar ko kis tarah snbhaltay hayn؟wyw aaf lwp kay astamal ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: mtwazan tlash kay drkhtwn kay tnazar main ، sst lwdangh sy mrad ayk aysy tknyk hay jahan nwda kay aadad wa shmar ya kdr ki asal ghnty ya bazayaft is wkt tak mwkhr krdy jati hay jab tak keh is ki wazuha tawr par drkhwast nah ki jaiay۔tamyr ya azuafay kay doran drkht main tamam nwdas kay liye akdar ko pysh karnay aur zakhyrha karnay kay bjaiay ، akdar sirf is wkt bhry hui ya hasab ki jati hain jab zurwry haw۔ lyzay lwdangh khasa tawr par mnzarnamwn main mfyd saabt hawskty hay jahan nwda ki kymt ki ghnty ya bazayaft mhangha ya wsail haay۔ghharyjb tak is ki zurwrt nah ho is wkt tak lwdangh ko mwkhr karnay sy ، ghair zurwry kmpywtyshn ya bazayaftwn sy bcha jaskta hay ، mmknha tawr par wkt aur wsail ki bcht hawty haay۔ jab sst lwdangh ko mtwazan srch drkht par lghaya jata hay ، jesay AVL drkht ya srkh syaha drkht ، main nwdasdrkht aam tawr par asal kdr ko braha rast zakhyrha karnay kay bjaiay klyd aur kdr kay hawalay sy zakhyrha krta haay۔nwda sy wabstha kdr sirf is wkt haasal ki jati hay ya is ki ghnty ki jati haay۔ yahan mtwazan srch drkht main sst lwdangh kay tsawr ko wazuha karnay kay liye ayk msaal ka mnzar haay: frzu kyj. hamary pas mtwazan srch try hay jo talbaa kay baray main malwmat ko mhafwza krta hay ، jahan hr nwda taalb alm ki nmaindghy krta haay۔awr taalb alm ki shnakht (klyd) aur taalb alm kay ghryda (wylyw) ko astwr krta haay۔ drkht ki tamyr karty wkt tamam talbaa kay drjat ko lwda karnay aur astwr karnay kay baray main ، hum sst lwdangh ka astamal karty hayn۔har nwda main sirf taalb alm kay drjat ka hawalha hawta hay ، bjaiay is kay keh asal ghryda kay bjaiay۔ jab drkht par tlash ya bazayaft ka kam anjam diya jata hay ، aur ayk mkhsawsa taalb alm kay drjat ki drkhwast ki jati hay tou ، sst lwdangh khyl main aajaty haay۔sarf is mkam par ، ghryda kay baray main nwda kay hawalha ki pyrwy ki jati hay ، aur asal drjat ko bhry hui ya is ki ghnty ki jati haay۔ sst lwdangh mykanzam is bat ko ykyny bnata hay keh jab zurwry ho tou ghryda ki ghnty ya bazayaft sirf is wkt anjam di jati hay ، ghair zurwry ghnty aur wsail ko kam sy kam karty hawiay۔ astamal karty hawiay۔ astamal karty hawiay۔mtwazan srch drkht main sst lwdangh ، hum mymwry kay nksh ko kam krsktay hain aur un karrwaiywn ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnasktay hain js main nwda ki akdar tak rsaiy ki zurwrt nahin hawty haay۔sarf is sawrt main jab akdar ki wazuha tawr par drkhwast ki jati hay ، un ko lwda ya hasab ktab kya jata hay ، js sy aan daymanda ki bazayaft ya hasab ktab ki ajazat mil jati haay۔ yeh bat aham hay keh sst lwdangh mtwazan srch drkht kay nfaza main kuch pychydghy ka azuafha krty hay ، kywnkha is main akdar ki bwjh ko snbhalnay ki zurwrt hawty haay۔awr un haalat ko snbhalna jahan twka kay wkt akdar dstyab nahin hawskty hayn۔taham ، jab mnasb tarykay sy laghw hawta hay tou ، sst lwdangh mnzarnamwn main ayk kymty asalaha ki tknyk hawskty hay jahan akdar ki ghnty ya bazayaft mhanghy hawty hay aur byk wkt tamam akdar ki zurwrt nahin hawty haay۔

Question: jawa askrpt main mkhtlf ksm ki ghltayan kya hayn؟aam ghltay ki aksam ki msaalyn fraham kryn۔
Answer: rydaks trtyb ayk lkyry taim chhant raha alghwrthm hay jo un kay anfrady handswn ya rydaks ki bnyad par anasar ko trtyb dyta haay۔yha anasar ko hr handsay ki kdr ki bnyad par baltywn kay ayk syt main tksym krkay kam krta hay ، kam sy kam aham handswn (daiyn tarf) sy la kar anthaaiy aham handsay (baiyn tarf) tk۔rydaks trtyb ko add ، tarwn ، ya kesi bhi tarah kay aadad wa shmar ko trtyb denay kay liye astamal kya jaskta hay js ko handsay kay zaryaha handsay ki nmaindghy ki jaskty haay۔ rydaks trtyb denay ka ayk jaizaha haay: trtyb denay kay liye anasar ki ghair trtyb shuda saf sy shrwa kryn۔ zayada sy zayada tadad ki wzuahat kryn۔saf main mwjwd tamam anasar kay darmiyan handsay۔as sy chhantnay kay aml kay liye drkar paswn ya tkrar ki tadad taay hawty haay۔ hr handsay kay liye ayk pas ko kam sy kam aham handsay sy la kar anthaaiy aham handsay tak ka mzaaharha kryn۔har pas kay liye ، mwjwdha handsay ki kymt ki bnyad par anasar ko 10 balty (0-9) main tksym kryn۔ baltywn main anasar ko tksym karnay kay bad ، baltywn ki trtyb main anasar ko ayk hi saf main waps jma kryn۔yha aml is bat ko ykyny bnata hay keh ayk hi handsay ki kymt waly anasar ayk hi rshtha dar trtyb main rhayn۔ hr bad kay handsay kay liye 3-4 sy kam akdamat ، kam sy kam aham handsay sy anthaaiy aham handsay ki taraf brahtay hawiay۔aakhry pas kay bad ، srny ko trtyb diya jaye gha۔ rydaks trtyb main ayl ays day (km sy kam aham handsha) ya aym ays day (anthaaiy aham handsha) nktaha nzar ka astamal karty hoey nafza kya jaskta haay۔ayl ays day rydaks trtyb dien taraf sy shrwa hawty hay aur baien taraf aaghay brahty hay ، jabky aym ays day rydaks trtyb baien taraf sy shrwa hawty hay aur dien taraf aaghay brahty haay۔dwnwn tarykwn kay aadad wa shmar ki trtyb ki khsawsayat par anhasaar karty hoey un kay fwaid aur thafzaat hayn۔ rydaks trtyb ki wkt ki pychydghy O (K * N) hay ، jahan N anasar ki tadad hay aur K handswn ki awsta tadad haay۔yha ayk lkyry wkt ko chhant raha hay alghwrthm smjha jata hay kywnkha pas (kay) ki tadad aam tawr par anasar ki tadad (ayn) sy bohat chhwty hawty haay۔ radks trtyb ayk msthakm chhantnay wala alghwrthm hay ، is ka mtalb hay keh yeh msawy akdar kay sath anasar kay mtalkha trtyb ko brkrar rkhta haay۔taham ، hr handsay kay l the baltywn ko thamnay kay l it is ko azuafy mymwry ki zurwrt hawty hay ، jo is ki jghha ki karkrdghy ko mtasar krskty haay۔yha aam tawr par antyjr chhantnay ، strngh chhantnay aur dyghr ayply kyshnza kay liye astamal hawta hay jahan ansar ka dahanchha anfrady handswn ki bnyad par chhantnay ki ajazat dyta haay۔

Question: jawa askrpt main yaddasht kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur yeh keh fnkshn par aml draamd ko bhatr bnanay kay liye kis tarah astamal kya jaskta haay۔
Answer: ayk AVL drkht ayk ksm ka khud twazan bainry srch try (BST) hay jo mwsar tlash ، andraj aur hazaf karnay kay kamwn ko ykyny bnanay kay liye ayk mkhsawsa twazan ki haalt ko brkrar rkhta haay۔aay wy ayl kay drkht aur amwmy bainry tlash kay drkht kay darmiyan klydy frk bylns ansar aur is sy wabstha twazan kay aml main haay۔yhaan aham akhtlafat hayn: bylns fyktr: aay wy ayl kay drkht main hr nwda ayk bylns ansar ko zakhyrha krta hay ، jo is nwda kay baien aur dien sab trywn kay darmiyan awnchaiy ka frk haay۔bylns ansar -1 ، 0 ، ya 1 hawskta hay ، js sy yeh zaahar hawta hay keh aya sab try baltrtyb baien bhary ، mtwazan ya dien bhary haay۔aam bainry srch try main ، twazan kay ansar ka koi tsawr nahin haay۔ mtwazan aapryshnza: jab bhi kesi AVL drkht main andraj ya hazaf karnay ka aml anjam diya jata hay jo twazan ki haalt main khll daalta hay (twazan ansar -2 ya +2 bn jata haay) ، mkhsawsa twazan ki karwaiyan hawty hayn۔twazan ko bhaal karnay kay liye mthark.an karrwaiywn main drkht ki tnzaym nw aur twazan brkrar rkhnay kay liye ghrdsh (snghl ya dabl ghrdsh) shaml hayn۔aam bainry srch try main ، koi khasa twazan aml nahin hawta hay ، aur wkt kay sath sath drkht ghair mtwazan hawskta haay۔ khud mtwazan praprty: ayk AVL drkht khud twazan rkhnay wala dayta dahanchha hay ، yany yeh andraj aur hazaf karnay ki karrwaiywn kay doran khud bkhwd is ki sakht ko aydajst krta haay۔twazan ki haalt ko brkrar rkhnay kay liay۔yha khud twazan rkhnay wali jaiydad is bat ko ykyny bnaty hay keh drkht ki awnchaiy O (lagh ayn) rhaty hay ، jahan N anasar ki tadad haay۔aam bainry tlash kay drkht main ، twazan ki koi zumant nahin hay ، aur drkht ki awnchaiy bdtryn sawrt main O (n) sy kam hawskty hay ، js sy tlashy kay kamwn kay liye kam mwsar hawjata haay۔ karkrdghy: khud twazan rkhnay wali amlak ki wjha sy ،aay wy ayl kay drkht bdtryn sawrt main aw (lagh ayn) ki wkt ki pychydghy kay sath mwsar tlash ، andraj aur hazaf karnay kay kam fraham karty hayn۔yha tamam kamwn kay liye mtwazan rsaiy kay awkat ki zumant dyta haay۔aam bainry tlash kay drkht main ، aapryshnza ki wkt ki pychydghy ka anhasaar drkht kay dahanchay par hawta hay ، jo bylns par mnhasar O (lagh N) sy O (n) tak mkhtlf hawskta haay۔ khlasaha۔ ayk AVL drkht khud twazan ki ayk ksm haay۔bainry srch try jo ayk twazan ansar ko brkrar rkhta hay aur drkht ko mtwazan rhanay ko ykyny bnanay kay liye mkhsawsa twazan kay kam anjam dyta haay۔as sy gharntyda lwghrthmk taim pychydghy kay sath mwsar tlash ، andraj aur hazaf karnay ki karrwaiywn ko ykyny bnaya jata haay۔as kay braks ، ayk aam bainry srch try main twazan ansar ya mkhsawsa twazan kay kam nahin hawtay hain ، aur is ka dahanchha andraj kay hakm par mnhasar hawta hay ، js sy mmknha tawr par ghair mtwazan drkht aur kam mwsar aapryshn hawtay hayn۔

Question: aap jawa askrpt main kwkyza ko kis tarah snbhaltay hayn؟dstawyza kay astamal ki wzuahat kryn۔ kwky praprty aur kwky hayra phyry kay tarykwn۔
Answer: ayk blwm fltr ayk amkany aadad wa shmar ka dahanchha hay jo kesi syt main kesi ansar ki rknyt ko janchnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔yha mؤsar tarykay sy yeh taay krta hay keh aya kesi ansar ko syt main mwjwd hony ka amkan hay ya ykyny tawr par mwjwd nahin hay ، lekin yeh kabhi kbhar ghalat msabt ntaij pyda krskta hay (as bat ka asharha krta hay keh ansar mwjwd hawta hay jab yeh nahin hawta haay) ، haalankha yeh kabhi bhi ghalat mnfy pyda nahin krta hay (as bat ki nshandhay karty hain keh aykansar mwjwd nahin hawta hay jab yeh hawta haay) .yha hay keh blwm fltr kis tarah kam krta haay: abtda: ayk blwm fltr ayk mkrrha saiza bt srny (aam tawr par aym bts kay) aur K aazaad haysh fnkshn ka ayk syt kay sath tyar kya jata haay۔blwm fltr ka ansar ، yeh K haysh kay hr afaal ka astamal
