karty hoey haysh kya jata hay ، js kay ntyjay main K mkhtlf haysh akdar hawty hayn۔bt srny main mtalkha bts haysh akdar kay zaryaha asharha krdha pwzayshnwn par 1 par syt kyay gaye hayn۔ mymbrshp tyst: yeh chyk karnay kay liye keh ansar syt main hay ya nahin ، ansar ko isi kay haysh afaal ka astamal karty hoey haysh kya jata haay۔haysh akdar kay zaryaha asharha krdha pwzayshnwn par bt sray main bts ki janch ki jati haay۔aghr tamam mtalkha bts 1 par syt kyay gaye hain tou ، ansar ko syt main "mmknha tawr par mwjwd" smjha jata haay۔aghr bts main sy kesi ko 1 par syt nahin kya gaya hay tou ، ansar ykyny tawr par syt main mwjwd nahin haay۔ blwm fltrza ki klydy khsawsayat aur astamal kay maamlat mndrjha zayl hayn: khlaiy karkrdghy: blwm fltr dusray aadad wa shmar kay mkablay main nsbta small thwray mkdar main mymwry ka astamal karty hayn۔haysh tybl jesay dahanchay۔khlaiy karkrdghy ko ghalat msabt ki ajazat dy kar haasal kya jata haay۔ mmbrshp ka tkhmynha syt kryn: blwm fltrza bnyady tawr par kesi syt main mmbrshp ko mwsar andaza main janchnay kay liye astamal hawtay hayn۔wha aysay mnzarnamwn kay liye mwzawn hain jahan poray syt ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye mymwry ya astwryj ki zurwryat mmnwa hayn۔ aspyda: blwm fltrza main mmbrshp tyst bohat tyza hain kywnkha inhain sirf haysh akdar kay zaryaha asharha krdha pwzayshnwn par bt sray ka andazaha karnay ki zurwrt hawty hay ، baghair asal tak rsaiy haasal ky۔anasar۔ fals msabt: blwm fltrza ghalat msabt pyda krsktay hain ، jahan kesi ansar ko syt main mwjwd kay tawr par ghalat tawr par shnakht kya jata haay۔jhwtay msabt kay amkan ka anhasaar bt srny (m) kay saiza ، haysh afaal (kay) ki tadad ، aur syt main anasar ki tadad par hawta haay۔ blwm fltrza mkhtlf shabwn main ayply kyshnza tlash karty hain ، jesay nyt wrk rwtrza (fltr karnay kay liaynapsndydha tryfk) ، dayta bys (ghyr mwjwd rykardawn kay liye dask ki tlash ko kam karnay kay liay) ، hajay chykrs ، srch anjn (ghyr zurwry dask tak rsaiy ko kam karnay kay liay) ، aur bohat kchh۔ yeh bat aham hay keh blwm fltrza mwsar aur jghha ki bcht hain ، woh hain ، woh hain ، woh haynan ayply kyshnza kay l suitable mwzawn nahin jahan jhwtay msabt nakabl kbwl hon ya jab anasar kay mkml syt ko drst tarykay sy bazayaft karnay ki zurwrt haw۔

Question: jawa askrpt main == aur === aaprytrza kay darmiyan kya frk haay؟frk ko wazuha karnay kay liye msaalyn fraham kryn۔
Answer: amwraizada tjzayha ayk aysy tknyk hay jo aadad wa shmar kay dahanchay par aapryshnza ki trtyb ki awsta wkt ki pychydghy ka tayn karnay kay liye astamal ki jati hay ، chahaay anfrady karrwaiywn main mkhtlf wkt ki pychydghyan hawskty hayn۔yha kamwn ki ayk syryza kay doran aadad wa shmar kay dahanchay ya alghwrthm ki karkrdghy ki khsawsayat kay baray main zayada drst aur jama tfhaym fraham krta haay۔ kuch maamlat main ، aadad wa shmar kay dahanchay main kesi ayk aapryshn ki bdtryn wkt ki pychydghy nakarha hawskty hay ، lekin jab kesi trtyb par ghwr kryn۔karrwaiywn main ، awsta wkt ki pychydghy nmayan tawr par bhatr hawskty haay۔amwraizada tjzayha hamain mhanghay karrwaiywn kay akhrajat ko bray tadad main sstay kamwn par tksym krkay karrwaiywn ki mjmway laght ka tjzayha karnay main mdd krta haay۔ amwrtaizada tjzayha main tyn aham tarykay shaml hayn: mjmway tjzayha: yeh tarykha karwn ki trtyb ki kal laght ka tjzayha krta hay aur is ko tksym krta haay۔karrwaiywn ki tadad say۔yha fy aapryshn awsta laght par ayk awpry pabnd fraham krta haay۔ akaؤntngh tarykha: is tarykha kar main ، kuch aapryshnwn ko azuafy "krydat" tfwyzu kya jata hay takha dyghr karrwaiywn ki laght ko pora kya jaskay jo nsbta in ssta haay۔krydat ko karrwaiywn main tksym kya jata hay ، is bat ko ykyny bnatay hoey keh kal laght ka hasab ktab haay۔ mmknha tarykha: yeh tarykha amwr laght ka tjzayha karnay kay liye mmknha twanaiy kay tsawr ko astamal krta haay۔yha ayk mmknha fnkshn ki wzuahat krta hay jo hr aapryshn kay bad dayta dahanchay main mhafwza "mmknha twanaiy" ki nmaindghy krta haay۔abtdaiy aur aakhry ryastwn kay mabyn mmknha frk ko aapryshnza ki laght ka hasab ktab karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ aam tjzayha aam tawr par mkhtlf dayta dahanchay aur alghwrthm ki karkrdghy ka tjzayha karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، jesay mthark safwn (jysay ، ary lst) ، haysh tyblza ، khwdmtwazan drkht (jysay ، AVL drkht ، srkh syaha drkht) ، aur bohat kchh۔as sy un dahanchay kay awsta tarza aml kay baray main bsayrt fraham karnay main mdd mlty hay ، js sy un ki karkrdghy ki khsawsayat ki bhatr tfhaym aur mwazanha karnay ki ajazat mlty haay۔mkhtlf mnzarnamay۔yha un maamlat ki nshandhay karnay main hamari mdd krta hay jahan ayk mhangha aapryshn sstay aapryshnwn ki trtyb sy pysh kya jata hay ، js kay ntyjay main mjmway tawr par mwsar hal hawta haay۔

Question: jawa askrpt main prwtw taip aabjykt kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur yeh kis tarah aabjykt wrasat kay liye astamal hawta haay۔
Answer: jamd saf aur mthark saf kay darmiyan frk saiza aur mymwry kay antzaam kay lhaaza sy un ki mkhtsa aur lchk main haay۔yhaan hr ayk ki wzuahat haay: jamd srny: saiza: ayk msthakm saf ka ayk mkrrha saiza hawta hay jo aalan kay wkt taay hawta haay۔ayk bar jab saiza ki wzuahat hawjaiay tou ، rn taim kay doran isy tbdyl nahin kya jaskta۔ mymwry mkhtsa: jamd safwn ko astyk par ya jamd/aalmy mtghyr kay tawr par mkhtsa kya jata haay۔awr karkrdghy: ayk msthakm saf main mwjwd anasar ko un kay asharyha kay zaryaha rsaiy haasal ki jati hay ، aur rsaiy ka wkt mstkl hawta hay (O (1))۔anasar ko mymwry main lghatar zakhyrha kya jata haay۔rn taim kay doran aydajst kryn۔jb zurwrt ho tou prwghramr mymwry ko wazuha tawr par mkhtsa karnay aur is sy nmtnay kay liye zamha dar hay jab is ko mymwry lyk sy bchnay ki zurwrt nahin haay۔ dwbarha astamal krna: mkhtlf tadad main anasar ko aydajst karnay kay liye mthark safwn ka saiza tbdyl kya jaskta haay۔aam tawr par dwbarha bnanay main mymwry ka ayk nya blak mkhtsa karna ، mwjwdha anasar ko kapy karna ، aur prany mymwry ko khtm karna shaml haay۔)). lchk: rn taim kay doran mthark saf kay saiza ko tbdyl karnay ki salahayt isy jamd saf sy zayada lchkdar bnaty haay۔yha prwghram ki asal zurwryat ki bnyad par mthark mymwry mkhtsa karnay ki ajazat dyta haay۔ khlasaha yeh keh ayk msthakm srny ka ayk mkrrha saiza mrtb wkt par taay hawta hay ، jabky ayk mthark saf main lchkdar saiza hawta hay jsay rn taim kay doran aydajst kya jaskta haay۔mthark safyn zayada lchk fraham krty hain lekin dsty mymwry kay antzaam ki zurwrt hawty hay ، jabky jamd safwn main ayk mkrrha saiza aur khwdkar mymwry ka antzaam hawta haay۔jamd aur mthark safwn kay mabyn antkhab prwghram ki mkhsawsa zurwryat par mnhasar hay ، bshmwl lchk ، mymwry ki karkrdghy ، aur karkrdghy kay thafzaat ki zurwrt bhy۔

Question: aap jawa askrpt main mtzuad tkrar ko kis tarah snbhaltay hayn؟wyw aaf lwp kay astamal ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: anzumam trtyb waly alghwrthm ko nafza karnay kay l you ، aap un akdamat par aml krsktay hayn: tksym kryn: ghair trtyb shuda saf ko do hasawn main tksym kryn۔yha drmyany asharyha tlash krkay aur do alag alag sbrywn ki tshkyl kay zaryaha kya jaskta hay ، ayk shrwa sy wsta tak anasar par mushtamil hay ، aur dusra drmyany+1 sy aakhr tak anasar par mushtamil haay۔pchhlay mrhalay main tkhlyk krdha do sbrywn kw۔yha kdm sbrywn ko tksym karna jary rakhy ga jab tak keh hr sbry main sirf ayk ansar nah ho ، jsay pehlay hi trtyb diya jata haay۔yha do sbrywn kay anasar ka mwazanha krkay aur asal saf main rakhy janay waly chhwtay ansar ko mntkhb krkay kya jata haay۔as aml ko is wkt tak dharaiyn jab tak keh dono sbrywn kay tamam anasar ko asal srny main zum nahin krdya gaya haay۔ yahan azaghr main ayk msaal kay nfaza: paiythwn kwpy kwdaydaf anzumam_swrt (aay aar aar): # bys kys: agar srny khaly hay ya sirf ayk ansar mwjwd hay tou waps karain (aay aar aar)) <= 1: aar aay aar # saf ko do hasawn main tksym karain wsta = lyn (aay aar aar) // 2 baiyn_haalf = aar aay aar [: wsta] daiyn_half = aar aar [wsta:] # bar bar do hasawn ko baiyn_haalf = anzumam_swrt (baiyn_haalf) daiyn_half ko trtyb dyn۔= anzumam_swrt (daiyn_haalf) # trtyb shuda aadhay hasa .ay ko zum kryn<lyn (baiyn) aur jay <lyn (daiyn): agar baien [i] <daiyn [j]: zum shdha۔ apynda (baiyn [i]) i += 1 awr: zum shdha۔ apynda (daiyn [j]) jay += 1 # subarrays (aghr koi haay) sy baky anasar shaml kryn۔kwdar = [4 ، 7 ، 2 ، 1 ، 5 ، 9 ، 3 ، 8 ، 6] chhantay hawiay_r = anzumam_swrt (aay aar aar) prnt (chhantya_r) aaؤt pt trtyb shuda saf hawgha: [1 ، 2 ، 3 ، 4 ، 5 ،6 ، 7 ، 8 ، 9]۔

Question: jawa askrpt main mkhtlf ksm ki ghltayan kya hayn؟aam ghltay ki aksam ki msaalyn fraham kryn۔
Answer: askyp lst ayk dayta dahanchha hay jo anasar ki trtyb shuda fharst main anasar ki tlash ka ayk mwsar tarykha fraham krta haay۔yha ayk mnslk fharst ki tarah hay lekin is main mtadd mtwazay lnkda fharstyn shaml hain ، jn ko "staha" kaha jata hay ، jo tyzay sy tlash kay kamwn ki ajazat dyta haay۔askyp lstwn ko mwsar tlash kay awkat aur aml draamd ki sadghy kay mabyn twazan fraham karnay kay liye dayzaain kya gaya haay۔ yahan yeh hay keh askyp lst kis tarah kam krty haay: dahanchha: ayk askyp lst mtadd stahawn par mushtamil hay ، jahan hr staha nwdas ki ayk mnslk fharst haay۔nchly staha ayk bakaadha trtyb shuda mnslk fharst hay js main tamam anasar shaml hayn۔nchly staha sy upar hr staha nchly staha ka sab syt hay ، jo kuch anasar ko chhwra dyta haay۔sb sy upar ki staha main sirf do nwdas hawtay hayn: ayk baien syntynyl aur ayk dien syntynyl۔ tlash krna: askyp lst main kesi ansar ki tlash kay l you ، aap sab sy upar ki staha par shrwa karty hain aur lnkda fharst ko abwr karty hain jab tak keh aap ko aysa ansar nah mil skay jo is sy zayada ya brabr haw۔hadf ansar kw۔as kay bad ، aap aghlay drjay par chlay jien aur is aml ko dharaiyn jab tak keh aap nechay ki staha tak nah phanchyn ya hadf ka ansar tlash nah kryn۔yha askyp daawn aml fharst kay braay hasawn ko chhwra kar tyza tr tlash karnay ki ajazat dyta haay۔ dakhl kryn: jab kesi niay ansar ko askyp lst main dakhl karty ho tou ، aap upar ki staha par shrwa karty hain aur is pwzayshn ki tlash karty hain jahan nya ansar dakhl kya jana chahaiay۔jb aap stahawn ko abwr karty hain tou ، aap tsaadfy tawr par fysalha karty hain keh aya is staha main niay ansar ko dakhl karna hay ya isy chhwra dena haay۔aghr nya ansar kesi khasa staha par dakhl kya jata hay tou ، aap ayk nya nwda bnatay hain aur niay nwda ko shaml karnay kay liye mnasb pwaintrza ko ap dayt karty hayn۔ daailyshn: kesi ansar ko askyp lst sy hazaf karnay kay liye ، aap askyp lst main mwjwd ansar ko tlash karty hain aur is ko ap dayt karty hayn۔ansar par mushtamil nwda ko nzarandaza karnay kay liye asharay۔yha hatanay ka aml bakaadghy sy mnslk fharst main hazaf hony ki tarah haay۔ askyp lst ki awnchaiy ka tayn amkan ki tksym kay zaryaha kya jata hay ، aam tawr par skay tas ya bay trtyb nmbr jnryshn ki bnyad par ، js sy yeh taay hawta hay keh aya kesi ansar ko aghly staha par trky di jany chahaiay ya nhayn۔nhayn۔ansar ki staha jtny unchi hogi ، is kay kam anasar is kay chhwra jatay hain ، js kay ntyjay main tyzay sy tlash kay awkat hawtay hayn۔ ays kay aai py ki fharstyn tlash ، andraj aur hazaf karnay kay kamwn kay liye awstaa case wkt ki pychydghy fraham krty hain ، jahan ayn main anasar ki tadad hawty haay۔fharst.as sy askyp ki fharstwn ko zayada pychydha mtwazan srch try dahanchay jesay aay wy ayl kay drkhtwn ya srkh syaha drkhtwn kay amly mtbadl bnata hay ، khasa tawr par jab sadghy aur aml draamd main aasany ko trjyha di jati haay۔ yeh bat aham hay keh askyp lstwn main mtwazan tlash kay drkhtwn ki tarah ki karkrdghy ki zumant nahin haay۔bdtryn sawrthaal myn۔taham ، askyp lstwn ki amkany nwayt inhain awstaa mwsar aur bohat sy amly ayply kyshnza kay l suitable mwzawn bna dyty hay jahan bdtryn sawrthaal ka mnzar kam haay۔

Question: jawa askrpt main yaddasht kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur yeh keh fnkshn par aml draamd ko bhatr bnanay kay liye kis tarah astamal kya jaskta haay۔
Answer: ayk lahakha drkht ayk dayta dahanchha hay jo kesi dyiay gaye tar kay tamam lahakha ko mwsar andaza main nmaindghy krta haay۔yha bnyady tawr par pytrn mmasal aur strngh srch aapryshnza kay liye astamal hawta haay۔ayk lahakha drkht khasa tawr par un ayply kyshnza main mfyd hay js main braay mtn ya day ayn aay ki trtyb ka tjzayha karna shaml haay۔ yahan ayk lahakha drkht kis tarah kam krta haay: tamyr: lahakha drkht ki tamyr kay liye ، dyiay gaye tar ko krdar kay lhaaza sy prwss kya jata haay۔tar ka hr lahakha drkht main ayk alyhadha rastay kay tawr par shaml kya jata haay۔lahakha jo mshtrkha sabkha main shryk hain isi tarah ka rastha banttay hain jab tak keh woh daaiywrj۔ nwdas aur ayjza: drkht nwdas aur knarwn par mushtamil hawta haay۔har nwda asal tar kay ayk zakhyray ki nmaindghy krta hay ، aur hr knaray ayk krdar ki nmaindghy krta haay۔knarwn par un harwf ka lybl laga hoa hay jo aghlay nwdas ki taraf jata haay۔rwt nwda khaly tar ki nmaindghy krta hay ، aur hr pty nwda asal tar kay lahakha sy mmasal hawta haay۔ rastha kmpryshn: jghha kay astamal ko bhatr bnanay kay liye ، lahakha drkht aksar rastay ki kmpryshn ko mlazamt dytay hayn۔as ka mtalb yeh hay keh ayk hi harwf kay sath lghatar knarwn ko ayk hi knaray main mlaya jata hay ، js sy drkht main nwdas aur knarwn ki tadad kam hawjaty haay۔ lahakha drkht kiy mfyd khsawsayat mhaya krta haay: strngh srch: lahakha drkht ka bnyady faidha is ki mؤsar tarykay sy tlash karnay ki salahayt haay۔asal tar kay andr sbstrngh kay liay۔astfsar kay tar ko dykhtay hoey ، aap asal tar main astfsar kay tar kay tamam wakaat ko tlash karnay kay liye lahakha drkht ko abwr krsktay hayn۔as aapryshn main aw (aym) ki wkt ki pychydghy hay ، jahan aym astfsar kay tar ki lmbaiy haay۔ pytrn mlap: lahakha drkht pytrn mmasal kamwn kay liye bhatryn hayn۔wha aap ko yeh tayn karnay ki ajazat dytay hain keh aya koi dyiay gaye nmwnha asal tar main mwjwd hay aur pytrn kay tamam wakaat ko tlash krta haay۔as aapryshn main aw (py) ki wkt ki pychydghy hay ، jahan py pytrn ki lmbaiy haay۔ aam tawr par aam strngh: lahakha drkhtwn ko mtadd dawrwn kay mabyn mwsar andaza main sab sy tawyl mshtrkha sbstrngh tlash karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔tmam dawrwn kay liye ayk hi lahakha drkht ki tamyr aur drkht kay dahanchay ka tjzayha krkay ، aap sab sy tawyl aam sbstrngh ki nshandhay krsktay hayn۔ sfks drkht mkhtlf ayply kyshnza main braay pymanay par astamal hawtay hain ، bshmwl baiyw anfarmytks (day ayn aay trtyb tjzayha ، jynwm asmbly ، aur jynwm main dharnay ki tlash)، tykst andayksngh aur srch anjn (alfaza ya fkray kay wakaat ki tlash) ، dayta kmpryshn alghwrthm ، aur bohat kchh۔wha strngh tjzayha ، pytrn mmasal ، aur strngh tlash sy mtalk kamwn kay liye mwsar aur twsya pzayr hal fraham karty hayn۔taham ، lahakha drkht ki tamyr kmpywtyshnl mhangha hawskty hay ، aam tawr par O (n) wkt aur jghha ki pychydghy ki zurwrt hawty hay ، jahan N un pt strngh ki lmbaiy hawty haay۔

Question: aap jawa askrpt main kwkyza ko kis tarah snbhaltay hayn؟dstawyza kay astamal ki wzuahat kryn۔ kwky praprty aur kwky hayra phyry kay tarykwn۔
Answer: bainry srch try (by ays ty) main kesi ansar ko dakhl karnay ki wkt ki pychydghy drkht ki sakht par mnhasar haay۔bhatryn sawrthaal main ، jahan drkht mtwazan hay ، wkt ki pychydghy O (lagh ayn) hay ، jahan N drkht main nwdas ki tadad haay۔taham ، bdtryn sawrthaal main ، jahan drkht anthaaiy mtwazan hay (lkyry lnkda fharst sy mshabhat) ، wkt ki pychydghy O (n) hawskty hay ، jahan drkht main nwdas ki tadad haay۔ is tghyr ki wjha yeh haaykha mtwazan by ays ty main ، drkht ki awnchaiy nwdas ki tadad kay slslay main lagh un ki rhaty hay ، js sy dakhlay kay mwsar kamwn ko ykyny bnaya jata haay۔mtwazan by ays ty main hr staha baky tlash ki jghha ko tkryba half nsaf tak tksym krta hay ، js ki wjha sy anasar ki mtwazan tksym hawty haay۔ dusri taraf ، ayk mtwazan by ays ty ayk lkyry dahanchay main haras daal sakta hay ، js main ayk sab try dusray sy nmayan tawr par braa haay۔as maamlay main ، kesi ansar ko dakhl karnay main drkht ki pori awnchaiy sy ghzarna shaml hawskta hay ، js kay ntyjay main ayk khtay wkt ki pychydghy hawty haay۔ mwsar azuafay ko ykyny bnanay kay liye ، khud twazan bainry srch try ki mkhtlf haaltwn jesay AVL drkhtwn ya srkh syaha ko astamal karna aam haay۔drkhtyha aadad wa shmar kay dahanchay azuafay aur hazaf karnay kay doran mkhsawsa kwaad ko nafza krkay twazan brkrar rkhtay hain ، tlash aur andraj dono kamwn kay l log lajarthmk taim pychydghy ki zumant dytay hayn۔

Question: jawa askrpt main == aur === aaprytrza kay darmiyan kya frk haay؟frk ko wazuha karnay kay liye msaalyn fraham kryn۔
Answer: ayk fbwnyky hayp ayk dayta dahanchha hay jo trjyhay ktaar ko mwsar andaza main nafza karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔yha bainry hayps ya bainwmyil hayps jesay trjyhay ktaar kay nfaza kay mkablay main bazu karrwaiywn kay liye bhatr amwraizada taim pychydghy fraham krta haay۔fybwnyky hayp ki klydy khsawsayat main is ki anzumam kay dahyr praprty aur mstkl wkt ki karrwaiywn jesay andraj aur kami ki salahayt shaml haay۔ yahan fybwnyky hayp kis tarah kam krta hay is ka ayk jaizaha: sakht: ayk fbwnyky hayp ka ayk mjmwaha haay۔drkhtwn ka hakm dya۔dahyr main hr drkht kam sy kam praprty ki pyrwy krta hay ، jahan hr nwda ki klyd is kay waldyn ki klyd sy zayada ya is kay brabr hawty haay۔drkhtwn ki koi shkl hawskty hay ، aur dahyr ki nmaindghy khud hi jra kay nwdas ki dwghna sy mnslk fharst kay zaryaha ki jati haay۔as kay bad is drkht ko jra ki fharst main shaml kya jata haay۔andraj kay aml main O (1) ki mstkl wkt ki pychydghy hawty hay kywnkha kesi zum ya tnzaym nw ki zurwrt nahin hawty haay۔aghr zurwry ho tou kam sy kam nwda ko ap dayt kya jata haay۔as aapryshn main O (1) ki mstkl wkt ki pychydghy bhi haay۔ kam sy km: kam sy kam aapryshn fbwnyky hayp main sab sy chhwty klyd kay sath ansar ko lwtata haay۔yha braha rast kam sy kam nwda tak rsaiy haasal krkay kya jaskta hay ، jo dahyr kay dayta dahanchay main mhafwza haay۔as aapryshn main O (1) ki mstkl wkt ki pychydghy haay۔ kam sy kam aykstrykt: nchwra kam sy kam aapryshn dahyr sy kam sy kam nwda ko hata dyta hay aur dahyr ki praprty ko brkrar rkhnay kay liye baky drkhtwn ko msthakm krta haay۔asthakam kay doran ، ayk hi daghry (bchwn ki tadad) kay drkht is wkt tak zum hawjatay hain jab tak keh ayk hi daghry kay sath do drkht nah hawn۔as aapryshn main O (lagh ayn) ki wkt ki pychydghy hay ، jahan fbwnyky hayp main nwdas ki tadad haay۔ daykryza klyd: klydy aapryshn main kami sy fbwnyky hayp main nwda ki klyd main kami waka hawty haay۔aghr kami ki klyd kam sy kam praprty ki khlaf wrzay krty hay tou ، nwda is kay waldyn sy kat kar rwt lst main shaml kya jata haay۔mzayd braan ، agar nwda kay waldyn kay pas pehlay hi kesi bchay ko kata gaya tha tou ، isy kat kar jra ki fharst main bhi mntkl krdya jata haay۔as aapryshn main O (1) ki ayk mtnasb wkt ki pychydghy hay .mwrtaizada taim pychydghy: fbwnyky dahyr main zayada tr aapryshnwn ki amwraizada taim pychydghy mmknha fnkshn tjzayha ki wjha sy mstkl ya kryb haay۔aghrchha anfrady aapryshn jesay kam sy kam aur kami ki klyd main O (lagh ayn) ki bdtryn wkt ki pychydghyan hawskty hain ، lekin amwraizada tjzayha is bat ko ykyny bnata hay keh fy aapryshn awsta laght nmayan tawr par kam haay۔ fbwnaky hayps khasa tawr par aysy sawrthaal main mfyd hain jahan trjyhay ktaar main bar bar zurwrt hawty haay۔km sy kam kam sy kam aapryshn kay sath ، azuafay ، ywnynwn aur klydy karrwaiywn ko kam krna۔wha mnzarnamwn main dyghr trjyhay ktaar kay aadad wa shmar kay dahanchay kay mkablay main bhatr karkrdghy pysh karty hain jahan yeh mkhsawsa karwaiyan kam kay bwjh par haawy hayn۔

Question: jawa askrpt main prwtw taip aabjykt kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur yeh kis tarah aabjykt wrasat kay liye astamal hawta haay۔
Answer: ayk khud twazan bainry srch try (by ays ty) ayk bainry srch try hay jo mwsar tlash ، andraj ، aur hazaf karnay ki karrwaiywn ko ykyny bnanay kay l intrats dakhlwn aur hazaf hony kay doran khud bkhwd mtwazan dahanchay ko brkrar rkhty haay۔twazan ka tarykha kar drkhtwn kay nwdas ko ghair mtwazan dahanchay main anhataata ko rwknay kay liye dwbarha tksym krta hay ، jo ghair mwsar karrwaiywn ka baasa bn sakta haay۔ aam tawr par astamal hony waly khud twazan waly by ays ty main shaml hayn: aay wy ayl ka drkht: ayk aay wy ayl ka drkht awnchaiy sy mtwazan bainry tlash ka drkht hay ، jahan awnchaiy hay ، jahan awnchaiy haay۔ksy bhi nwda kay baien aur dien sbtyza zayada sy zayada 1 sy mkhtlf hayn۔ AVL drkht awnchaiy kay twazan ko brkrar rkhnay kay l rents azuafay aur hazafwn kay doran ghrdshyn anjam dy kar is twazan ko haasal karty hayn۔yha tlash ، andraj ، aur hazaf karnay kay kamwn kay liye O (lagh ayn) ki bdtryn wkt ki pychydghy ko ykyny bnata haay۔yha is bat ko ykyny bnata hay keh syaha nwdas kay mabyn twazan brkrar rkhnay aur azuafy khsawsayat ko nafza karnay kay zaryaha drkht mtwazan rhata hay ، jesay mlhakha srkh nwdas۔twazan brkrar rkhnay kay l red andrajat aur hazaf karnay kay doran srkh syaha drkht rnghyn pltyn aur ghrdsh ka astamal karty hayn۔srkh rngh kay drkht tlash ، andraj ، aur hazaf karnay kay kamwn kay liye O (lagh ayn) ki bdtryn wkt ki pychydghy fraham karty hayn۔jb nwda tak rsaiy haasal ki jati hay tou ، isy drkht ki jra main mntkl krdya jata hay ، jo kryby nwdas tak kay bad tak rsaiy ko bhatr bnata haay۔chhraknay waly drkht skht twazan brkrar nahin rkhtay hain blkha is kay bjaiay aksar nwdas tak rsaiy haasal karty hayn۔wha ksart sy rsaiy waly anasar kay l good achh ma a wkt ki pychydghy fraham karty hayn۔ khud twazan by ays ty mkhtlf mnzarnamwn main mfyd hain ، bshmwl: aardarda dayta: khud twazan by ays ty mwsar hawta hay jab aap ko trtyb shuda trtyb main dayta astwr aur bazayaft karnay ki zurwrt hawty haay۔wha ghair mtwazan by ays ty kay mkablay main tyza tr tlash ، andraj aur hazaf karnay ki karrwaiywn ko fraham karty hain ، khasa tawr par braay daytasyts kay liay۔ daainymk dayta: jab aadad wa shmar ko aksar azuafay aur hazaf karnay kay sath ap dayt kya jata hay tou ، khud twazan by ays ty is bat ko ykyny bnata hay keh drkht mtwazan rhata hay ، anhataata ko rwkta hay aur mwsar brkrar rhata haay۔karkrdghy.ayfynt aapryshnza: jab aap ko mtwazan dahanchay ki zumant kay sath mwsar tlash ، andraj ، aur hazaf karnay ki karrwaiywn ki zurwrt hawty hay tou khud twazan by ays ty kymty hawta haay۔wha un karrwaiywn kay liye ayk mtwka bdtryn sawrthaal ka wkt ki pychydghy fraham karty hain ، jo karkrdghy main mstkl mzaajy ko ykyny bnatay hayn۔ haysh tyblza kay liye mstkl mzaajy: kuch maamlat main ، khud twazan rkhnay waly by ays ty haysh tyblza kay mtbadl kay tawr par kam krsktay hain jab anasar ka aardar denay ka hakm zurwry haay۔wha trtyb dyiay gaye aardar ko brkrar rkhnay kay azuafy faidha kay sath isi tarah ki tlash aur andraj kay wkt ki pychydghy fraham karty hayn۔ taham ، yeh nwt karna zurwry hay keh khud twazan rkhnay waly by ays ty mymwry kay astamal kay lhaaza sy azuafy awwr hayda kay sath aatay hain aur sydhay aadad wa shmar kay dahanchay kay mkablay main zayada pychydha nfaza jesay sray ya mnslk hawtay hayn۔fharstyn۔khwd twazan by ays ty kay astamal ka antkhab aap ki drkhwast ki mkhsawsa zurwryat par mnhasar hay ، jesay aadad wa shmar ki nwayt ، mtwka kam ka bwjh ، aur wkt ki pychydghy aur khlaiy pychydghy kay mabyn tjart sy mtalk awaml par ghwr kryn۔

Question: aap jawa askrpt main mtzuad tkrar ko kis tarah snbhaltay hayn؟wyw aaf lwp kay astamal ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: kwikswrt ayk mshhawr chhant raha alghwrthm hay jo tksym aur ftha karnay waly nktaha nzar ki pyrwy krta haay۔yha mhawr ansar ka antkhab ، mhawr kay ard ghrd saf ko tksym krkay ، aur mhawr kay dono taraf sbrywn ko bar bar trtyb dy kar kam krta haay۔yhaan kwiykstwrt alghwrthm ko nafza karnay kay tarykwn ki ayk kdm bha kdm wzuahat haay: tksym: saf sy mhawr ansar ka antkhab kryn۔mhawr ka antkhab alghwrthm ki karkrdghy ko mtasar krskta hay ، aur mhawr kay antkhab kay liye mkhtlf hakmt amly mwjwd hay (jysay ، pehla ، aakhry ، ya drmyany ansar ka antkhab karna ، ya bay trtyb nktaha nzar ka astamal karty hawiay)۔as kay baien taraf ، aur mhawr sy zayada tamam anasar is kay dien taraf rakhy jatay hayn۔mhawr khud is ki aakhry trtyb shuda pwzayshn main hawgha۔asay tksym karnay waly mrhalay kay nam sy jana jata haay۔ ryfrnsyshn: mhawr kay baien taraf (chhwtay anasar par mshtml) aur mhawr kay dien taraf kay sbry (braay anasar par mshtml) kay sab aryay par mzakwrha bala tksym kay aml ko mtnazaaha tawr par laghw kryn۔sbry khaly hawjatay hain ya sirf ayk ansar par mushtamil hawtay hain ، kywnkha snghl ansar ki safwn ko pehlay hi trtyb diya jata haay۔ yahan azaghr main kwikswrt alghwrthm ka ayk msaal aml haay: paiythwn kwpy kwdaydaf kwiykswrt (aay aar aar ، kam ، aaly): agar kam <aaly: # tksym srnyPIVOT_INDEX = tksym (ARR ، kam ، awnchaiy) # bar bar subarrays kwikswrt (ARR ، LOW ، PIVOT_INDEX - 1) ko trtyb dyn # baien subarray Quicksort (ARR ، PIVOT_INDEX + 1 ، aaly) ko trtyb dyn۔): # mhawr ko mntkhb karain (yhaan ، hum dien ansar ka antkhab karty hayn) mhawr = aar aay aar [aaly] # chhwtay ansar ka andayks I = kam - 1 kay liye rynj (km ، aaly): # agar mwjwdha ansar OR sy chhwta hay yamhawr kay brabr agar err [j] <= mhawr: # tbadlha anasar i = i + 1 arr [i] ، arr [j] = arr [j] ، arr [i] # mhawr ansar ko apni trtyb shuda pwzayshn main mntkl kryn۔] kwikstwrt (aay aar aar ، 0 ، lyn (aay aar aar) - 1) prnt (aay aar aar) # aaؤt pt: [1 ، 2 ، 3 ، 4 ، 5 ، 6 ، 7 ، 8 ، 9] kwikstwrt alghwrthm ki wkt ki pychydghy O hay (n lagh ayn) awstaa ، jahan n sray main anasar ki tadad haay۔taham ، bdtryn sawrthaal main (jysay ، jab saf pehlay hi trtyb di hogi hay ya is main msawy anasar shaml hayn) ، wkt ki pychydghy O (n^2) tak kam hawskty haay۔mhawr ki hakmt amly aur bay trtyb jesay tknyk ka antkhab bdtryn sawrthaal kay wakaat ko kam karnay aur alghwrthm ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnanay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔

Question: jawa askrpt main mkhtlf ksm ki ghltayan kya hayn؟aam ghltay ki aksam ki msaalyn fraham kryn۔
Answer: ayk ghraf ayk dayta dahanchha hawta hay jo baham mrbwta nwdas kay zakhyray ki nmaindghy karnay kay liye astamal hawta hay ، jahan nwdas ko amwdy kaha jata hay ، aur un kay mabyn rabtawn ko knarwn kehty hayn۔ghraf ko wsya pymanay par ashyaa ، adarwn ، ya tsawrat kay mabyn talkat ko madal karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ ghraf ki mtadd aksam hain ، jn main shaml hayn: ghair hadayt shuda ghraf: ghair hadayt shuda ghraf main ، knarwn ki koi smt nahin haay۔dw amwdywn kay mabyn rabtaha twazan hay ، is ka mtalb yeh hay keh agar wrtyks aay sy la kar wrtyks by tak ka ayk knaray mwjwd hay tou ، wrtyks by sy la kar wrtyks aay daairyktda ghraf (dayghraf) tak bhi ayk knaray mwjwd hayn: hadayt shuda ghraf main ، knarwn main ayk smt hawty haay۔knarwn ayk tarfha (makhza) sy dusray wrtyks (mnzal) sy yktarfha rabtaay hayn۔knarwn ki nmaindghy tyr kay zaryaha ki jati hay ، js sy knkshn ki smt ki nshandhay hawty haay۔ wyt ghraf: wzan waly ghraf main ، hr knaray ko ayk wzan ya kymt tfwyzu ki jati hay jo do amwdy kay mabyn rabtaay sy wabstha kuch kymt ki nmaindghy krty haay۔wzan waly ghrafwn ka astamal mnzarnamay kay madal kay liye kya jata hay jahan knarwn kay mkhtlf akhrajat ya fasalay hawtay hayn۔ saiklk ghraf: ayk chkwlk ghraf main kam aza kam ayk saiykl hawta hay ، jo ayk aysa rastha hay jo isi tarah sy shrwa hawta hay aur khtm hawta haay۔chkrk ghraf main dharaiay hoey amwdy aur knarwn main hawskta hay ۔asyklk ghraf: aykaiyklk ghraf ayk aysa ghraf hay js main koi saiykl nahin hawta haay۔asay hadayt shuda aysaiklk ghraf (day aay jy) kay nam sy bhi jana jata haay۔aysaiklk ghraf aksar aysay mnzarnamwn main astamal hawtay hain jahan anhasaar ya trjyhay talkat ko madalngh karnay ki zurwrt hawty haay۔ mnslk ghraf: ayk mnslk ghraf woh hawta hay js main hr jwraay kay jwraay kay darmiyan rastha hawta haay۔dwsray lfzawn main ، hr had tak knarwn kay tslsl kay zaryaay hr dusray hasaay sy kabl rsai hawta haay۔ mtnasb ghraf: mnktaa ghraf main mtadd mnslk ajzaaa par mushtamil hawta hay ، jahan hr jzaw ayk sbghraf hawta hay jo khud hi jraa hawta haay۔mkhtlf ajzaaa main amwdy kay darmiyan koi rastha nahin haay۔ baipartait ghraf: ayk do tarfha ghraf ayk aysa ghraf hay js kay amwdy ko do naghwar sytwn main tksym kya jaskta hay ، jesay keh tamam knarwn ko ayk syt sy dusray syt sy jwratay hayn۔dwsray lfzawn main ، yahan koi knarwn nahin hain jo ayk hi syt kay andr amwdy ko jwratay hayn۔ yeh ghraf ki aksam ki sirf chnd msaalyn hain ، aur mkhtlf dawmynza aur ayply kyshnza main astamal hony waly ghraf ki bohat sy dusri khsawsay aksam aur mkhtlf haaltyn hayn۔ghraf mkhtlf alghwrthm aur msilay ko hal karnay ki tknykwn main astamal hony waly bnyady aadad wa shmar kay dahanchay hain ، jesay ghraf trawrsl ، mkhtsar trien rastha alghwrthm ، nyt wrk flw alghwrthm ، aur bohat kchh۔

Question: jawa askrpt main yaddasht kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur yeh keh fnkshn par aml draamd ko bhatr bnanay kay liye kis tarah astamal kya jaskta haay۔
Answer: ayk mnt kay dahyr aur zayada sy zayada dahyr kay darmiyan bnyady frk anasar aur un praprtyza ki trtyb main mzumr hay jo un ki brkrar rkhtay hayn: mn dahyr: ayk mnt kay dahyr main ، kesi bhi nwda kay liye ، is nwda ki kdr akdar sy kam ya is kay brabr haay۔as kay bchay۔dwsray lfzawn main ، kam sy kam kymt hamyshha dahyr ki jra main rhaty haay۔yha praprty is bat ko ykyny bnaty hay keh kam sy kam ansar ko dahyr sy mwsar tarykay sy bazayaft kya jaskta haay۔ myks hayp: ayk zayada sy zayada dahyr main ، kesi bhi nwda kay liye ، is nwda ki kdr is kay bchwn ki akdar sy zayada ya is kay brabr haay۔as kay ntyjay main ، zayada sy zayada kymt hamyshha dahyr ki jra main rhaty haay۔yha praprty dahyr sy zayada sy zayada ansar ki mwsar bazayaft ki ajazat dyty haay۔ do mnt kay dahyr aur zayada sy zayada hayps mkml bainry drkht hain ، is ka mtalb yeh hay keh drkht ki tamam stahayn mmknha tawr par aakhry staha kay sawa bhry hui hain ، jo baien sy dien tak bhra hoa haay۔dahyr main anasar ka hakm dena ، chahaay kam sy kam ho ya zayada sy zayada ، dahyr praprty kay zaryaha taay kya jata hay ، jo andraj aur nkalnay kay kamwn kay doran brkrar rhata haay۔ayk mnt kay dahyr main ، sab sy chhwta ansar hamyshha jra main rhata hay ، aur zayada sy zayada dahyr main ، sab sy braa ansar hamyshha jra main hawta haay۔ woh ay aay py ays aam tawr par trjyhay ktaar main astamal hawtay hain ، jahan anasar ko trjyhaat tfwyzu ki jati hain aur un ki bnyad par un tak rsaiy haasal karnay ki zurwrt hawty haay۔trjyhay aardarmn dahyr aksar trjyhay ktaarwn ko nafza karnay kay liye astamal kyay jatay hain jahan sab sy chhwty trjyha waly ansar ko mwsar andaza main bazayaft karnay ki zurwrt hawty haay۔asy tarah ، zayada sy zayada dahyr astamal kyay jatay hain jab sab sy zayada trjyha waly ansar ko mwsar tarykay sy rsaiy haasal karnay ki zurwrt hawty haay۔ yeh nwt karna zurwry hay keh "mn dahyr" aur "myks hayp" ki asatalahaat dahyr main anasar ki trtyb ka hawalha dytay hain aur aadad wa shmar kay alag alag dahanchay nahin hayn۔dahyr ki bnyady dahanchha aur karwaiyan ayk jesi hi rhaty hain ، ktaa nzar is sy keh yeh ayk mn dahyr hay ya zayada sy zayada dahyr haay۔

Question: aap jawa askrpt main kwkyza ko kis tarah snbhaltay hayn؟dstawyza kay astamal ki wzuahat kryn۔ kwky praprty aur kwky hayra phyry kay tarykwn۔
Answer: kesi ghraf par ghharaiy ki pehli tlash (DFS) alghwrthm ko nafza karnay kay l you ، aap astyk ka astamal karty hoey ya kesi tkrar nktaha nzar ka astamal karty hoey kesi tkrary nktaha nzar ka astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan astyk ka astamal karty hoey tkrary nktaha nzar ki ayk kdm bha kdm wzuahat haay: nwdas ko dykhnay kay liye zakhyrha karnay kay liye ayk astyk bnaiyn۔as ko shrwa karnay waly nwda kay sath shrwa kryn۔ mlahazaha karnay waly nwdas ka tryk rkhnay kay liye ayk syt ya saf tyar kryn۔ jab astyk khaly nahin haay: astyk sy ayk nwda pap kryn۔ chyk karain agar nwda pehlay hi mlahazaha kya gaya haay۔aghr aysa hay tou ، aghlay tkrar ko jary rkhyn۔ nwda ko mlahazaha karain aur is par karrwaiy kryn۔ mwjwdha nwda kay mlhakha tamam nwdas ko ghyt karain jn ka dwrha nahin kya gaya hay aur inhain astyk par dhkylyn۔azaghr main tkrary nktaha nzar ka astamal karty hoey day ayf ays alghwrthm ka ayk msaal aml: paiythwn kwpy kwdaydaf day ayf ays (ghraf ، astart_nwda): astyk = [astart_nwda] mlahazaha karain = syt () jabky astyk: krnt_nwda = astyk.pwp () agar mwjwdha_ nwda main mlahazaha kryn: jary rkhyn۔.add (mwjwdha_nwda) prnt (krnt_nwda) # prwsys karain mwjwdha nwda # mwjwdha nwda kay tamam mlhakha nwdas haasal karain aur inhain ghraf main prawsy kay liye astyk par dhkylyn [mwjwdha_nwda]msaal kay tawr par astamal: ghraf = {'a': ['b' ، 'c'] ، 'b': ['d' ، 'e'] ، 'c': ['f'] ، 'd': [].lght main hr klyd ayk nwda sy msawy hay ، aur is sy wabstha kymt mlhakha nwdas ki ayk fharst haay۔ day ayf ays alghwrthm dyiay gaye astart_nwda sy shrwa hawta hay aur byk trykngh sy pehlay hr shakh kay sath jahan tak mmkn ho tlash krta haay۔yha dwray kay nwdas ko is trtyb main prnt krta hay js ka un ka samna karna prata haay۔

Question: jawa askrpt main == aur === aaprytrza kay darmiyan kya frk haay؟frk ko wazuha karnay kay liye msaalyn fraham kryn۔
Answer: mymwraizayshn ayk aysy tknyk hay jo mthark prwghramngh main astamal hawty hay takha kesi fnkshn kay aml ko bhatr bnanay kay liye is kay ntaij ko bhatr bnaiay۔as main mhanghay fnkshn kalza kay ntaij ko zakhyrha karna aur jab wahi aadanwn ko dwbarha hawta hay tou inhain kyshay sy bazayaft karna shaml hawta haay۔yaddasht pehlay kay hasab shuda ntaij ko dwbarha astamal krkay bay kar kmpywtwn ko khtm krty hay ، is tarah alghwrthm ki mjmway wkt ki pychydghy ko kam krty haay۔yha afaal kesi msilay ko bar bar chhwtay chhwtay mzuamyn main twra kar hal karty hayn۔taham ، yaddasht kay baghair ، ayk hi zayly msail ko mtadd bar hal kya jaskta hay ، js ki wjha sy ghair zurwry kmpywtwn ka sbb bnta haay۔ mthark prwghramngh main yaddasht ka astamal kya jata haay: tkrar karnay waly fnkshn ki shnakht kryn: ayk tkrar fnkshn ki tlash karain jo awwrlypngh sab prwblwblza ki praprty ko zaahar krta hay ، jahan ayk hi zayly prwblys ko zaahar krta haay۔mtadd bar hal kyay jatay hayn۔ ayk kyshay ko tyar kryn: aadad wa shmar kay dahanchay ko shrwa karain ، jesay srny ya haysh tybl ، pehlay kmpywtda ntaij ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye kyshay kay tawr par kam kryn۔kyshay ko un pt (ya aadanwn ka mjmwaha) un kay mtalkha aaؤt pt par nkshha bnanay kay kabl hona chahaiay۔ fnkshn ko tbdyl kryn: pehlay chyk karnay kay liye tkrar karnay wali tkryb main trmym karain keh aya dyiay gaye un pt ka ntyjha pehlay hi kyshay main mwjwd hay ya nhayn۔aghr aysa hawta hay tou ، kyshda ntyjha ko dwbarha tshkyl denay kay bjaiay waps krdyn۔aghr ntyjha kyshay main nahin hay tou ، isy mamwl kay mtaabk hasab karain aur isy waps karnay sy pehlay kyshay main astwr kryn۔ ntaij ko yad karty hoey ، isi aadanwn kay sath tkrar karnay wali tkryb main aanay wali kalwn ko mstkl wkt main hal kya jaskta hay ، kywnkha ntyjha pehlay hi mwjwd haay۔kyshay main dstyab haay۔yha bay kar hasab sy ghryza krta hay aur alghwrthm ki mjmway karkrdghy ko nmayan tawr par bhatr bnata haay۔ yahan azaghr main ayk sadha msaal hay jo ayk bar bar chlnay wali fbwnyky fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey yaddasht ka mzaaharha krty haay: paiythwnkpy kwda# kychdaf fbwnyky (ayn ، kyshay = {{}) kay sath mymwraizayshn ka astamal karty hawiay: agar ayn main ayn ، kyshay = {})kyshay: waps kyshay [n] agar n <= 1: ntyjha = n else: ntyjha = fibonacci (n - 1) + fibonacci (n - 2) kyshay [n] = ntyjha ki wapsy ka ntyjha# msaal kay tawr par astamal kay nshan (fibonacci (5))# aaؤt pt: 5 prnt (fbwnaky (10)) # aaؤt pt: 555 is msaal kay tawr par ، fbwnyky fnkshn kysh lght main kmpywtda fbwnyky nmbrwn ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye mymwaizayshn ka astamal krta haay۔as kay bad ki kalwn par ، agar dyiay gaye andayks kay liye fbwnyky nmbr pehlay hi kyshay main mwjwd hay tou ، isy braha rast bazayaft kya jata hay ، js sy bay kar kmpywtyshn ki zurwrt ko khtm kya jata haay۔ fbwnyky nmbrwn ko yad karty hoey ، fnkshn ki wkt ki pychydghy ko kfayt shaary sy kam kya jata hay (O (O (O (O (2^n)) lkyry (O (n))۔an pt wylyw n main azuafay kay sath hi yeh bhatry zayada aham hawjaty haay۔

Question: jawa askrpt main prwtw taip aabjykt kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur yeh kis tarah aabjykt wrasat kay liye astamal hawta haay۔
Answer: dajkstra ka alghwrthm ayk mkbwl alghwrthm hay jo ghair mnfy knaray kay wzan waly ghraf main nwdas kay darmiyan mkhtsar trien rastha tlash karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔yha hadayt aur ghair hadayt shuda dono ghrafwn par kam krta hay aur ghraf kay dusray tamam nwdas tak ayk hi makhza nwda sy kam trien rastha tyar krta haay۔ alghwrthm hr nwda kay liye "ghyr mnhasar" nwdas aur "fasalay" ki kymt ka ayk syt brkrar rkhta hay ، abtdaiy tawr par anfynty par syt kya jata haay۔swaiay swrs nwda kay jo 0 par syt kya gaya haay۔yha aml is wkt tak jary hay jab tak keh tamam nwdas ka dwrha nah kya jaye ya mnzal ka nwda phancha nah jaiay۔ yahan dajkstra kay alghwrthm ki ayk kdm bha kdm wzuahat: ghraf ko shrwa karain aur makhza nwda ka fasalha 0 aur dyghr tamam nwdas ko anfynty par syt kryn۔ayk trjyhay ktaar (jw aksar ayk mn dahyr kay tawr par nafza ki jati haay) nwdas ko un kay fasalwn ki bnyad par zakhyrha karnay kay liay۔makhza nwda ko trjyhay ktaar main dakhl kryn۔ jab trjyhay ktaar khaly nahin haay: trjyhay ktaar sy kam sy kam fasalay kay sath nwda nkalyn۔yha nwda "mwjwdha" nwda haay۔ mwjwdha nwda ko dykhyn۔nya fasalha prawsy kay mwjwdha fasalay sy kam hay ، prawsy kay fasalay ko ap dayt kryn۔ agar hamsayha ghair mnhasar hay tou ، isy trjyhay ktaar main dakhl kryn۔ ayk bar mnzal nwda ka dwrha kya gaya hay ya trjyhay ktaar khaly hay ، alghwrthm khtm hawjata haay۔alghwrthm kay doran hasab ki janay wali dwry ghraf main makhza nwda sy dusray tamam nwdas tak mkhtsar trien rastwn ki nmaindghy krty haay۔ dayjkstra ka alghwrthm is bat ki zumant dyta hay keh jab alghwrthm khtm hawjata hay tou mnba nwda sy kesi dusray nwda tak ka mkhtsar trien rastha paya jata haay۔taham ، yeh ghair mnfy knaray kay wzan ko frzu krta hay aur ghraf main mnfy chkrwn ko nahin snbhalta haay۔ dayjkstra ka alghwrthm mkhtlf ayply kyshnza main wsya pymanay par astamal hawta hay jesay nyt wrk rwtngh prwtwkwl ، jy py ays nywyghyshn sstm ، aur transpwrtyshn nyt wrks main mkhtsar trien rastay ki pryshanywn ko hal karna ، dwsrwn kay drmyan۔

Question: aap jawa askrpt main mtzuad tkrar ko kis tarah snbhaltay hayn؟wyw aaf lwp kay astamal ki wzuahat kryn۔
jawa askrpt main mkhtlf ksm ki ghltayan kya hayn؟aam ghltay ki aksam ki msaalyn fraham kryn۔
Answer: ayk rydaks drkht ، jsay try ya pryfks try bhi kaha jata hay ، ayk khasa drkht kay aadad wa shmar ka dahanchha hay jo mwsar astwryj aur tarwn ki bazayaft kay liye astamal hawta haay۔yha khasa tawr par lght kay nfaza ، aatwmplyt sstm ، aur aai py rwtngh tyblza jesay ayply kyshnza kay liye mfyd haay۔ rydaks try apnay krdarwn kay zaryaha tarwn ka ahatmam krta hay ، js main hr nwda ayk sabkha ya mkml tar ki nmaindghy krta haay۔yhaan ayk jaizaha hay keh ayk rydaks try kis tarah kam krta haay: nwda dahanchha: rydaks try main hr nwda main kiy ajzaaa hawtay hayn: klydy/krdar: nwda sy wabstha krdar۔msaal kay tawr par ، lght kay nfaza main ، hr krdar kesi lfza main ayk khta ki nmaindghy krta haay۔ bchwn: bchwn kay nwdas kay asharay ya hawalha۔har bchha ayk mmknha krdar sy mtaabkt rkhta hay jo lfza markr kay mwjwdha nwda ki pyrwy krskta haay: ayk jhndaa js sy yeh zaahar hawta hay keh aya nwda ayk mkml lfza kay akhttam ki nmaindghy krta haay۔ rydaks try ki tamyr: rydaks ka drkht abtdaiy tawr par khaly hay ، js main sirf ayk jra nwda haay۔chwnkha drkht main dawr daalay jatay hain ، harwf ko baien sy dien tak abwr kya jata haay۔ dakhlha aapryshn: rydaks try main ayk tar dakhl krna: jra nwda par shrwa kryn۔ chyk karain agar mwjwdha krdar mwjwdha nwda kay bchay ki tarah mwjwd haay۔kya ، mtalkha bchay ki taraf brahyn aur aghlay krdar ki taraf brahyn۔ agar aysa nahin hawta hay tou ، mwjwdha krdar kay liye ayk nya chailda nwda bnaiyn aur is bchay ki taraf brahyn۔ is aml ko is wkt tak jary rakhien jab tak keh tar kay tamam krdarwn par karrwaiy nahin ki jati haay۔hatmy nwda kesi lfza kay akhttam kay tawr pr۔ srch aapryshn: rydaks try main tar tlash karnay kay liay: rwt nwda par shrwa kryn۔ hadf kay tar main hr krdar kay liye ، chyk karain keh aya koi bchha nwda mwjwd hay ya nhayn۔، is bchay ki taraf brahyn aur aghlay krdar ki taraf brahyn۔ agar kesi bchay ka nwda mwjwd nahin hay tou ، astrngh rydaks try main mwjwd nahin haay۔ tamam harwf par karrwaiy karnay kay bad ، chyk karain keh aya hatmy nwda ko kesi lfza kay akhttam kay tawr par nshan zad kya gaya haay۔aghr yeh hay tou ، tar mil jata haay۔bsawrt dyghr ، yeh mwjwd nahin haay۔ rydaks try mwsar astwryj aur tarwn ki bazayaft fraham krta hay jo mkhtlf tarwn main aam sabkwn ko mؤsar tarykay sy bant kar tarwn ki bazayaft krta haay۔as sy tar ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye drkar mjmway jghha ko kam kya jata hay aur tlash ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnaya jata haay۔ rydaks kay drkht main aapryshn ki wkt ki pychydghy ، jesay andraj aur tlash ، tarwn ki lmbaiy par mnhasar haay۔bhatryn sawrthaal main ، jahan dawrwn kay mabyn koi mshtrkha sabkha nahin hawta hay ، wkt ki pychydghy O (M) hawty hay ، jahan aym hadf kay tar ki lmbaiy hawty haay۔taham ، bdtryn sawrthaal main ، jahan tamam dawrwn ka ayk hi sabkha hawta hay ، wkt ki pychydghy O (n) hawskty hay ، jahan N tamam tar main harwf ki kal tadad haay۔

Question: jawa askrpt main yaddasht kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur yeh keh fnkshn par aml draamd ko bhatr bnanay kay liye kis tarah astamal kya jaskta haay۔
Answer: by try ayk khud twazan rkhnay wala drkht dayta dahanchha hay jo dask par ya saanwy astwryj main bray mkdar main dayta ko mwsar andaza main astwr karnay aur bazayaft karnay kay liye dayzaain kya gaya haay۔yha sst rsaiy kay awkat kay sath nzaamwn kay l optim bhatr hay ، jesay haarda daraiywza ، jahan kam sy kam dask rydaza karkrdghy kay liye bohat zurwry haay۔ayk by try bainry srch try (by ays ty) sy kiy tarykwn sy mkhtlf haay: nwda dahanchha: bainry srch try main ، hr nwda main aam tawr par ayk hi klyd aur do bchwn kay pwaintr hawtay hain ، jo baien aur dien sbtryza ki nmaindghy karty hayn۔as kay braks ، by try nwda main mtadd chabyan aur bchwn kay pwaintrza shaml hawsktay hayn۔nwda main chabyan ki tadad ayk khasa had kay andr hay ، js ka tayn by try kay hakm sy hawta haay۔by try ka trtyb nwda main ajazat di hogi kam sy kam aur zayada sy zayada chabyan ka tayn krta haay۔aardar aym kay ayk by try main nwda main zayada tr M-1 kyza aur aym chailda pwaintrza hawsktay hain ، swaiay jra kay nwda kay ، js main kam aza kam 1 klyd haay۔ twazan aur awnchaiy: bainry tlash kay drkht kay braks ، jahan twazan haaybaiyn aur dien sbtryza main nwdas ki tkryba brabr tadad ko brkrar rkhtay hoey haasal kya gaya ، ayk by try ayk hi staha par ptay kay tamam nwdas ko rakh kar twazan haasal krta haay۔yha mtwazan dahanchha is bat ko ykyny bnata hay keh drkht ki awnchaiy chabyan ki tadad kay mkablay main nsbta small chhwty rhaty hay ، js ki wjha sy dask tak rsaiy haasal hawty haay۔ tlash aur dakhlha: bainry srch try main ، tlash aur andraj ki karrwaiywn par mbny ayk skht baien dien mwazanha ki pyrwy ki jati haay۔klydy akdar۔by try main ، klydy hadwd ki bnyad par chailda pwaintrza kay bad ، tlash aur andraj kay kamwn main drkht ko nechay ki taraf jana shaml hawta haay۔as sy mwsar dask tak rsaiy haasal karnay ki ajazat mlty hay aur mtalwbha mwazanha ki tadad ko kam kya jata haay۔ dask rsaiy ki asalaha: by try khasa tawr par mwsar dask tak rsaiy kay l designed tyar ki hogi hayn۔an ka mksad dayta tak rsaiy ya is main trmym karnay kay liye drkar dask rydaza ki tadad ko kam sy kam karna haay۔fy nwda ki chabyan ki tadad main azuafha krkay ، by try drkht ki awnchaiy ko kam karty hain ، js kay ntyjay main aadad wa shmar tak rsaiy ya is main trmym karty wkt kam staha ghzar jati haay۔ drkhwastyn: by try aam tawr par fail sstm ، dayta bys aur dyghr astwryj sstm main astamal hawty hain jhaanbray mkdar main dayta ko dask par zakhyrha karnay ki zurwrt haay۔wha aysay mnzarnamwn kay l well mnasb hain jahan tyza rsaiy aur mwsar dask I/O aapryshn zurwry hayn۔ sab sy zayada ، by try ayk wrstail dayta dahanchha hay jo mwsar astwryj aur dask par bray mkdar main dayta ki bazayaft ki ajazat dyta haay۔drkht ki awnchaiy ko mtwazan karnay ، dask kay prahnay ko kam karnay ، aur hr nwda ki mkhtlf ksm ki chabyan snbhalnay ki is ki salahayt yeh dask par mbny ayply kyshnza kay l an ayk bhatryn antkhab bnaty hay ، jabky bainry tlash kay drkht aksar mymwry par mbny mnzarnamwn main astamal hawtay hain jahan tyza klydy tawr par mbny tlashybnyady tshwysh haay۔

Question: aap jawa askrpt main kwkyza ko kis tarah snbhaltay hayn؟dstawyza kay astamal ki wzuahat kryn۔ kwky praprty aur kwky hayra phyry kay tarykwn۔
Answer: haf myn kwdangh ayk lchkdar dayta kmpryshn alghwrthm hay jo drkht par mbny dayta dahanchha astamal krta hay ، jsay haf myn try kay nam sy jana jata hay ، un ki mwjwdghy ki tadd ki bnyad par harwf ko mtghyr lmbaiy kay kwda tfwyzu karnay kay liay۔yha aam tawr par fail kmpryshn aur dayta transmyshn jesay ayply kyshnza main astamal hawta haay۔ yahan ayk kdm bha kdm wzuahat hay keh haf myn kwdangh drkhtwn par mbny dayta dahanchay ka astamal karty hoey kis tarah kam krty haay: tadd tjzayha: haf myn kwdangh main pehla kdm frykwiynsy tjzayha karna haay۔an pt dayta ، jesay tykst dstawyza ya harwf ki trtyb۔har krdar ki frykwinsy ghnty ki jati hay ، aur ayk frykwynsy tybl tyar kya jata haay۔ haf myn drkht ki tamyr: frykwynsy tybl sy hr krdar ko abtdaiy tawr par ayk pty nwda kay tawr par smjha jata haay۔ sab sy kam tadd waly do nwdas ko ayk niay waldyn nwda main mlaya jata hay ، js main mshtrkha tawr par ayk niay waldyn kay nwda main mil jata haay۔tadd do bchwn kay nwdas ki tadd ka mjmwaha hony ki wjha say۔ yeh aml is wkt tak dharaya jata hay jab tak keh tamam nwdas ko ayk hi jra kay nwda main jwra diya jata hay ، js sy haf myn drkht pyda hawta haay۔drkht nechay ki tarah bnaya gaya hay ، js main ptywn kay kryb kam sy kam ksart sy harwf hawtay hain aur jra kay kryb aksar harwf۔ksy krdar ko tfwyzu krdha bainry kwda ka tayn jra sy is krdar kay pty nwda tak kay rastay sy hawta haay۔ hr baien trywrsl bainry kwda main "0" ka azuafha krta hay ، aur hr dien trywrsl main "1" shaml hawta haay۔ is kay ntyjay main bainry kwda hawtay hayn۔mtghyr lmbaiy ، zayada ksart sy harwf ko tfwyzu krdha mkhtsar kwdaza kay sath ، un kay aaly kmpryshn ki salahayt ka faidha athatay hawiay۔bts ، js main asal nmaindghy kay mkablay main kam bts ki zurwrt hawty hay agar haf myn kwda ko mnasb tarykay sy dayzaain kya gaya haw۔ daykmpryshn: aadad wa shmar ko daymprys karnay kay liye ، haf myn try ko isi frykwynsy tybl ya kmprysda dayta main mhafwza krdha malwmat ka astamal karty hoey dwbarha tshkyl diya jata haay۔ jra sy shrwa karna ،har thwraa sa trtyb sy praha jata haay۔jb ayk pty nwda phanch jata hay tou ، is sy mtalkha krdar aaؤt pt hawta hay ، aur is aml main is wkt tak jary rhata hay jab tak keh tamam bts par karrwaiy nah haw۔ haf myn kwdangh karnay sy ksart sy hony waly harwf ko mkhtsar kwda tfwyzu krkay kmpryshn haasal hawta hay ، js kay ntyjay main zayada kmpykt nmaindghy hawty haay۔dwsry taraf ، kabhi kbhar harwf ko tawyl kwda mltay hain ، jo kwdaza ki sabkha fry praprty ko brkrar rkhnay main mdd krta hay ، is bat ko ykyny bnata hay keh koi kwda kesi dusray kwda ka sabkha nahin haay۔ haf myn kwdangh mkhtlf ayply kyshnza aur kmpryshn alghwrthm main wsya pymanay par astamal hawta hay ، jesay zapfailwn aur MP3 aadayw kmpryshn ، malwmat kay kam sy kam nksaan kay sath mwsar dayta kmpryshn haasal karnay kay liay۔

Question: jawa askrpt main == aur === aaprytrza kay darmiyan kya frk haay؟frk ko wazuha karnay kay liye msaalyn fraham kryn۔
Answer: ayk mlhakha mytrks do jhaty mytrks ka astamal karty hoey ghraf ki nmaindghy karnay ka ayk aam tarykha haay۔yha ghraf main amwdy kay mabyn talkat ki ayk kmpykt aur mwsar nmaindghy fraham krta haay۔ ayk mlhakha mytrks main ، mytrks ki ktaaryn aur kalm ghraf kay amwdy ki nmaindghy karty hayn۔mytrks ka hr syl do amwdy kay darmiyan ayk knaray ki nmaindghy krta haay۔har syl main zakhyrha shuda kymt isi tarah kay amwdy kay darmiyan knaray ki mwjwdghy ya adm mwjwdghy ki nshandhay krty haay۔ mlhakha mytrks main knarwn ki mwjwdghy ya adm mwjwdghy ki nmaindghy karnay kay liye do aam nktaha nzar hayn: ghair wzan waly ghrafwn kay liye ، baghair wzan waly ghraf kay liye ، mlhakha mytrks main hr sylbainry wylyw (0 ya 1) hawskta haay۔1 ki kymt isi tarah kay amwdy kay mabyn ayk knaray ki mwjwdghy ki nshandhay krty hay ، jabky 0 ki kymt nahin ki nshandhay krty haay۔ wzan waly ghraf: wzan waly ghraf kay liye ، mlhakha mytrks main hr syl main isi tarah kay amwdy kay darmiyan knaray sy wabstha wzan ya laght hawty haay۔aghr do amwdy kay darmiyan koi knaray nahin hay tou ، is sy mtalkha syl ki nmaindghy kesi khasa kdr jesay anfynty ya syntynl wylyw kay zaryaha ki jaskty haay۔ ayk msaal kay tawr par kesi mlhakha mytrks kay tsawr ko wazuha karnay kay liye ayk msaal: 4 amwdy kay sath ayk ghraf par ghwr karain js main A ، B ، C ka lybl laga hoa haay۔، aur D. is ghraf kay liye mlhakha mytrks 4x4 mytrks hawgha: CSSCOPY kwda A B C DA [0 1 0 1] B [1 0 1 0] C [0 1 0 0] D [1 0 0] D [1 0 0 0]، mytrks main 1 ki kymt isi tarah kay amwdy kay mabyn ayk knaray ki mwjwdghy ki nshandhay krty hay ، jabky 0 ki kymt kesi knaray ki nshandhay nahin krty haay۔msaal kay tawr par ، A aur B ، A aur D ، B aur C kay darmiyan ayk knaray mwjwd hay ، aur isi tarha۔ aydajnsy mytrks main kiy fwaid aur astamal kay maamlat hayn: mwsar knaray kay swalat: mlhakha mytrk mstkl wkt kay swalat ki ajazat dytay hain keh aya hay ya nhayn۔dw amwdy kay darmiyan ayk knaray۔mytrks andayksngh knaray ki nmaindghy karnay waly syl tak braha rast rsaiy fraham krty hay ، js sy knaray kay wjwd ko mwsar bnata haay۔ aspys ki karkrdghy: mlhakha mytrks dyghr ghraf ki nmaindghywn ، jesay mlhakha fharstwn kay mkablay main zayada jghha sy mwsar hawskty hay ، jab ghraf ghhnay hawta hay ya jab ki tadad ki tadad hawty haay۔amwdy nsbta small chhwta haay۔ mytrks aapryshnza: mytrks ki nmaindghy ghraf ka tjzayha ya hayra phyry kay liye mytrks aapryshnza kay astamal ko kabl bnaty haay۔msaal kay tawr par ، mytrks zurb ka astamal ghraf main kesi khasa lmbaiy kay rastay tlash karnay kay liye kya jaskta haay۔ taham ، mlhakha mytrks main kuch hadwd hain ، khasa tawr par bohat sy amwdy aur kuch knarwn waly wyrl ghrafwn kay liay۔anhayn O (v^2) jghha ki zurwrt hawty hay ، jahan v knarwn ki tadad sy ktaa nzar ، v amwdy ki tadad haay۔yha ghair mwsar hawskta hay jab braay ghrafwn sy nmtnay kay liye js main nsbta few kam knarwn hawtay hayn۔ khlasaha main ، ayk mlhakha mytrks ghraf main amwdy talkat kay mabyn talkat ki nmaindghy karnay ka ayk jama aur mwsar tarykha fraham krta haay۔yha khasa tawr par ghhnay ghraf ya haalat kay liye mfyd hay jahan mstkl wkt kay knaray kay swalat aur mytrks kay kam aham hayn۔

Question: jawa askrpt main prwtw taip aabjykt kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur yeh kis tarah aabjykt wrasat kay liye astamal hawta haay۔
Answer: kesi ghraf par chwraaiy ki pehli tlash (by ayf ays) alghwrthm ko nafza karnay kay l you ، aap un akdamat par aml krsktay hayn: ayk abtdaiy wrtyks ka antkhab kryn: ayk aysa abtdaiy had ka antkhab karain js sy aap by ayf ays trywrzaal ko shrwa karna chahti hayn۔ dayta dahanchay ko bhatr bnaiyn: amwdy hasaay ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye ayk ktaar bnaiynmlahazaha karnay kay liye aur ayk syt ya srny ka dwrha karnay waly amwdy ko tryk karnay kay liay۔ abtdaiy wrtyks ko tlash kryn: abtdaiy wrtyks ko ktaar main shaml karain aur isy mlahazaha ki tarah nshan zad kryn۔ktaar kay samnay ka hasahaazaghr: paiythwn kwpy kwdafrm klykshn draamd daykydaf by ayf ays (ghraf ، astart): mlahazaha karain = syt () ktaar = dayk () ktaar۔ apynda (astart) mlahazaha kryn۔ aydada (astart) jabky ktaar: wrtyks = ktaar ۔pwft () prnt (wrtyks)# ghraf [wrtyks] main prawsy kay liye wrtyks (jysay ، kuch aapryshn prnt karain ya anjam dyn) par karrwaiy kryn: agar prawsy mlahazaha nahin kya ghya: ktaar۔ apynda (prawsy) mlahazaha kryn۔ (prawsy) mzakwrha aml main ، ghraf ayk lght hay js ki nmaindghy krty haayghraf ، jahan hr klyd ayk amwdy ki nmaindghy krty hay ، aur is sy mtalkha kymt hamsayha khtawta ki ayk fharst haay۔ msaal kay tawr par ، mndrjha zayl ghraf par ghwr karain js ki nmaindghy mlhakha fharst kay tawr par ki hogi haay: paiytwn kwpy kwda ghraf = {'A': ['B' ، 'C'].'،' f '] ،' f ': [' C '،' E '] vert wrtyks' A 'say shrwa hony waly BFS traversal anjam denay kay liye ، aap BFS fnkshn ko mndrjha zayl kehty hayn: paiytwn kwpy kwda by ayf ays (ghraf ،' aay ')yha ghraf ko chwraaiy kay pehlay andaza main abwr kray ga ، hr ayk chwty aur is kay hamsayha mmalk ki staha sy staha par jata hay ، 'A' wrtyks sy shrwa hawta haay۔ by ayf ays alghwrthm ki wkt ki pychydghy O (V + E) hay ، jahan V nmbr haayamwdy aur ay ghraf main knarwn ki tadad haay۔

Question: lnkda fharst ko jghha par alt karnay kay liye ayk fnkshn lkhyn۔
Answer: ayk lahakha srny ayk dayta dahanchha hay jo dyiay gaye tar kay tamam lahakha ki trtyb shuda saf ko mhafwza krta haay۔yha asal strngh ، jesay pytrn mmasal ، strngh srch ، aur sab sy tawyl aam pryfks kmpywtyshn par astrngh sy mtalkha karwaiyan anjam denay ka ayk mwsar tarykha fraham krta haay۔ lahakha srny ki tamyr kay l the ، asal tar pehlay lahakha ki ayk saf main tbdyl hawjata haay۔har lahakha asal tar kay ayk mkhsawsa andayks sy shrwa hony wala aur akhttam tak phylta haay۔as kay bad lahakha lahakha srny bnanay kay liye lght kay mtaabk trtyb diya jata haay۔ lahakha srny main kiy ayply kyshnza aur fwaid hayn: strngh srch: ayk lahakha srny kay sath ، aap mؤsar tarykay sy kesi nmwnha ya asal tar kay andr astrngh tlash krsktay hayn۔trtyb shuda lahakha srny par bainry srch ya dyghr mwsar tlash alghwrthm ka astamal krkay ، aap strngh main pytrn kay tamam wakaat ki abtdaiy pwzayshnwn ka tayn krsktay hayn۔ sab sy zayada aam mshtrkha pryfks: lahakha srny ko tawyl arsaay sy aam pryfks (LCP) ki ghnty kay liye astamal kya jaskta hay (LCP)asal tar main kesi bhi do lahakha kay drmyan۔ayl sy py trtyb shuda lahakha srny main isi lahakha kay zaryaha mshtrkha sab sy tawyl aam sabkha haay۔as main mkhtlf strngh mmasal alghwrthm aur dayta kmpryshn tknykwn main ayply kyshnza hayn۔ pytrn mmasal: lahakha arywn ko brwza whaylr transfarm (by dablyw ty) aur ayf aym andayks jesay aaly drjay kay pytrn mmasal alghwrthm main astamal kya jata hay ، jo dayta kmpryshn aur baiyw anfarmytks ayply kyshnza main aham hayn۔yha alghwrthm braay mtn ya jynwmk daytasyts kay mwsar pytrn mmasal aur kmpryshn kay hasawl kay l luth lahakha safwn ki khsawsayat ka faidha athatay hayn۔ aspys ki karkrdghy: lahakha drkhtwn jesay strngh sy mtalk dyghr aadad wa shmar kay dahanchay kay mkablay main ، lahakha srnywn main zayada kmpykt nmaindghy hawty haay۔an ko kam mymwry ki zurwrt hawty hay jabky ab bhi mwsar astrngh aapryshnza ko kabl bnatay hayn۔as sy lahakha safwn ko khasa tawr par mymwry sy mnslk mahawl main mfyd bnata haay۔ pryprwsysngh ki karkrdghy: ayk lahakha srny ki tamyr main aam tawr par lahakha drkht ki tamyr kay mkablay main kam wkt aur kmpywtyshnl wsail ki zurwrt hawty haay۔jb braay dawrwn ko pysh karty ho ya jab bar bar aanay waly sbstrngh aapryshnwn ki pysh ghwiy ki jati hay tou is sy lahakha aarywn ko ayk prkshsh antkhab hawta haay۔ yeh bat kabl ghwr hay keh jab lahakha srny mwsar thrstngh aapryshn mhaya krta hay tou ، un main lahakha drkhtwn ki azuafy faalyt ka fkdan hay ، jesay tyzay sy andraj aur zayly zakhyrwn ko hazaf krna۔lahakha drkht bhi lahakha arywn kay mkablay main zayada mymwry astamal karty hayn۔ khlasaha main ، ayk lahakha srny dyiay gaye tar kay tamam lahakha ki ayk trtyb shuda saf haay۔yha mwsar strngh srch ، sab sy tawyl aam pryfks kmpywtyshn ، aur asal tar par pytrn mmasal kamwn ko kabl bnata haay۔an ki jghha ki karkrdghy aur pry prwsysngh ki rftar ki wjha sy lahakha srny strngh alghwrthm ، baiyw anfarmytks ، aur dayta kmpryshn main braay pymanay par astamal hawtay hayn۔

Question: taip askrpt main shrwa sy ayk wahad mnslk fharst ko nafza kryn۔
Answer: ayk haysh tybl main ، haysh tsaadm is wkt hawta hay jab bnyady saf main ayk hi andayks ya balty ka do mkhtlf chabyan nkshha bnaiyn۔chwnkha haysh kay afaal mkhtlf chabyan kay liye ayk hi haysh wylyw pyda krsktay hain ، lhazaa zayada tr amly mnzarnamwn main tsaadm naghzayr hawtay hain ، khasa tawr par jab chabyan ki tadad baltywn ki tadad sy kahain zayada bray hawty haay۔ haysh kay tsaadm ko snbhalnay kay liye do aam hakmt amly: alyhadha zanjyrwn kay sath: sathalyhadha zanjyr ، haysh tybl main hr balty main ayk lnkda lst ya kuch aur dayta dahanchha shaml hay js main ayk hi andayks main haysh haysh ko ayk sy zayada klydy kymt kay jwraay zakhyrha karnay kay l. hayn۔jb tsaadm hawta hay tou ، is andayks main mwjwdha zanjyr main niy klydy kdr ki jwray ko shaml kya jata haay۔as tarah ، mtadd akdar ayk dusray ko awwr rait kyay baghair ayk hi andayks main mhafwza ki jaskty hayn۔ksy tlash ya bazayaft kay doran ، mtalwbha klyd wylyw jwray ko tlash karnay kay liye mnasb zanjyr ko abwr kya jata haay۔ awpn aydarysngh: awpn aydarysngh main ، jab tsaadm hawta hay tou ، alghwrthm haysh tybl main aghly dstyab (ghyr mnkwlha) slat ki tlash krta haay۔mkam ka tayn asal haysh wylyw par janch pratal ki trtyb ko laghw krkay kya jata haay۔thakykat kay slslay main mkhtlf hawsktay hain ، lekin aam tarykwn main lkyry prwbngh (lkyry fyshn main aghlay slat main mntkl hawna) ، chwkwr ki thakykat (aghly slat ka tayn karnay kay liye ayk chwkwr fnkshn ka astamal karty hawiay) ، ya dabl hayshngh (kdm ka hasab lghanay kay liye dusra haysh fnkshn astamal krna) shaml hayn۔saiza)۔as ka mksad ayk khaly slat tlash karna hay jahan aaps main tkraؤ wali klyd kdr ki jwray dakhl ki jaskty haay۔ hayndangh hayndangh haysh tybl ki karkrdghy aur karkrdghy ko brkrar rkhnay kay liye mؤsar tarykay sy tsaadm bohat zurwry haay۔alyhadha zanjyrwn aur khlay aam khtaab kay darmiyan antkhab mkhtlf awaml par mnhasar hay ، jesay tsaadm ki mtwka tadad ، bwjh ansar (mkbwzuha slatwn ka tnasb slatwn ki kal tadad myn) ، aur bazayaft aur andraj ki karkrdghy ki mtalwbha staha۔ yeh aham haay۔nwt karnay kay liye keh yahan tak keh ayk achhy tarah sy dayzaain krdha haysh fnkshn aur tsaadm ki mnasb ryzawlwshn hakmt amly kay sath bhi ، tsaadm ab bhi haysh tyblza main hawsktay hayn۔lhazaa ، mnasb bwjh kay ansar ko brkrar rkhnay aur karkrdghy kay anhataata ko rwknay kay liye haysh tybl ki nghrany aur wkta fwkta ryshysh (saiza tbdyl krna) zurwry haay۔ haysh kay tsaadm ko sahayha tarykay sy snbhalnay kay bad ، haysh tyblza O ki awsta wkt ki pychydghy kay sath mwsar klydy kdr ki tlash fraham krsktay hayn۔) ، un ko mkhtlf ayply kyshnza jesay dayta bys ، kychza aur zaban kay nfaza main wsya pymanay par astamal krna۔

Question: taip askrpt ka astamal karty hoey antyjrza ki saf par bainry tlash karnay kay liye ayk prwghram lkhyn۔
Answer: khud tnzaym sazay ki fharst ayk dayta dahanchha hay jo khud bkhwd rsaiy ki tadd ki bnyad par apnay anasar ki tnzaym nw krta haay۔khwd tnzaym sazay ki fharst ka hadf mhangha kamwn ki tadad ko kam krkay ، jesay anasar ki tlash ya bazayaft karnay kay zaryaha ksart sy rsaiy waly anasar tak rsaiy ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnana haay۔ anasar ko khud tnzaym sazay ki fharst main mnzam karnay kay liye mkhtlf hakmt amly hayn۔yhaan do mshtrkha nktaha nzar hayn: mntkl sy samnay (aym ty ayf): mww tw frnt hakmt amly main ، jab bhi kesi ansar tak rsaiy haasal ki jati hay (tlash ya bazayaft) ، isy fharst kay samnay main mntkl krdya jata haay۔as ka mtalb yeh hay keh haal hi main tak rsaiy haasal karnay wala ansar hamyshha fharst kay sr par rahay gha۔aysa karnay sy ، aksar rsaiy haasal karnay waly anasar aahastha aahastha mhaaza ki taraf brahtay hain ، js sy tlash ki mjmway karkrdghy ko bhatr bnaya jata haay۔taham ، is hakmt amly sy yeh frzu kya gaya hay keh mstkbl main rsaiy ka nmwnha haalyha mazuy tak rsaiy kay nmwnha sy mshabhat rkhta haay۔ transpwza: transpwza hakmt amly is khyal par mbny hay keh haal hi main rsaiy haasal karnay waly anasar ko mstkbl kryb main dwbarha rsaiy haasal karnay ka amkan haay۔jb kesi ansar tak rsaiy haasal ki jati hay tou ، is ki fharst main fwry tawr par is sy pehlay ansar kay sath tbdyl hawjata haay۔as tarah ، haal hi main rsaiy ka ansar samnay kay kryb jata hay ، jo mstkbl kay mwazanha ki tadad ko mmknha tawr par kam krta haay۔as hakmt amly ka mksad aym ty ayf ki hakmt amly kay mkablay main rsaiy kay nmwnwn ko tbdyl karnay main zayada tyzay sy dahalna haay۔ khud tnzaym sazay ki fharst ki tasayr anasar kay rsaiy kay nmwnwn par mnhasar haay۔aghr rsaiy kay nmwnay nsbta msthakm hain aur hawalha kay ayk aaly mkam ki nmaish karty hain (jhaan haal hi main rsaiy haasal karnay waly anasar ko jld hi dwbarha rsaiy haasal karnay ka amkan haay) ، tou khud tnzaym sazay ki fharst karkrdghy main nmayan bhatry fraham krskty haay۔taham ، agar rsai kay nmwnay anthaaiy ghair mtwka hain ya hawalha kay kam alakay ki nmaish karty hain tou ، khud ko mnzam karnay ki fharstwn kay fwaid kam hawsktay hayn۔ yeh bat aham hay keh khud mnzam karnay wali fharstwn main mntkl karnay waly anasar aur aardar ko brkrar rkhnay kay maamlay main azuafy awwr hayda lghaya jata haay۔lhazaa ، un ki tasayr ka ahatyata sy jaizaha lenay kay mkhsawsa nmwnwn aur ayply kyshn ki zurwryat ki bnyad par jaizaha liya jana chahaiay۔ khud tnzaym sazay ki fharstyn aam tawr par aysay mnzarnamwn main astamal ki jati hain jahan wkt kay sath sath rsaiy kay nmwnay tbdyl hawtay hain ya jahan bar bar rsaiy ki karkrdghy anthaaiy zurwry haay۔msaalwn main dwsrwn kay darmiyan kychngh mykanzam ، wyb srwrza ، dayta bys sstm ، aur fail sstm shaml hayn۔

Question: taip askrpt main lnkda fharst ka astamal karty hoey astyk ko nafza kryn۔
Answer: dahyr dayta dahanchay main kam sy kam ansar ki tlash main wkt ki pychydghy mstkl wkt hay ، O (1)۔ayk kam sy kam hayp main ، kam sy kam ansar hamyshha rwt nwda par mhafwza kya jata hay ، jo isy aasany sy kabl rsaiy aur bazayaft krta haay۔dahyr kay saiza sy ktaa nzar ، aap mstkl wkt main kam sy kam ansar ko bazayaft karnay kay liye braha rast rwt nwda tak rsaiy haasal krsktay hayn۔ yeh kam sy kam ansar ki mstkl wkt ki bazayaft hayp dayta dahanchay ki ayk aham khsawsayt hay aur is ki ayk wjha haay۔trjyhay ktaar main mwsar aapryshn aur alghwrthm ko chhant raha haay۔dyghr karrwaiywn ki wkt ki pychydghy ، jesay andraj aur hazaf karna ، dahyr kay mkhsawsa nfaza par mnhasar hay ، aam tawr par O (lagh N) sy la kar O (n) tak bdtryn sawrt main ، jahan N dahyr main anasar ki tadad haay۔.yha kabl ghwr hay keh kam sy kam ansar ko hatanay kay bad hayp praprty ko brkrar rkhna (aam tawr par haypaiyfai ya dwbarha haypaiyfai kay aml kay zaryaay) azuafy wkt ki zurwrt praskty hay ، lekin kam sy kam ansar ki asal bazayaft khud mstkl wkt ka aml haay۔

Question: ayk prwghram lkhyn takha is bat ka tayn kya jaskay keh dyiay gaye bainry try taip askrpt main mtwazan bainry srch try hay ya nhayn۔
Answer: ayk sply try ayk khud ko aydajst karnay wala bainry srch drkht hay jo anasar kay rsaiy kay andaza ki bnyad par khud ko tnzaym nw krta haay۔as ka mksad ksart sy rsaiy waly anasar ki jra kay kryb lakr ، mstkbl tak rsaiy kay awkat ko kam krkay ، ayk splyngh kay drkht main ، jab bhi kesi ansar tak rsaiy haasal ki jati hay (tlash ، dakhl ki jati hay ya hazaf) ko bhatr bnana hay ، is ki jra main laya jata haay۔ghrdshwn aur tnzaym nw ki karrwaiywn ki ayk syryza kay zaryaay drkht۔as aml ko "chhraknay" kaha jata haay۔chhraknay wala aapryshn drkhtwn kay dahanchay ko jrawn main rkhnay kay liye aydajst krta hay ، js sy bad main hony wali karrwaiywn main rsaiy aasan aur tyza tr hawjaty haay۔ asplaingh aapryshn aam tawr par tyn aham akdamat par mushtamil hawta haay: zagh zagh ya zaygh zagh ghrdsh: agar rsaiy haasal shuda ansarayk pwtay ya pwtay ka bchha hay ، is ko jra tak lanay kay liye ghrdshwn ka ayk slslha anjam diya jata haay۔as main ya tou zagh zagh ghrdsh ya zagh zagh ghrdsh shaml hawskty hay ، jo rsaiy waly ansar ، is kay waldyn aur is kay dada waldyn ki nsbtha pwzayshnwn par mnhasar haay۔ zaygh ghrdsh: agar rsaiy ka ansar jra ka bchha hay tou ، ayk hi ghrdsh haay۔، jsay zaygh ghrdsh kaha jata hay ، isy jra tak lanay kay liye anjam diya jata haay۔yha ghair mtwazan sbtryza ko mazeed tnzaym nw ki jati hay takha yeh ykyny bnaya jaskay keh drkht mtwazan rhaay۔ asplaingh ka aml drkht ko rsaiy kay nmwnha ki bnyad par aydajst krta hay ، js ka mksad aksar rsaiy waly anasar ko jra kay kryb lana haay۔as sy un anasar kay liye awsta tak rsaiy ka wkt kam hawjata hay kywnkha inhain kam mwazanha aur trywrlza ki zurwrt hawty haay۔wha rsaiy kay nmwnha kay mtaabk dahal lytay hain aur is kay mtaabk khud ko tnzaym nw karty hain ، is kay ntyjay main hony wali karrwaiywn ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnatay hayn۔ anfrady tawr par chhraknay wali karrwaiywn ki wkt ki pychydghy aam tawr par O (lagh ayn) hawty hay ، jahan N drkht main anasar ki tadad hawty haay۔taham ، sply kay drkht mtwazan awnchaiywn ki zumant nahin dytay hain jesay aay wy ayl kay drkht ya srkh rngh kay drkht ، lhazaa bdtryn sawrt main ، aapryshnza ki trtyb ki wkt ki pychydghy O (n) tak phanch sakti haay۔as kay bawjwd ، aspylay drkht aksar amly tawr par mwsar hawtay hain kywnkha un tak rsaiy kay nmwnha ko apnanay aur ksart sy rsaiy kay awkat ko kam karnay ki salahayt ki wjha say۔alghwrthm۔

Question: taip askrpt main do astyks ka astamal karty hoey ktaar kay dayta dahanchay ko nafza kryn۔
Answer: askyp ghraf ayk ahatmaly aadad wa shmar ka dahanchha hay jo mtwazan srch drkht ki tarah mwsar tlash aur asharyha sazay ki salahaytwn ko fraham krta hay lekin ayk aasan sakht kay sath۔yha mwsar tlash aur andraj kay kamwn ko haasal karnay kay l Sk askyp lstwn aur bainry srch drkhtwn kay fwaid ko jwrata haay۔ ayk askyp ghraf prtwn kay ayk drjha bndy par mushtamil hawta hay ، js main hr nwdas ki ayk mnslk fharst hawty haay۔askyp ghraf ki nchly prt dayta dahanchay main mwjwd tamam anasar ki trtyb shuda mnslk fharst haay۔awnchy prtyn nchly prt kay kuch anasar par antkhaby tawr par "askypngh" kay zaryaha tkhlyk ki jati hain ، js main shart kt tshkyl dytay hain jo tyza tr tlashy ki ajazat dytay hayn۔ yahan askyp ghraf kis tarah kam krta haay: tamyraty: abtdaiy tawr par ، tamam anasar ko askyp ghraf ki nechay ki prt main dakhl kya jata hay ،trtyb shuda lnkda fharst tshkyl dyna۔har nwda main ayk klydy kdr ki jwray hawty hay aur is main ayk ya zayada farwrda pwaintr hawsktay hain jo aghly aaly prt main nwdas ki taraf asharha karty hayn۔ askp knkshn: aaly prtwn ko bnanay kay liye ، ayk ahatmal ka tarykha astamal kya jata haay۔nchly prt main hr nwda kay l a ، ayk skay tas taay krta hay keh aya is main aghly aaly prt ka farwrda pwaintr hawgha۔farwrda pwaintr rkhnay ka amkan kam hawta hay kywnkha prt unchi hawty haay۔as aml sy ayk askyp knkshn pyda hawta hay jo nchly prt main mtadd anasar ko nzarandaza krta hay ، js sy tyza rftar tlashy ki ajazat mlty haay۔ tlash ki aapryshn: kesi khasa klyd ki tlash kay l the ، tlash upar ki prt sy shrwa hawty hay aur farwrda pwaintrza par aml krkay askyp ghraf kay zaryaay trywrs hawty haay۔aghr farwrda pwaintr hadf ki klyd sy zayada klyd kay sath nwda ki taraf jata hay tou ، tlash aghly nchly prt tak ghrty hay aur jary rhaty haay۔yha aml is wkt tak dharata hay jab tak keh hadf ki klyd nah mil jaye ya nechay ki prt phanch jati haay۔ dakhl aur hazaf krna: askyp ghraf main andraj aur hazaf karnay ki karrwaiyyn srch aapryshnza ki tarah hayn۔dakhl karnay ya hazaf karnay kay liye nwda tlash kay aml ka astamal karty hoey waka hay ، aur askyp ghraf kay trtyb shuda trtyb ko brkrar rkhnay aur is kay mtaabk farwrda pwaintrza ko ap dayt karnay kay liye mnasb aydajstmnt ki hogi hayn۔ askyp ghraf ka klydy faidha srch aapryshnza main is ki karkrdghy haay۔askyp knkshn rwayty lnkda fharstwn kay mkablay main tyza rftar tlash kay awkat ko kabl bnatay hain ، kywnkha woh shart kt fraham karty hain jo mtalwbha mwazanha ki tadad ko kam karty hayn۔mzayd braan ، askyp ghraf main aay wy ayl ya srkh syaha drkhtwn jesay mtwazan tlash kay drkhtwn kay mkablay main ayk aasan sa dahanchha hawta hay ، js sy un ko nafza karna aur brkrar rkhna aasan hawjata haay۔ taham ، askyp knykshn ko brkrar rkhnay kay awwr hayda ko brkrar rkhnay ki wjha sy dusray dayta dahanchay kay mkablay main askyp ghraf ko azuafy mymwry ki zurwrt praskty haay۔mymwry awwr hayda aur tlash ki karkrdghy kay mabyn twazan ko tamyr kay doran askyp knkshn bnanay kay amkanat ko tywn krkay aydajst kya jaskta haay۔ ays kay aai py ghraf main tksym shuda nzaam ، hum martabah sy pyr nyt wrks ، aur klydy kymt waly astwrza main ayply kyshnza mwjwd hain jahan mwsar asharyha sazay aur tlash ki zurwrt hawty haay۔wha tlash ki achhy karkrdghy ko brkrar rkhtay hoey rwayty tlash kay drkhtwn kay liye ayk twsya pzayr aur विकेंद्रीकृत mtbadl fraham karty hayn۔

Question: taip askrpt ka astamal karty hoey strngh main alfaza ki trtyb ko alta karnay kay liye ayk prwghram lkhyn۔
Answer: ayk astyk aur ktaar dono lkyry dayta dahanchay hain jo anasar ko astwr aur mnzam karnay kay liye astamal hawtay hayn۔astyk aur ayk ktaar kay darmiyan bnyady frk is main hay keh kis tarah anasar ko shaml kya jata hay aur hr dahanchay sy hataya jata hay ، js kay ntyjay main mkhtlf rsaiy kay nmwnwn aur tarza aml ka ntyjha hawta haay۔ astyk: ayk astyk aakhry un frst aaؤt (LIFO) asawl ki pyrwy krta hay ، is ka mtalb hay khaaakhry ansar dakhl kya gaya pehla ayk hay js ko hata diya jata haay۔ ansar ko isi sray sy shaml aur hata diya jata hay ، jsay aksar astyk ka "awpr" kaha jata haay۔ astyk par anjam di janay wali karrwaiywn ko aam tawr par "psh" kaha jata hay (ansar shaml karty hoey ansar shaml karty hayn۔astyk kay awpry hasaay myn) aur "pap" (astyk sy upar waly ansar ko hatana)۔ ayk astyk ko amwdy dahanchay kay tawr par dekha jaskta hay ، jahan niay anasar ayk dusray kay upar khraay hayn۔phalay sy bahar (FIFO) asawl ، is ka mtalb yeh hay keh pehla ansar dakhl kya gaya pehla ansar hay js ko hata diya jata haay۔ ansarwn ko ayk sray main shaml kya jata hay ، jsay aksar ktaar ka "akby" ya "pychhay" kaha jata hay ، aur dusray sy hata diya jata haayakhttam ، jsay aksar ktaar ka "frnt" kaha jata haay۔ ktaar main anjam di janay wali karrwaiywn ko aam tawr par "ankyw" (ktaar kay akby hasaay main ansar shaml krna) aur "day kywiw" (ktaar sy samnay waly ansar ko hatana) kaha jata haay۔. ayk ktaar ko afky dahanchay kay tawr par tsawr kya jaskta hay ، jahan niay anasar ko akby hasaay main shaml kya jata hay aur samnay sy hata diya jata haay۔ khlasaha kryn: astyk: LIFO asawl ، anasar shaml aur isi sray sy hata dyiay jatay hain ، aapryshn psh aur pap hawtay hayn۔. kywiw: ayf aai ayf aw asawl ، anasar ko akb main shaml kya gaya aur samnay sy hata diya gaya ، aapryshn ankyw aur daykyw hayn۔ astyk ya ktaar kay astamal kay darmiyan antkhab is msilay ki mkhsawsa zurwryat par mnhasar hay js ko aap hal karnay ki kwshsh kar rahay hayn۔aghr aap ko "aakhry un ، pehlay aaؤt" slwk ko nafza karnay ki zurwrt hay ya aapryshnza kay aardar (jysay ، fnkshn kal astyk ، kaladm/dwbarha faalyt) ko tryk karnay ki zurwrt hay tou ، ayk astyk zayada mnasb haay۔dwsry taraf ، agar aap ko anasar ki trtyb ko brkrar rkhnay aur isi trtyb sy un par karrwaiy karnay ki zurwrt hay tou woh dakhl krdyiay gaye thay (jysay ، task shydawlngh ، mysj prwsysngh) ، ayk ktaar ayk bhatr antkhab haay۔

Question: taip askrpt main ayk kam sy kam myks hayp dayta dahanchha nafza kryn۔
Answer: ayk fynwk drkht ، jsay bainry andayksda try (BIT) bhi kaha jata hay ، ayk aysa dayta dahanchha hay jo mؤsar tarykay sy sabkha rkm kay swalat ko anjam denay aur kesi saf main anfrady anasar ko ap dayt karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔yha mthark saf main anasar ki mjmway rkm ki ghnty aur is main trmym karnay ka ayk mwsar tarykha fraham krta haay۔ fynwk kay drkht main ayk srny par mbny nmaindghy hay jo bainry drkht kay dahanchay ko astamal krty haay۔yha kesay kam krta haay: srny nmaindghy: fynwk try ko saiza N+1 ki ayk saf kay tawr par pysh kya jata hay ، jahan N asal saf ka saiza haay۔andayks 0 main azuafy ansar 0. bainry drkhtwn kay dahanchay kay tawr par shrwa kya gaya haay: fynwk drkht main hr ansar asal saf main anasar ki ayk had sy msawy haay۔khasa tawr par ، fynwk drkht main andayks I kay ansar kay liye ، asal saf main anasar ki isi rynj [i - lsone (i) + 1 ، i] hay ، jahan LSONE (i) kam sy kam ahamyt ki kdr haay۔i.prefix SUM hasab ktab ki bainry nmaindghy: asal saf main dyiay gaye andayks I tak anasar kay sabkha mjmwaha ki ghnty karnay kay liye ، aap fynwk kay drkht ko andayks I sy is kay waldyn kay nwdas tak mntkl karty hain jab tak keh aap jra (andayks 0) tak nah phanchyn۔har mrhalay main ، aap mwjwdha nwda ki kymt ko mjmway rkm main shaml karty hayn۔ ap dayt aapryshn: asal saf main kesi mkhsawsa andayks I main kesi ansar ko ap dayt karnay kay l you ، aap andayks I sy fynwk kay drkht ko is wkt tak is kay waldyn kay nwdas tak phanchatay hain jab tak keh aap is kay waldyn nwdas tak nah phanchynzayadha sy zayada andayks ayn.har mrhalay main ، aap mwjwdha nwda ki kymt ko ap dayt karnay ki kymt ko shaml krkay ap dayt karty hayn۔ fynwk drkht ka klydy faidha dono sabkha rkm kay swalat aur ap dayts main is ki karkrdghy haay۔sabkha rkm ki kmpywtngh aur ap dayt aapryshn anjam denay kay liye wkt ki pychydghy O (lagh ayn) hay ، jahan N asal saf ka saiza haay۔as sy yeh ayk bwly nktaha nzar ka astamal karty hoey kmpywtngh pryfks ki rkm ki nsbt nmayan tawr par tyza tr hawjata hay js main hr astfsar ya ap dayt kay liye O (n) wkt ki zurwrt hawty haay۔ fynwk drkht mkhtlf alakwn main ayply kyshnza tlash karty hain ، jesay rynj sm sy mtalk swalat ، rynj ap dayts ، aur alta ghnty kay hasab ktab۔wha khasa tawr par aysay mnzarnamwn main karaamd hain jahan saf mthark hay ، aur bar bar sabkha rkm kay swalat ya anfrady ansar ki tazaha karywn ki zurwrt hawty haay۔

Question: taip askrpt main do dawrwn kay mabyn sab sy tawyl aam hasawl tlash karnay kay liye ayk fnkshn lkhyn۔
Answer: ghnty ki tarah ayk mwsar alghwrthm hay jo ayk marwf had kay sath addywn kay zakhyray ko trtyb denay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔yha un pt srny main hr ansar kay liye taay krkay kam krta hay ، anasar ki tadad jo is sy chhwtay hayn۔an ghntywn ki bnyad par ، yeh hr ansar ko apni sahayha trtyb wali pwzayshn main rkhta haay۔ yahan ghnty ki tarah kam krta haay: ghnty ka mrhalha: un pt srny ko abwr karain aur hr anwkhay ansar ki mwjwdghy ko ghnyn۔an ghntywn ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye "ghnty srny" ya "frykwiynsy srny" kay nam sy ayk maawn srny bnaiyn۔ghnty ki saf ka saiza un pt srny main akdar ki had sy taay kya jata haay۔ ajtmaay ghnty: hr ghnty kay mjmway rkm ka hasab ktab krkay ghnty ki saf main trmym kryn۔yha mjmway rkm un anasar ki tadad ki nmaindghy krty hay jo un pt saf main hr ansar sy kam ya is kay brabr hawtay hayn۔mjmway tawr par hr ansar ki sahayha trtyb shuda pwzayshn ka tayn karnay kay liye mjmway rkm ka astamal kya jata haay۔ trtyb denay waly mrhalay: un pt srny ko ayk bar phir abwr karain aur ، hr ansar kay liye ، trtyb shuda aaؤt pt srny main is ki sahayha pwzayshn tlash karnay kay liye ghnty ki saf main is ki kymt ko andayks kay tawr par astamal kryn۔kmy ghnty ki saf main ghnty kay liye is ki trtyb shuda pwzayshn main rakhy janay waly ansar ka mhaasbha karnay kay liay۔، jahan ayn un pt srny main anasar ki tadad hay aur K akdar ki had haay۔chhantnay kay aml main lkyry wkt ki pychydghy hawty hay kywnkha yeh ayk bar un pt srny aur ghnty ki saf main ayk bar hawta haay۔taham ، ghnty ki tarah ki khlaiy pychydghy O (n + k) hay kywnkha is main ghnty ki saf ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye azuafy mymwry ki zurwrt hawty haay۔ hasab ktab karna is wkt sab sy zayada mwsar hawta hay jab un pt wylywza ki had ko trtyb denay waly anasar ki tadad sy nmayan tawr par braa nahin hawta haay۔yha aksar dusray chhantnay waly alghwrthm main ya un haalat main sbrwtain kay tawr par astamal hawta hay jahan un pt anasar ghair mnfy add hain js main ayk chhwty sy rynj hawty haay۔

Question: taip askrpt main dajkstra kay mkhtsar trien rastay alghwrthm ko nafza kryn۔
Answer: ykyna!yhaan ayk fnkshn ka ayk msaal hay js main ayk wahad mnslk fharst ko tbdyl karnay kay liye ayk fnkshn ka nfaza haay: paiythwn kwpy kwdaklas lstnwda: dayf __init __ (khwd ، kdr): sylf.wal = wylyw sylf۔ nykst = nwn aydaf rywrs_ lnkda_ lst (hayda): # chyk karain keh aya lnkda lst hay ya nhaynkhaly ya sirf ayk nwda par mushtamil hay agar sr nahin hay ya hayda nahin haay۔ nykst: rytrn hayda # mwjwdha ، pchhlay ، aur aghlay nwdas ko tryk rkhnay kay liye tyn pwaintrza ko shrwa karain = hayda pchhla = koi bhi # lnkda fharst kay zaryaay nahin ، lnks ko tbdyl karty hoey ، jabky lnks ko tbdyl karty hoey lnk ko tbdyl karty hayn۔mwjwdha: next_node = mwjwdha۔ nykst # aghlay nwda kay hawalha ko mhafwza kryn۔ nedext = pchhla # alt lnk # pwaintrza ko aghlay nwdas main mntkl karain pchhlay = mwjwdha mwjwdha = aghlay_nwda # trywrsl kay bad ، pchhla pwaintr asharha kray ghaalt lnkda lst lst rytrn ka nya srbraha pchhla aap lnkda fharst bna kar aur is kay sr nwda ko btawr dlyl pas krkay rywrs_ lnkda_ lst fnkshn astamal krsktay hayn۔fnkshn lnkda fharst ko jghha par plt dy ga aur nya hayda nwda waps kray gha۔ nwt karain keh yeh aml draamd ayk wahad mnslk fharst snbhalta hay jahan hr nwda main ayk wyl wsaf hawta hay js main nwda ki kymt ki nmaindghy hawty hay aur aghly wsaf ki fharst main aghlay nwda ki taraf asharha hawta haay۔

Question: taip askrpt main do trtyb shuda safwn kay wsta tlash karnay kay liye ayk prwghram lkhyn۔
Answer: is bat ka tayn karnay kay liye keh aya bainry try bainry srch try (by ays ty) hay ، aap mndrjha zayl nktaha nzar ko astamal krsktay hayn: ayk mddghar fnkshn ki wzuahat karain ، aaiyay is ko IS_BST_UTIL kehty hain ، jo bainry try nwda lyta hay ، is kay sath kam aza kam aur zayada sy zayada kymt bhi hay keh nwda ki kymt haay۔andr aana chahaiay۔yha fnkshn bar bar janch pratal krta hay keh agar drkht main hr nwda by ays ty praprty ko mtamin krta haay۔ IS_BST_UTIL fnkshn myn: bys kys: agar nwda koi nahin hay tou ، sch waps lwtyn (ayk khaly drkht ayk drst BST smjha jata haay) ۔kyk karain agar nwda ki kymt is kay andr hay tou chyk krynkm sy kam aur zayada sy zayada akdar kay zaryaha byan krdha had۔aghr yeh had sy bahar hay tou ، ghalat ko waps kryn۔ mwjwdha nwda ki kymt kay tawr par tazaha trien zayada sy zayada kymt kay sath baien bchay kay liye IS_BST_UTIL par kal karain (baiyn sbtry main mwjwd tamam akdar mwjwdha nwda sy chhwty honi chahaiyn)۔mwjwdha nwda ki kdr kay tawr par tazaha trien kam sy kam kymt (daiyn sab try main mwjwd tamam akdar mwjwdha nwda sy zayada honi chahaiyn)۔ agar dono bar bar aanay wali kalyn drst lwt aaien tou ، drst lwt aaien ، is bat ki nshandhay karty hain keh mwjwdha nwda par jraay hoey sab try ayk drst bst.finally haay۔، ayk rypr fnkshn bnaiyn ، aaiyay is ko is_binary_search_tree kehty hain ، jo bainry try ki jra kay sath is_bst_util fnkshn kehty hain aur mnasb abtdaiy kam sy kam aur zayada sy zayada akdar (jysay ، mnfy anfynty aur msabt anfynty) ۔jhwn main ayk msaal kay tawr par aml draamd: paiythwnkpy kwdaylas trynwda: Def __init __ (khwd ، kdr): sylf.wal = wylyw sylf۔ lyft = koi bhi nhayn۔ khud nhayn۔ rait = nwnydaf is_bst_util (nwda ، mn_wal ، myks_wal): agar nwda koi nahin hay tw: agar nwda <= mn_wal ya nwda ho tou sch waps kryn۔wyl> = myks_wal: ghalat baiyn_bst = is_bst_util (nwda.lft ، mn_wal ، nwda.wl) waps lwtyn۔ rait_bst = is_bst_util (nwda.ayt ، nwda.wl ، myks_wal) rytrn baiyn_bst aur rait_bstdaf is_binary_search_tree (jra).as kay bad ، aap bainry drkht ki jra sy ghzartay hoey ، is_binary_search_tree fnkshn ko kal krsktay hayn۔aghr drkht ayk drst bainry tlash ka drkht hay ، aur dusri sawrt main ghalat hay tou yeh sch waps aye gha۔

Question: taip askrpt main khud twazan rkhnay waly AVL drkht ko nafza kryn۔
