Answer: do ktaaryn astamal karty hoey astyk ko nafza karnay kay l you ، aap mndrjha zayl nktaha nzar ko astamal krsktay hayn: ayk astyk klas bnaiyn jo andrwny tawr par do ktaaryn brkrar rkhay۔ psh aapryshn kay liay: niay ansar ko ktaar main dakhl kryn۔ pap aapryshn kay liay: tamam anasar ko ktaar 1 sy la jaiynktaar 2 ، swaiay aakhry ansar kay۔ktaar 1 sy ktaar 2 tak tamam anasar ، swaiay aakhry ansar kay۔ktaar 1 aur ktaar 2 khaly hayn۔ azaghr main ayk msaal kay tawr par aml draamd: paiythwn kwpy kwdafrm ktaar ki draamd kwiwklas astyk: Def __init __ (khwd): self.q1 = ktaar () sylf. kyw 2 = ktaar () dayf psh (khwd ، kymt):self.q1.put (wylyw) dayf pap (khwd): agar self.empty (): astsanaa brahaؤ ("astyk khaly haay") jabky sylf۔.get ()) top_element = self.q1.get () self.q1 ، self.q2 = self.q2 ، self.Q1 rytrn tap_ylymnt dayf tap (khwd): agar sylf daat aypy (): astsanaa brahaؤ ("astyk haaykhaly ") jabky sylf۔.q2 = self.q2 ، self.q1 rytrn tap_ylymnt dayf khaly (khwd): waps karain syl۔astyk klas kay zaryaha fraham krdha sab sy upar ، aur khaly tarykay۔

Question: taip askrpt main bainry try par aardar main drkhtwn ki syr karnay kay liye ayk prwghram lkhyn۔
Answer: antyjrza ki ayk saf main zayada sy zayada sbry ka mjmwaha tlash karnay kay l you ، aap kdaanay kay alghwrthm ka astamal krsktay hain ، js main O (n) ki wkt ki pychydghy hawty haay۔azaghr main yahan ayk msaal aml haay: paiythwn kwpy kwdaydaf Find_max_subarray_sum (nmbr): agar nmbr nahin hay tw: 0 myks_sm = nmbrza [0] mwjwdha_sm = nmbr [0] rynj (1 ، lyn (nmbr)): krnt_sm = myks (nmbr (nmbr (nmbr)۔yha do mtghyrat ki abtda krta haay: myks_sm ab tak ka zayada sy zayada rkm ka ptha lghanay kay liye ، aur mwjwdha sbry kay jwraay ko tryk karnay kay liye mwjwdha_sm۔ dusray ansar sy shrwa hony wali safwn kay zaryaay alghwrthm tkrar krta haay۔har ansar kay l it ، yeh mwazanha krta hay keh aya mwjwdha ansar sy nya sbry shrwa karna ya mwjwdha ansar ko shaml krkay mwjwdha sbry ko brahana zayada faidha mnd haay۔yha mwjwdha_sm ko is kay mtaabk ap dayt krta hay aur myks_sm main drpysh zayada sy zayada rkm par nzar rkhta haay۔ is kay bad pori saf main tkrar karty hoey ، fnkshn myks_sm ko lwtata hay ، jo zayada sy zayada sbry ki nmaindghy krta haay۔yha dyiay gaye saf kay andr sbry ki zayada sy zayada rkm waps krday gha۔

Question: taip askrpt main blwm fltr dayta dahanchay ko nafza kryn۔
Answer: ykyna!yhaan azaghr main kwikswrt alghwrthm ka ayk msaal aml haay: paiythwn kwpy kwdaydaf kwikswrt (aay aar aar): agar lyn (aay aar aar) <= 1: rytrn ara paiywt = aar aar [lyn (aay aar aar) // 2] # drmyany ansar ko mhawr chhwtay kay tawr par mntkhb kryn۔= [x kay liye x in arr agar x <pivot] # mhawr brabr sy chhwtay anasar = [x kay liye x x kay liye x == mhawr] # paiywt zayada kay brabr # anasar = [x kay liye x kay liye agar x> Pivot] # mhawr rytrn kwikswrt (chhwta) + brabr + kwikswrt (zayadha) sy zayada anasar # bar bar trtyb dyn sbaryswrt fnkshn un pt kay tawr par ayk srny aar aar lyta hay aur srny ko trtyb denay kay liye kwikswrt alghwrthm ko bar bar anjam dyta haay۔ alghwrthm ayk paiywt ansar ka antkhab krta hay ،as maamlay main ، saf ka drmyany ansar۔as kay bad yeh srny ko tyn hasawn main tksym krta haay: mhawr sy chhwtay anasar ، mhawr kay brabr anasar ، aur mhawr sy zayada anasar۔ fnkshn nay kwikswrt alghwrthm ko chhwtay aur braay zayly hasaay main bar bar laghw kya hay ، aur is kay sath chhantay hoey sbrywn ko bhi jwra diya haay۔aakhry trtyb shuda saf tyar karnay kay liye msawy anasar۔ kwikswrt fnkshn ka astamal karnay kay l you ، aap isy ayk dlyl kay tawr par add ki saf kay sath kal krsktay hayn۔yha ayk niy saf lwtaiay ga js main anasar ko chrahaya hoa trtyb main trtyb diya gaya haay۔msaal kay tawr pr: paiythwn kwpy kwdayrr = [8 ، 3 ، 1 ، 5 ، 9 ، 2] chhantya_aar = kwikwrt (aay aar aar) prnt (chhantya_r) # aaؤt pt: [1 ، 2 ، 3 ، 5 ، 8 ، 9] nwt karain keh mzakwrha bala aml ko nwt kryn۔chhwtay ، msawy aur zayada sbrywn kay l new niy fharstyn tkhlyk krta haay۔amly tawr par ، sbry ki hadwd ko tryk rkhnay kay liye do pwaintrza ka astamal krkay apni jghha main trmym karna mmkn haay۔

Question: taip askrpt main dyiay gaye tar kay tamam ajazat namay tyar karnay kay liye ayk prwghram lkhyn۔
Answer: mnt kay dahyr ka astamal karty hoey trjyhay ktaar ko amly jamha phananay kay l you ، aap mndrjha zayl nktaha nzar ko astamal krsktay hayn: ayk MINHEAP klas bnaiyn jo kam sy kam dayta dahanchay ki nmaindghy kray۔mn dahyr ko srny par mbny nmaindghy ka astamal karty hoey nafza kya jaye gha۔ myny haap klas kay pas mndrjha zayl tarykay hona chahaiay: __ init__: ayk khaly mn dahyr shrwa krta haay۔ saiza: mn hayp main anasar ki tadad waps krta haay۔khaly hay ، dusri sawrt main ghalat haay۔ psh: dahyr praprty ko brkrar rkhtay hoey mn dahyr main kesi ansar ko dakhl krta haay۔ pap: dahyr praprty ko brkrar rkhtay hoey kam sy kam ansar ko mn dahyr sy hatata hay aur waps krta haay۔as ko hatana۔ aml draamd kay l you ، aap dahyr main nwda kay waldyn aur bchwn kay asharywn ka hasab lghanay kay liye mayary asharyha sazay farmwlwn ka astamal krsktay hayn: waldyn andayks: (andayks - 1) // 2 lyft chailda andayks: 2 * andayks + 1 rait chailda andayks:2 * andayks + 2 hayry main azaghr main ayk msaal kay nfaza: paiythwn kwpy kwdaklas mnhayp: dayf __ __init __ (khwd): sylf۔ hayp = [] dayf saiza (khwd).HEAP) == 0 DEF PUSH (khwd ، kdr): self.heap.append (wylyw) sylf۔"trjyhay ktaar khaly haay") # aakhry ansar kay sath jra (km sy km) ansar ko tbdyl kryn۔# jra ansar ko khud sy nechay daal kar hayp praprty ko bhaal kryn۔_SIFT_UP (khwd ، andayks): pyrnt_ andayks = (andayks - 1) // 2 agar andayks> 0 aur sylf۔ hayp [andayks] <sylf۔ hayp [waldyn_ andayks]: sylf ۔_swp (andayks ، pyrnt_ andayks) sylf ۔_sft_p (waldyn_ andayks)DEF _SIFT_DOWN (khwd ، andayks): baiyn_chlyda_ andayks = 2 * andayks + 1 rait_chlyda_ andayks = 2 * andayks + 2 sab sy chhwta = andayks agar baiyn_chda_ andayks <sylf۔ saiza () aur sylf۔ hayp [baiyn_chnd_ andayks] <sylf۔ hayp [sb sy chhwta]: sab sy chhwta =baiyn_klyda_ andayks <sylf۔khwd ، i ، j): self.heap [i] ، self.heap [j] = self.heap [j] ، self.heap [i] aap mnhyp klas ka astamal krkay trjyhay ktaar tshkyl dy saktay hain aur psh jesay kam anjam dy saktay hayn۔، pap ، aur un ki trjyhaat kay mtaabk anasar ka antzaam karnay kay liye awpr۔

Question: taip askrpt main srkh syaha drkht kay dayta dahanchay ko nafza kryn۔
Answer: is bat ka tayn karnay kay liye keh aya do bainry drkht ayk jesay hain ، aap un kay nwdas ka mtnasb mwazanha krsktay hayn۔azaghr main ayk msaal kay nfaza: paiythwn kwpy kwdaklas trynwda: dayf __init __ (khwd ، wyl = 0 ، baien = koi nahin ، koi bhi nhayn): sylf.wal = wyl sylf۔: # bys kys: agar dono drkht khaly hain tou ، woh ayk jesay hain agar try 1 koi nahin hay aur try 2 koi nahin haay: sch waps # agar drkhtwn main sy ayk hi khaly hay tou ، woh ayk jesay nahin hain agar try 1 koi nahin hay ya try 2 koi nahin haay: ghalat waps karain ghlta# chyk karain keh aya mwjwdha nwdas ki akdar brabr hain agar drkht 1۔wl!.aaiy ays_jynykl fnkshn un pt kay tawr par do bainry drkht (try 1 aur try 2) lyta hay aur bar bar un kay nwdas ka mwazanha krta haay۔ agar dono drkht khaly hain tou fnkshn pehlay chyk krta haay۔aghr aysa hay tou ، yeh sch waps aajata hay kywnkha khaly drkhtwn ko yksan smjha jata haay۔aghr drkhtwn main sy sirf ayk hi khaly hay tou ، yeh ghalat lwtta hay kywnkha woh ayk jesay nahin hawsktay hayn۔ Next ، yeh chyk krta hay keh kya dono drkhtwn main mwjwdha nwdas ki akdar brabr hayn۔aghr nahin tou ، yeh ghalat lwtta hay kywnkha drkht ayk jesay nahin hawtay hayn۔ntyjha sirf is sawrt main drst hay jab dono sbtry ayk jesay hawn۔ aap do bainry drkht bna saktay hain aur is bat ka tayn karnay kay liye keh woh ayk jesay hain ya nahin ، IS_IDENTICAL fnkshn ko kal krsktay hayn۔msaal kay tawr pr: paiythwn kwpy kwda# msaal trystry 1 = trynwda (1) try 1. lyft = trynwda (2) try 1. rait = trynwda (3) try 2 = trynwda (1) drkht 2. lyft = trynwda (2) try 2. rait = trynwda (3)# chyk karain keh aya drkht ayk jesay hayn۔، aaؤt pt "drkht ayk jesay hayn" hon ghay۔

Question: taip askrpt main bainry try par pry aardar try trywrsl anjam denay kay liye ayk prwghram lkhyn۔
Answer: shrwa sy ayk mkml haysh tybl par aml draamd karna ayk pychydha kam hawskta haay۔taham ، main aap ko ayk bnyady tfhaym fraham karnay kay liye aap ko azaghr main haysh tybl ka aasan nfaza fraham krskta hawn۔yhaan ayk msaal aml haay: paiythwn kwpy kwdaklas haysh tybl: dayf __init __ (khwd ، saiza): sylf۔ saiza = saiza sylf۔ tybl = [] _ main _ kay liye (saiza)] Def _hash_function (khwd ، klyd): rytrn haysh (klyd)٪ sylf daf dakhl karain (khwd ، klyd ، kdr): andayks = sylf۔balty [i] = (klydy ، kdr) lwt bkt.aypynda ((klydy ، kdr)) dayf srch (khwd ، klyd): andayks = sylf۔balty: agar k == key: wapsy v waps koi nahin dayf daylyt (khwd ، klyd): andayks = sylf۔aghr K == KEY: dayl balty [i] rytrn dayf dasplay (khwd): I kay liye ، balty main ghnty (khwd. tybl): prnt (f "balty {i}: {balty}") is aml main ، haysh tyblklas ayk bnyady haysh tybl ki nmaindghy krta haay۔as main baltywn ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye ayk fharst astamal ki hogi hay ، jahan hr balty klydy kdr kay jwraay ki ayk fharst haay۔ _hash_function ka tarykha blt main haysh fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey dyiay gaye klyd ki haysh wylyw ka hasab lghata hay aur haysh tybl kay saiza kay zaryaha madaywlw dawyzen anjam dyta haay۔as andayks ka tayn karain jahan klydy kdr ki jwray ko zakhyrha karna chahaiay۔ dakhl karnay ka tarykha haysh tybl main klydy kdr ki jwray dakhl krta haay۔yha sab sy pehlay haysh fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey andayks ka hasab lghata hay ، phir balty kay zaryaay tkrar krta hay takha yeh malwm kya jaskay keh klyd pehlay sy mwjwd hay ya nhayn۔aghr mil gaya tou ، yeh isi kdr ko ap dayt krta haay۔aghr nahin mila tou ، yeh niy klydy kdr ki jwray ko balty main shaml krta haay۔ tlash ka tarykha haysh tybl main kesi klyd ki tlash krta hay aur agar mil gaya tou is ki isi kdr ko lwtata haay۔yha haysh fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey andayks ka hasab lghata hay aur klyd kay liye balty ko tlash krta haay۔ hazaf karnay ka tarykha haysh tybl sy klydy kdr ki jwray ko hata dyta haay۔yha haysh fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey andayks ka hasab lghata hay aur hazaf karnay kay liye klyd kay liye balty ko tlash krta haay۔ dasplay ka tarykha haysh tybl kay mndrjat ko prnt krta hay ، balty kay zaryaha balty ، bsary aur daybghngh mkasad kay liay۔ aap haysh tybl klas aur astamal ki msaal bna saktay hayn۔haysh tybl kay sath bat chyt karnay kay is kay tarykay۔yhaan ayk msaal ka astamal haay: paiythwn kwpy kwda hash_tybl = haysh tybl (10) haysh_tybl.nsrt ("aypl" ، 5) haysh_tybl.nsrt ("kylay" ، 7) haysh_tybl.nsrt ("sntry" ، 3) prnt (haysh_tybl.charch ("aypl (" aypl)") # aaؤt pt: 5 prnt (haysh_tybl.sarch (" anghwr ")) # aaؤt pt: koi bhi nahin haash_tybl.daylyt (" kylay ") haysh_tybl.days play () is msaal main ، hum 10 kay saiza kay sath haysh tybl bnatay hayn۔ hum dakhl karty hayn۔klydy kdr kay tyn jwraay ، klydy "aypl" (jw 5 lwttay hayn) sy wabstha kdr ki tlash karain ، ghair mwjwd klyd "anghwr" (jw koi nahin lwttay hayn) ki tlash karain ، aur klydy "kylay" ko hazaf kryn۔aakhr main ، hum haysh tybl kay mndrjat ko zaahar karty hayn۔

Question: taip askrpt main napsndydha syt dayta dahanchay ko nafza kryn۔
Answer: ghair trtyb shuda saf main kay ty aych kay sab sy braay ansar ko tlash karnay kay l you ، aap "kwiyk slykt" alghwrthm namy kwikswrt alghwrthm ki mkhtlf haaltwn ka astamal krsktay hayn۔khyal yeh hay keh mhawr ansar ka astamal karty hoey saf ko tksym kya jaye aur pywt ki nsbtha pwzayshn ki bnyad par tksym kay mtalwbha phalw par bar bar twjha mrkwza ki jaiay۔ hr ki msaal azaghr main ayk msaal kay tawr par aml draamd: paiythwn kwpy kwda dayf fainda_ kayth_larjst (nmbr ، kay): # saf ko dwbarha trtyb dynkwiyk slykt alghwrthm # ka astamal karty hoey # jab tak keh kay ty aych ka sab sy braa ansar apni trtyb shuda pwzayshn main nah ho tou kwiyk_ slykt (nmbrza ، 0 ، lyn (nmbr) - 1 ، kay) dayf kwiyk_ slykt (nmbrza ، kam ، awnchaiy ، kay): # tksym karain srny aur is ko haasal krynpywt andayks PIVOT_INDEX = partyshn (nmbr ، kam ، awncha) # mhawr andayks ki pwzayshn chyk karain agar Pivot_index == lyn (nmbr) - K: # mhawr KTH ka sab sy braa ansar rytrn nmbr hay [Pivot_index] Elif Pivot_index> len (nums (nums) - K: # KTH ka sab sy braa ansar mhawr kay baien taraf hay quick_select (nums ، low ، Pivot_index - 1 ، k) awr: # kay ty aych ka sab sy braa ansar mhawr kay dien taraf hay quick_select (nums ،PIVOT_INDEX + 1 ، aaly ، kay) dayf partyshn (nmbrza ، kam ، awnchaiy): # aakhry ansar ko pywt paiywt = nmbr [aaly] i = J kay liye kam (km ، aaly) kay tawr par mntkhb kryn: # mntkl anasar sy chhwtay sy chhwtay sy mntkl krynbaiyn taraf mhawr agar nmbr [j] <mhawr: nmbr [i] ، nums [j] = nums [j] ، nums [i] i += 1 # mhawr ko is ki trtyb shuda pwzayshn nmbr [i] ، nums main rkhyn[aaly] = nmbr [aaly] ، nmbr [i] wapsy ki msaal kay tawr par astamal kryn: paiythwn kwpy kwdaynwmza = [3 ، 1 ، 8 ، 4 ، 6 ، 2] K = 3Result = Find_kth_largest (nmbr ، K) prnt (F "f" m "{K} wain sab sy braa ansar yeh haay: {ntyjha} ") is msaal main ، un pt srny [3 ، 1 ، 8 ، 4 ، 6 ، 2] hay ، aur hum tesra sab sy braa ansar tlash karna chahti hayn۔pydawar 4 hogi ، jo saf main tesra sab sy braa ansar haay۔kwiyk slykt alghwrthm mؤsar tarykay sy mhawr kay ghrd safwn ko tksym krta hay aur jab tak kay ty aych ty ka sab sy braa ansar nahin mil jata hay is wkt tak is ki tlash ko tksym kay mtalwbha phalw tak phanchata haay۔

Question: taip askrpt ka astamal karty hoey tykst strngh main pytrn kay wakaat ki tadad ko ghnnay kay liye ayk prwghram lkhyn۔
Answer: ykyna!yhaan azaghr main srklr bfr dayta dahanchay ka nfaza haay: paiythwn kwpy kwdaklas srklr bfr: dayf __ __init __ (khwd ، salahayt): khud ki salahayt = salahayt khud ۔bfr = [kwiy nhayn] * salahayt sylf hayda = 0 sylf۔ tyl = 0 khwd۔saiza = 0 Def is_empty (self): sellsrklr bfr bhra hoa hay ") sylf۔ bfr [khwd۔ tyl] = aaitm sylf۔astsanaa ko brahaؤ ("srklr bfr khaly haay") aaitm = sylf.bfr [sylf hayda] sylf۔ bfr [khwd۔ hayda] = koi nhayn۔ khud nhayn۔1 rytrn aaitm dayf jhanknay (khwd): agar sylf۔ aai ays_pty (): astsanaa brahaؤ ("srklr bfr khaly haay") sylf۔ bfr [sylf hayda] dayf dasplay (khwd): prnt (sylf۔ bfr) srklr bfr klassrklr bfr dayta dahanchay ki nmaindghy krta haay۔as ki abtda kesi salahayt kay sath ki hogi hay ، aur bfr mkhsawsa salahayt kay haaml kesi bhi kdr ki fharst kay tawr par tshkyl diya gaya haay۔ aai ays_pty () tarykha chyk krta hay agar bfr 0. sy saiza ka mwazanha krkay۔saiza ki salahayt sy mwazanha krkay bhra hoa haay۔ ankyw (aaitm) ka tarykha bfr main kesi shay ko shaml krta haay۔yha chyk krta hay keh aya bfr pehlay hi bhra hoa hay aur agar yeh hay tou is main astsanaa athata haay۔aaitm tyl andayks par rakha gaya hay ، aur is kay mtaabk dm ko ap dayt kya jata haay۔saiza main azuafha kya jata haay۔ day kywi () ka tarykha bfr kay sr par aaitm ko hatata hay aur lwtata haay۔yha chyk krta hay keh aya bfr khaly hay aur agar yeh hay tou is main astsanaa athata haay۔hayda andayks main mwjwd aaitm ko bazayaft kya jata hay ، aur is kay mtaabk sr ko ap dayt kya jata haay۔saiza main kami ki jati haay۔ jhanknay wala () tarykha bfr kay sr par aaitm ko isy hataiay baghair lwtata haay۔yha janch pratal krta hay keh agar bfr khaly hay aur agar yeh hay tou yeh astsanaa athata haay۔ agar dasplay () ka tarykha bfr kay mndrjat ko aasany sy prnt krta haay۔ yahan ayk msaal astamal haay: paiythwn kwpy kwdabfr = srklr bfr (5) bfr.nkyw (1) bfr.nkyw (bfr.nkyw ((1) bfr.nkyw (1)2) bfr۔ ankyw (3) bfr۔ ankyw (4) bfr۔ ankyw (5) bfr۔ das play () # aaؤt pt: [1 ، 2 ، 3 ، 4 ، 4 ، 5] aaitm = bfr.daykyw () prnt (ayf "dequeued aaitm: {aaitm} ") # aaؤt pt: dequeued aaitm: 1buffer.enqueue (6) bfr۔ das play () # aaؤt pt: [6 ، 2 ، 3 ، 4 ، 5] jhanknay wala_ aaitm = bfr.pyk () prnt (ayf"jhanknay wali shay: {jhanknay wala_ aaitm} ") # aaؤt pt: jhanknay wali shay: 6 un msaal kay tawr par ، 5 ki ghnjaish wala srklr bfr tshkyl diya gaya haay۔ashya lghaiay jatay hain ، daykwida aur jhanktay hayn۔as aml kay mkhtlf mkamat par bfr kay mndrjat dkhaiay jatay hayn۔

Question: taip askrpt main rydaks trtyb waly alghwrthm ko nafza kryn۔
Answer: ykyna!yhaan azaghr main chwraaiy ki pehli tlash (by ayf ays) alghwrthm ka ayk msaal haay: paiythwn kwpy kwdafrm klykshn draamd daykydaf by ayf ays (ghraf ، astart): mlahazaha karain = syt () ktaar = dayk ([astart]) mlahazaha kryn۔nwda = ktaar.pwplft () prnt (nwda ، aynda = "") # ghraf main prawsy kay liye nwda (ya koi mtalwbha aapryshn kryn) par karrwaiy karain [nwda]: agar prawsy main nahin mlahazaha kryn: ktaar۔ apynda (prawsy) mlahazaha kryn۔(prawsy)# msaal ghraf js ki nmaindghy mlhakha fharst ghraf = {'A': ['B' ، 'C'] ، 'B': ['a' ، 'd' ، 'e'] ، 'C': ['a' ، 'f'] ، 'd': ['b'] ، 'e': ['b' ، 'f'] ، 'f': ['c' ، 'e']} start_node = 'a'print ("BFS Traversal:") BFS (ghraf ، astart_nwda) is msaal main ، hamary pas ayk ghraf hay js ki nmaindghy mlhakha fharst kay tawr par ki jati haay۔ghraf dakshnry amwdy ko chabyan aur un sy mlhakha mlhakha amwdy ko akdar kay tawr par astwr krty haay۔by ayf ays fnkshn mkhsawsa astart nwda sy shrwa hony waly ghraf par chwraaiy ki pehli tlash anjam dyta haay۔ alghwrthm nwdas ko dykhnay kay liye tryk rkhnay kay liye ayk ktaar (dayk ka astamal karty hawiay) astamal krta haay۔as ka aaghaza ktaar main astart nwda ko shaml krkay aur isy mlahazaha kay sath nshan zad krkay shrwa hawta haay۔jb ktaar main nwdas mwjwd hain ، tou yeh nwda ki hamayt krta hay ، is par karrwaiy krta hay (ya koi mtalwbha aapryshn anjam dyta haay) ، aur is kay ghair mnhasar prawsywn ko ktaar main shaml krta haay۔prawsywn ko bhi un par nzar saany karnay sy bchnay kay liye bhi nshan zad kya jata haay۔ msaal kay tawr par ، by ayf ays trywrsl nwda 'aay' sy shrwa hawta haay۔aaؤt pt chwraaiy kay pehlay trtyb main nwdas ka dwrha kya jaye gha: 'A' ، 'B' ، 'C' ، 'D' ، 'E' ، 'F'۔

Val}") awr: prnt ("nhayn mla") is msaal main ، hum pehlay nwdas ki nmaindghy karnay kay liye lstnwda klas ki wzuahat karty hayn۔mnslk fharsthar nwda main ayk wylyw (wyl) aur aghlay nwda (aghla) ka hawalha hawta haay۔ bainry_srch fnkshn trtyb shuda lnkda fharst aur un pt kay btawr hadf ki kymt ka sr lyta haay۔yha do pwaintrza ، baien aur dien ko brkrar rkhtay hoey bainry srch alghwrthm ko anjam dyta haay۔baiyn pwaintr abtdaiy tawr par is fharst kay srbraha ki taraf asharha krta hay ، aur dien pwaintr abtdaiy tawr par kesi ko bhi mkrr kya jata haay۔alghwrthm tkrary tawr par baien ya dien pwaintr ko hadf ki kymt kay sath drmyany nwda ki kymt kay mwazanha ki bnyad par ap dayt krta haay۔drmyany nwda get_middle fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey haasal kya jata haay۔ get_middle fnkshn sst aur fast pwaintr tknyk ka astamal karty hoey lnkda fharst ka drmyany nwda tlash krta haay۔sst pwaintr ayk wkt main ayk kdm aaghay brahta hay ، jabky tyza rftar pwaintr ayk wkt main do kdm aaghay brahta haay۔jb fast pwaintr fharst kay akhttam ya nwda kay akhttam sy ayn kbl phanch jata hay tou ، sst pwaintr mdal nwda par hawgha۔ msaal kay tawr par ، hum akdar 1 ، 2 ، 3 ، 4 ، aur 5 kay sath ayk trtyb shuda mnslk fharst bnatay hayn۔. hum 3 ki hadf ki kymt tlash karnay kay liye bainry tlash karty hayn۔ aaؤt pt "paya: 3" hoga kywnkha lnkda fharst main hadf ki kymt mwjwd haay۔

Answer: ykyna!mlhakha fharst ka astamal karty hoey nmaindghy karnay waly ghraf par ghharaiy sy pehlay tlash (day ayf ays) anjam denay kay liye azaghr main ayk prwghram haay: paiythwn kwpy kwdaklas ghraf: dayf __INIT __ (khwd ، amwdy): sylf.wrtys = wrtyss sylf۔rynj main (amwdy)] dayf ayda_j (khwd ، ays aar sy ، dast): sylf daat aydaj_ lst [ays aar sy]] * sylf .wrtyss sylf۔mlahazaha [prawsy]: sylf۔، 4) ghraf.aday_j (2 ، 4) ghraf.aday_j (3 ، 4) ghraf.aday_j (3 ، 5) prnt ("ghharaiy sy pehlay trawrsl (day ayf ays):") is prwghram main ghraf daat day ayf ays (0) ،ghraf klas mlhakha fharst ka astamal karty hoey ghair hadayt shuda ghraf ki nmaindghy krta haay۔amwdy wsaf ghraf main amwdy ki tadad ko zakhyrha krta hay ، aur ayda_ lst wsaf fharstwn ki ayk fharst hay jahan hr sblst ayk amwdy kay prawsywn ki nmaindghy krta haay۔ ayda_j ka tarykha mlhakha fharst ko ap dayt krkay do amwdy kay darmiyan ayk knaray ka azuafha krta haay۔ day ayf ays ka tarykha kar prfarm krta haay۔ghraf par ghharaiy ki pehli tlash۔yha dwray ki fharst ka aaghaza krta hay takha mlahazaha ki hogi fharstwn ka sragh lghaya jaskay۔tarykha kar _dfs_util kay tarykha kar ko kal krta hay ، js main abtdaiy amwdy aur mlahazaha ki hogi fharst ko dlail kay tawr par mntkl kya jata haay۔yha mwjwdha chshm kshy ko nshan zad krta hay ، isy prnt krta hay ، aur phir mwjwdha wrtyks kay tamam ghair mnhasar prawsywn kay liye khud ko bar bar kal krta haay۔as kay bad hum wrtyks 0 sy shrwa hony wali ghharaiy ki pehli tlash karty hain aur trawrsl aardar prnt karty hayn۔ aaؤt pt ghharaiy ka pehla trawrsl aardar hawgha: 0 1 3 4 2 5

Answer: ykyna!yha ayk azaghr prwghram hay jo addywn ki ayk saf par anzumam ki trtyb alghwrthm ko anjam dyta haay: paiythwn kwpy kwdaydaf anzumam_swrt (aay aar aar): agar lyn (aar aar) <= 1: aar aay aar aar # aar # sray ko do hasawn main tksym karain = lyn (aar aay aar) // 2baiyn_haalf = aar [: wsta] daiyn_half = aar aar [wsta:] # bar bar do hasawn ko baiyn_haalf = anzumam_swrt (baiyn_haalf) ko trtyb dyn۔، daiyn): zum shuda = [] i = j = 0 jabky main <lyn (baiyn) aur jay <lyn (daiyn): agar baien [i] <= dien [j]: zum shdha۔ apynda (baiyn [i]) i+= 1 awr: zum shdha۔ apynda (daiyn [j]) j += 1 # baien ya dien saf sy baky anasar shaml karain jabky main <lyn (baiyn): zum shdha۔ apynda (baiyn [i]) i += 1jbkha jay <lyn (daiyn): anzumam۔ apynda (daiyn [j]) j += 1 wapsy zum shdha# msaal usagearr = [8 ، 2 ، 4 ، 1 ، 6 ، 9 ، 3 ، 5 ، 7 ، 7] shard_arr = anzumam_swrt (aay aar aar) prnt ("trtyb shuda srny:" ، trtyb shdha_ar) is prwghram main ، anzumam_swrt fnkshn anzumam ki trtyb alghwrthm ko nafza krta haay۔yha un pt kay tawr par ayk srny aar aar lyta hay aur isy bar bar do hasawn main tksym krta hay jab tak keh hr aadhay main ayk ya safr anasar nah hawn۔as kay bad ، yeh anzumam kay fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey trtyb shuda aadhay hasaay ko zum krta haay۔ anzumam ki tkryb do trtyb di hogi safwn ، baien aur dien lyty hay ، aur inhain ayk hi trtyb shuda saf main zum krty haay۔as main baltrtyb baien aur dien safwn main tkrar karnay kay liye do pwaintrza ، main aur jay ka astamal hawta haay۔yha mwjwdha pwzayshnwn par anasar ka mwazanha krta hay aur zum shuda saf main chhwtay ansar ko shaml krta haay۔safwn main sy ayk kay mkml aml kay bad ، fnkshn dusri saf sy baky anasar ko zum shuda saf main shaml krta haay۔ msaal kay tawr par astamal main ، hum add ki ayk saf tyar karty hain ، [8 ، 2 ، 4 ، 1 ، 6 ، 9 ، 3، 5 ، 7] ، aur is par anzumam ki trtyb alghwrthm anjam dyn۔trtyb shuda srny [1 ، 2 ، 3 ، 4 ، 5 ، 6 ، 7 ، 8 ، 9] phir prnt ki jati haay۔

Question: taip askrpt main by+ try dayta dahanchay ko nafza kryn۔
Answer: ykyna!yhaan ayk azaghr ka fnkshn yeh hay keh aya yeh chyk karnay kay liye keh aya do dawr ayk dusray kay anaghram hayn: paiythwn kwpy kwdaydaf ARE_ANAGRAMS (STR1 ، STR2): # wait aspys ko hata dyn aur tar ko lwir kys STR1 = str1.repleas ("" ") main tbdyl kryn۔str2.replace ("" ، "") .lower () # chyk karain keh aya tar ki lmbaiy brabr hay agar lyn (str1)! = lyn (str2): ghalat # dono tar kay liye frykwiynsy lght bnaiyn freq_dict1 = {} freq_dict2= {} # str1 main str1 main hr krdar ki frykwinsy ko str1 main shmar kryn: freq_dict1 [char] = freq_dict1.get (char ، 0) + 1 # str2 main str2 main hr krdar ki frykwinsy ko str2 myn: freq_dict2 [char]= freq_dict2.get (CHAR ، 0) + 1 # frykwinsy lght ka mwazanha karain freq_dict1 == freq_dict2 # msaal usagestring1 = "snyn" strngh 2 = "khamwsh" agar ARE_ANAGRAMS (strngh 1 ، strngh 2): prnt (F "{strngh 1} aur {strngh 2 ag anaghrams hayn۔ ") awr: prnt (ayf" {strngh 1} aur {strngh 2 an anaghram nahin hayn۔ ") yeh hay keh do tar ، ays ty aar 1 aur ays ty aar 2 ، ayk dusray kay anaghram hayn۔yha pehlay kesi bhi wait aspys ko hatata hay aur tarwn ko chhwtay kys main tbdyl krta hay takha kys ghair snjydha mwazanha ko ykyny bnaya jaskay۔ Next ، yeh dawr ki lmbaiy ka mwazanha krta haay۔aghr lmbaiy brabr nahin hay tou ، dawr anaghram nahin hawsktay hain ، lhazaa fnkshn ghalat lwtta haay۔ is kay bad ، fnkshn baltrtyb STR1 aur STR2 main hr krdar ki frykwiynsy ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye frykwynsy lghat ، freq_dict1 aur freq_dict2 tkhlyk krta haay۔yha tar main hr krdar par tkrar krta hay aur mtalkha lght main tadd main azuafha krta haay۔aghr woh brabr hain tou ، dawr anaghram hain ، lhazaa fnkshn drst hawjata haay۔bsawrt dyghr ، yeh jhwty ko lwtata haay۔ msaal kay tawr par astamal main ، fnkshn chyk krta hay keh agar "sntay hayn" aur "khamwsh" aynghram hain tou fnkshn chyk krta haay۔chwnkha dawr ayk hi tadd kay sath ayk hi krdarwn par mushtamil hain ، lhazaa fnkshn prnt krta hay keh woh anaghram hayn۔

Question: taip askrpt main mnt kay dahyr ka astamal karty hoey trjyhay ktaar ko nafza kryn۔
